author: Brit loves to shop
content: I just got my own place a little over a month ago after becoming a mom 3 years ago. I wanted to get something to not only play music, but connect to my Fire TV that would sound like a soundbar or surround sound. I live in an apartment so a surround sound system with a subwoofer was out of the question. The Echo Studio not only looks beautiful, but the sound is rich, beautiful, packs a decent punch that’s not too much to disturb my neighbors, and it’s a plus that I can use Alexa and connect it with my other Echo devices. I also really like the feature that allows the Echo Studio to adapt to the acoustics in any room it’s in. I’m not an audiophile, but I do enjoy quality speakers and this definitely impressed me!! I’ve had many speakers in the last 5 years including a smaller Bose one, JBL, Harmon Kardon, cheap ones from Walmart/Target/Amazon/Five Below (you get the point), and the Echo Studio has the most crisp sound and perfect amount of bass for its price. I’d say give it a shot if you’re contemplating it!! I’m extremely happy with my purchase!
title: 200000/10 recommend

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joseph M.
content: I'm using this as a "soundbar" replacement and it's connected to my Amazon Firestick 4K and quite often the sound just stops.  There is no way to get it back on other than reset the device and sometimes that doesn't even work.  It's really annoying.  But when it does work, it sounds great.
title: Sounds great - when it works

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Luxamor
content: This Echo Studio is our living room/kitchen area unit. Remember to set up the equalization through the Alexa app for the best results. We were, and still are, impressed by the full and robust tonal quality of the Studio. Everything from the HD and 3-D sound from all genres are especially impressive. We listen to everything from Chopin to Paul Desmond to Led Zeppelin to Liquid Stranger in this house. It’s all good. Highly recommended.
title: Powerful sound fidelity and excellent equalization

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: BlueMandelbrot
content: Wow! Amazon hit a home run with this device. The sound quality is simply amazing for a device of this size and price point. They were able to keep the cost reasonable which I think is a huge advantage for the Echo, because it sounds every bit as good or better than more expensive devices from competitors. I did purchase a subscription to Amazon Music, which I was hesitant about, but it really does pair perfectly with this device. Still amazed they can get such a big, filling sound out of a device this size. No regrets on this purchase.
title: This little thing is amazing!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: rlfromm
content: Echo Studio recognizing voice commands is very poor compared to the other less expensive Echo models I use. The Echo Studio sound quality is good and exceeds my expectation for a speaker of its size. Unfortunately, there are several bug issues associated with use of Bluetooth speakers. Most often when I disconnect the Bluetooth speaker use of the internal speaker will not resume and if you speak to the echo its light blinks as if responding but there is no sound. Also sometimes when I disconnect the Bluetooth speaker the Echo Studio will send its sound to another Echo in another room. Ultimately I will need to restart the Echo Studio. None of these issues are present on my other Echo Devices. So I give 1 or 2 stars due too to high device cost verses frustration level.
title: Voice recognition is poor and sound problems after dropping Bluetooth speaker connection

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kent Perry
content: I started pursuing perfect sound in the 1960s. I had monster speakers, turntables with belt drive and 20-lb platters, Akai reel-to-reel tape decks, sophisticated receivers....but, alas, still the hiss & pop of analog. Eventually digital got sound right and the question was how big did you want it? Now all I need is an Echo Studio. But, never satisfied, I'll likely succumb to adding another and the sub in the middle. It only took sixty years to reach perfection.
title: Wall of Sound from something about the size of a paint can.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dahtah
content: We started out with one studio speaker to go with our echo plus. It became apparent that we wanted a matching set of Studio speakers to replace our 23 year old sound system.  We are clearly not audiophiles, but are really pleased with the sound quality.  It took us a while to figure out what it meant to pair them and set up a Home Theater with our 4-K fire stick.  The interface between the Home Theater and cable TV is cumbersome.  After a lot of trial and error, we think we have it understood.
title: Can’t buy just one

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C. Horchner
content: IF you only get one you need it to be in front. I was looking to add on a speaker for surround sound.  If you have one it needs to be placed to replace your tv sound.  I wanted to add on to my tv sound not replace it.  So I needed to so it would not be off and playing in one ear.  So unless you get 2 its not something my ears enjoyed.  They should have made them smaller but added 2 in a purchase.  I would have loved if it would have kept my tv sound from my to tv and this a added speaker someplace else.
title: Takes away your tv sound and only sound is threw this one speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jad1795
content: I have several Echo's and the newest generation (in my opinion) have a better/richer sound bass included. This device while not bad was not loud and clear as I was expecting ( was expecting a bose type quality since they were similarly priced) so in hind sight I probably should have gotten the bose speaker with alexa
title: Not worth the extra $

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevin C. Rohrer
content: I own 1st, 2nd, and 3rd Gen Alexas, so I had no hesitation in buying this unit for a room in my basement. The sound is full, and the quality is better than any of the smaller units. Yes, the price is a bit high, but it is consistent w/ regular, bookcase speakers w/ the added benefit of being a part of my Alexa network. I have not yet tried the intercom feature, but as I have Alexas all around the house, am looking forward to it.
title: Really Nice Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Willie
content: I didn't know this speaker existed until I saw it in an ad. It was in a bundle with 2 other items that were free with purchase. I had been using a regular Echo for our family room. This Echo Studio makes a world of difference in the sound of our streaming music! It has a large woofer, multiple mid-ranges and a tweeter. This is a heavy speaker! The sounds are so good and you can adjust the equalizer through the Alexa app on your phone.
title: This is a must have for serious music streamers!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Barron Henley
content: We had a 1st gen Echo in our master bathroom for listening to music in the morning and while in the shower.  I didn't realize how tinny and awful the sound output on the original Echo was until we replaced it with the Studio.  It was a sonic upgrade far beyond what I was expecting.  Just wow.  I love it because it's like having speakers IN the shower.  My wife likes it because the music is so loud that she can no longer hear me singing.  So that's a win-win.  :)
title: Incredible Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: scott scheppan
content: I have been disappointed with this speaker overall, now it sounds fantastic with amazon music in hd dont get me wrong but when listening to iheart and Sirius xm even at regualar volume levels there is distinct distortion, it just does not sound right. When use my little bluetooth speaker with my echo dot it sounds better than the studio, i do alot of music listening on some high end equipment so the echo studio just doesnt hit all the right marks in my opinion. And also the bass can be bloated quite a bit.
title: Disappointing sound quality when not listening to Amazon music

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: francisco m.
content: me gusto: 1. El sonido es de buena calidad supera a los echos anteriores 2. Es compacto y tiene buena presentación, enamora al verlo y escucharlo 3. Sirve como barra de sonido 4. Acepta Bluetooth 5. Acepta entrada óptica 6. Compatible con Dolby Atmos Contras: 1. La equalizacion se reinicia 2. No acepta comandos continuos tienes que activarlo diciendo Alexa cada vez que quieres algo diferente 3. Se nota cuando reproduce Atmos vs 5.1 channel sin embargo no se siente El aspecto sonido que te rodea, los expertos deben trabajar más en esto. 4.  Su potencia no es suficiente si lo comparas con algunas barras de sonido de monto similar a 200 dólares. 5. Ingenieros de soporte únicamente en inglés en español problemas básicos únicamente. 6. Es descartable no existen repuestos
title: Dolby Atmos Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dwayne Hamrick
content: I wanted to love the studio but it just didn’t work the way I needed it to. I had it paired up to my TV via optical/Toslink and this was alright but I couldn’t control the volume unless it was with voice commands. Not only that but it would have tons of white noise coming from the connection and I tried multiple different cables. So I decided to pair on home theater mode and it got even worse from there. The connection was fine and I could control the volume via the Fire tv remote but lip syncing issues began to occur. I couldn’t watch Twitch or YouTube. I could only watch Netflix and Prime video. I wanted to love the Echo studio so bad. The sounds it produced were so rich in bass, treble and etc. I read reviews from way earlier in the year talking about having the lip syncing issue. Which to me showed that there has been no support for the issue at all... so unfortunately I decided to return the product. If you’re going to listen to music it’s great but other than because of functionality you’re SOL.
title: Falls short of greatness

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: terence reisman
content: This speaker has awesome sound for its size. I’m an audiophile, and have been for 60 years. I have a large home theater with B & W speakers all throughout the room. I have a Yamaha sound bar in my “man cave” and a Bose Revove Soundlink elsewhere. This Echo holds its own against all of them. Totally immersive sound playing Amazon Music HD and 3D sound.  I highly recommend this device. And for $149 it was a tremendous deal!
title: Fantastic speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jagger
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. The sound quality on this Echo Studio is absolutely AMAZING it is super loud to the point where it shakes my whole room and my desk like crazy. Although the sound quality is good if your watching YouTube videos it is slightly delayed by some frames so it doesn't completely match up with the persons mouth if you ware watching videos which is kind of annoying. One More Thing: The Alexa wasn't connecting to my windows 10 via Bluetooth so I contacted Amazon support and it turns out it the firmware wasn't working with windows and within 1-2 days they updated the firmware so it now connects. So, the delay could be a firmware thing but it's most likely just the speaker being slightly delayed, otherwise its a great speaker!
title: Sound Quality AMAZING, but slightly delayed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LRS
content: Wow, sounds great! Extremely easy to set up and configure. It does everything Alexa is famous for and truly makes all music sources come alive. And when it is fed with a Dolby Atmos or Sony 360 tune, it almost defies words. Could it be magic? Utterly remarkable sound and a veritable bargain. Highly recommended for music lovers who wish to have an additional or primary sound source available for nearly unlimited titles. Absolutely love it!
title: Outstanding Loudspeaker System plus Alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: A. Sokol
content: The Echo Studio sounds is super for a speaker of this size. The Alexa usability is at best a 3.5 out of 5. The blue like it hard to see so it is hard to tell if Alexa heard a voice request or not. Also, i still have not been able to configure the unit as a HUB. Much better interaction with a TV would be appreciated. It is a large heavy speaker. At this point in time, I should have waited until the unit was a little more settled in
title: Echo Studio SOund=5, use=4

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JeffT
content: Love it.  Amazon products are beating google products in terms of sound quality and ease of use.
title: Superior sound and ease of use.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: butnotforme
content: These sounds good s long as you're listening to a song in 3D, which there aren't many to choose from. On non-3D recordings it sounds like the vocals are being sung through a can...it's terrible. I have two Studios with a sub, and I can't imagine how bad they'd sound with just one. The sun is pretty muffled without any real 'pop,' is more of a rumble than a hit. There are so many issues with the voice commands and Amazon Music. Sometimes your playlists aren't found; songs cut off before they're over; songs and artists aren't found even when you're looking right at them in Amazon Music. Customer service is a joke when it comes to their knowledge of the protect...they really don't know what they're talking about and it's highly frustrating.
title: Not worth the money.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jessica
content: Very easy to set up. The sound quality is awesome! I think the price could be $100 cheaper but I am curious to see how it’s also a hub for smart devices. I haven’t quite figured that out yet but I’m glad I got it and I’m also glad I can make payments on it over six months.
title: Easy set up great sound! :-)

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: joshua aldama
content: Honestly this speaker right here blows my mind this the quality of the sound is amazing and the bass is great I have the echo plus which is around 130 and this speaker is 200 and it blows the plus out of the water I’m currently using it as a sound bar for Dolby atmos and it’s perfect and for music it’s great .
title: Worth the money good movie speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Melissa B
content: The sound quality is great, sure. But the toslink / optical hookup is basically DOA and does not work. I had it working (with the Amazon Basics minitos cable) for maybe a day, but then it spluttered and died on me in the middle of playing some audio. Now I can't get it back no matter how much I reboot or unplug / replug cables. So this expensive device, which I had bought specifically for the optical in hookup so I could use it with my computer, is basically useless. Sounds pretty, though.
title: TOSLINK / OPTICAL DOES NOT WORK

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: CLEVE
content: While I wanted something to with bigger better sound, I really got it for my wife who is deaf in her left ear. We connect it Bluetooth to our Samsung TV and it's sitting on an end table close to her right ear so she's able to hear her TV programming.  Easy setup but we already had an Echo and a Dot installed. The only negative is that there's an audio delay between the TV and the Echo Studio that I can't resolve.
title: Pleased overall

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bart A. Noll
content: Thought this would work well as a sound bar for my new LG TV, especially as it is Dolby Atmos capable. Loved the sound and considered ordering a second for stereo quality. However, I eventually noticed that the sound was not syncing with the lips while viewing TV. There is no setting available to tune lip syncing. This device connects to the TV through bluetooth (which causes a sound delay) or through an optic cable (which will not carry the Dolby Atmos effect). An HDMI connection would have been ideal, but it doesn't have one. As a music speaker I think it works well, and Alexa is very responsive, but not capable of substituting a sound bar. Returned, sadly.
title: Not for use as a sound bar

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JMo
content: I've been very impressed with the sound quality from the Echo Studio.  We really like music in our house and it does it all VERY well.  If you were blindfolded, you'd have a hard time telling that it was just a single speaker.  The highs are crisp and clear and the lows are deep and not boomy or distracting.  Very good balance of sound and is plenty loud.  The Alexa integration recognizes your request much better than other Alexa enabled devices we have had in the past, even when music is playing loudly.  So far, we LOVE having this in our house and I'm very impressed with the sound quality, which was very important to me.
title: Sounds amazing and looks great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cj
content: This is far better then the first and second generation alexa speakers. Bought 2 to get the stereo sound! I now have 6 total and the sound is crisp throught out the house! These are not first generation or echo plus..... these are the studios that are bigger and far better.
title: Better sound! These are not the older version echo's

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shawn C.
content: This echo is top shelf. Its a great price for what it is! With amazon music subscription the tunes just keep coming. The Highs Mids Lows are all perfect and you can tune it individually with echo app on your phone. I just bought my second one and connected it to the fire stick 4k and talk about superior sound for movies and tv. Im waiting for my echo sub to come in and i believe it all connected with each other will be the best you can get for the money hands down! Great job Amazon!
title: Amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joe90
content: Just installed yesterday. It is a keeper. The wireless system helps me to de-clutter my entertainment system.
title: Wow!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JBiggy
content: Great sound and great quality. I have all of my echo speakers in a single group so that I can play music throughout the house and the echo studio adds some definitive bass to the overall sound. Even on its own, it is a GREAT speaker. Going forward, I would really love to see Amazon integrate that tech into a full time outdoor speaker. That is really the final item missing from their lineup.
title: Outstanding Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dave Ricketts
content: I like the sound and quality of Echo Studio.  I especially like its ability to receive and output Amazon Unlimited HD/Ultra HD (none of the other Echos have this capability).  BUT, these is no option for directly connecting output from Echo Studio into an external stereo system.  The 3.5mm jack is strictly for input into Echo Studio.  I run Amazon Unlimited HD/Ultra  HD through a Sonus Connect device on another stereo system -- sounds great!  I was hoping to go with the Echo Studio for this system, but not possible.  The Echo Link is not an option either; its DAC is too limited and cannot process HD/Ultra HD.  So I returned my Echo Studio and will bite the $350-$400 bullet for a Sonus Connect or Sonus Port.  Expensive, but at least they work.
title: No audio output; cannot connect to external system

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Donahue
content: This is truly the best sounding Echo, I just love it. One big CON though is the lack of pairing compatibility with the rest of the Echo lineup. The Sub can pair with all of the other Echos, why not Studio? I imagine there's a technical reason for it, but unfortunately this is a huge limitation in my opinion. So if you want to use this as a sound system or home theater, be sure to know at the moment it's only compatible with the Echo Sub and other Studios.
title: 6-Star Sound Quality!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mike
content: We got this device because our Echo Show 5 completely missed the Mark with sound, operation, and microphone array. It could barely hear us. The Studio is certainly pricey, but we get better sound quality and whisper sensitive voice recognition. I can whisper from all the way across the kitchen. By contrast, we had to yell at the Show for it to hear us and respond. This is the DEFINITIVE echo experience in my opinion. Great job!
title: The best yet. Better microphones and speakers

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Thorn Ford
content: Once installed, along with the sub and an Echo I was very satisfied with the depth and fidelity of sound. I was particularly pleased with the way Studio and related devices (woofer and Echo) easily integrated with the Everywhere group. My only difficulty with the installation was that I had to do it with an old Kindle Fire because neither Windows 10 app, nor the app on android (Galaxy 8) were adequate to the task. I'm happy now!
title: Good Sound for a Modest Investment

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D. OGLEE
content: I do really like the speakers but they do not have enough volume to use as a home theater or a  loud jam out time. I feel like I'm using a tv in a hotel that has a limited volume control. If I had it in a bedroom it would be fine. In my living room I want more. I'm hoping that this issue will be updated at some point. If not I will have to find some different speakers for my loud needs. They do sound good, don't get me wrong on that.
title: Disappointed at this time

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael G. Watson
content: The studio is a really nice speaker but it is still a small speaker.  The sound quality at low volume is good but if turned up, it is ok at best.  If you set your expectations to this being a smaller driver, you will be happy with the purchase.  I would not upgrade a standard echo to a studio if you were solely basing your decision on sound quality.  The difference if there but not impressively different.
title: Good speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Roger E. Ison
content: Bought this and tried it hooked up to my PC via the optical cable input. The sound is just not very good, so I returned it.  I found the high range much too bright, the bass strong but punchy instead of deep, and voice reproduction, e.g. jazz vocals, lacks body. In other words this speaker exaggerates both ends of the audio spectrum but is poor in the middle where we hear the most. It's certainly not the worst small speaker, but it is not very good either.
title: Poor sound quality: punchy bass, exaggerated treble, relatively weak midrange.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: EdoBeats
content: Amazon didn't disappoint with this speaker they gave you exactly what they stated simple yet good. There are a few things that could make this speaker stand out from the rest. But in this market of speakers they are all locked down by there echo systems which is a con on all of them in the market.  hopefully Amazons team will rethink and let go and this speaker will be a heavy hitter in the market already congested by the mini's (systems).
title: a great start into the mini world of home audio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: L. Donivan
content: Love all our Alexa , this one does not stay connected to new Samsung tv as speaker , hard to set up as Bluetooth speaker ,  we have two of them and often will go off  line . And had to get reconnected . Will not find Wifi  , does not always follow set up with app. .. sound is quite wonderful wen it works . Hope they working on a connection fix . And able to really  use it easy as a Bluetooth tv speaker .
title: Not ready yet..... but very cool wen they have it working .

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: mark o.
content: This is my very first Alexa enabled smart speaker.  Was about to buy the Echo 3rd Generation but opted for the bigger sound of the Studio and it did not disappoint! excellent build (built like a tank!) and sound quality impressive! Sound is loud and crytal clear.  to top of it all, Alexa is very impressive and very accurate.  It can control also other smart connected home devices such as camera's lights and TV.  Was able to control my Vestel TV using Alexa in my Echo Studio! An excellent buy if you are looking into the Smart Home category.
title: Very Impressive Smart Speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Pamela J. Venhoff
content: I have the echo spot and the Alexa buds. Both ok products- not great - just good. However, I just received the Studio today and I love it! Very high quality sound, responsive Alexa and works seamlessly with the Alexa app. I have an Apple HomePod, and that has excellent sound quality. The Studio is pretty close to it. This is the best Alexa product out there right now. Very pleased so far...! Update: Still love so bought a 2nd to stereo pair. Works perfectly and sounds amazing!
title: Very Impressive!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom H.
content: I"ve had the second generation Echo alexa for a few years. Music was why I bought it. Since then Echo's features have been expanded.  Recently I found the new Studio. The best sound yet. We love it.  There's a lot of you tube reviews you can watch.  My only issue is the remote for the studio is not available. I was able to buy one for my older Echo, hoping it would work with the Studio. But no good. The remote is really needed. I don't think they made a TV without a remote in 30 years. Hard to yell commands to alexa when you have the volume cranked up. Other than that issue it's the best Echo Alexa music platform.  Come on Amazon, get this issue resolved.
title: Need a remote for the studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: 48HD
content: Sound is pretty good for such a compact speaker system.  The only thing I can say is in the instructions it states: " For best sound place at least 6 feet from any wall".  Well, that is most impractical for just about any room.  Six feet from a wall is usually also six feet from any AC outlet.  I guess if you can re-arrange the furniture to place the unit on an end table at the end of a couch, you could probably manage to meet this requirement.  But other than that I would say it provides a good sound and is easy to install and is functional.
title: Echo Studio Review

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Patrick
content: Was really excited to get these but amazon created a device that is only fully usable if you use only  amazon apps and devices. If you like other music apps or other manufacturers this is not for you. Sadly returned after only an hour of disappointing use. I can say the sound was amazing but with only amazon options they might as well be an AM radio’s.
title: Excited but then epically Disappointed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William
content: I would like to say that I was skeptical of this purchase after reading everything. But I am glad that I did, I am very happy with the Studio. The sound was great, the ability to use all of the echos in my house as an immersive sound experience is amazing. I have had no issues what so ever with the Studio. Set up was a dream, I was listening to my favorites with in 90 seconds of it being plugged in.
title: Very happy, very impressed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jacki B.
content: The unit seems solid and well built, but I was expecting better sound reproduction. I personally would have liked a better bass response rather than having to purchase a subwoofer.  The highs and mids are good.  I have had a problem with the device being seen by the Alexa app on my wi-fi network.  It does work over my wi-fi but I’m unable to link the device to control it under the smart home skill.
title: It’s okay

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tammy C.
content: It seems like my echo dot 3rd gen picks up my voice better and also is louder when responding. The echo studio has amazing sound quality while listening to music but when you ask Alexa something her response is not as loud as the 3rd gen dot. I wish they would do an update so you could set Alexa to respond at a high volume level of 9 or 10 and have music/sounds set to play at 8. That would be nice.
title: Solid Echo Device.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PFCMaddMann
content: While it commonly fails to pick up my voice compared to my other devices, it makes up for it in sounds quantity. Those thing will fill the room with sound. I plan to purchase another, add a sub and replace my home theater system with it. One odd issue I have been getting though is occasionally it seems to get possessed by a demon and plays odd demonic sounds. I found a priest who delivers holy water on Uber eats though, which I can order through this speaker at a moment's notice.
title: Amazing sound for the price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: A. Durning
content: This is the third Echo I’ve gotten. Each time I got a higher quality version, and I am really blown away by this Echo studio! Echo Dot is fine for a bedroom or bathroom, but Echo Studio is great for dining or living rooms- where you spend more time, entertain, and just want to really enjoy the sound quality. I know you could pair the dot with any Bluetooth speaker, but the Echo Studio being all in one package is the simplest interface. I only wish it came in more colors like the dot as my decor is more neutral.
title: Buy it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevin J. Novak
content: Richer, deeper bass make this a great speaker for music. The integration of Amazon Music Ultra HD lets this speaker shine. It has a bigger footprint than the Echo Plus it replaced. I wish the treble were a bit more pronounced, however. As for whole house Echo integration, it doesn't always recognize that I'm speaking to it rather than the Echo in the dining room one room over. That makes it a little frustrating, but we have 6 in the house now, so sometimes the wrong device responds. Otherwise, if it were the only device, it definitely sounds better than all others.
title: Excellent with a few caveats

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cynthia J. Scott
content: Won’t play music, won’t pair with my new 4K tv.  App shows it’s paired, but won’t work.  When paired directly with my fire cube, may work for about 10 minutes but then goes completely silent.  I “just missed” the return window by two days because we thought the problem was the cube and Amazon replaced that after multiple tests.  We bought a new tv because our old one required a Bluetooth adapter and the speaker definitely wouldn’t pair with that!  Have been waiting for the brains at Amazon to figure it out or authorize a return/exchange.  It’s been a month and I’m still waiting.
title: Has many problems.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jonathan
content: Love it! Incredible sound! Highly recommend it!
title: Amazing sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brian R.
content: The good: Quality build and feel, good size, easy operation, Alexa integration including multi room music and sound quality except for voice reproduction. The very, very bad: No matter how I adjusted the sound, the voice reproduction was terrible. Always sounded like it was in concert hall mode and lacked the warmth and natural sound I desired for my type of music. I played the same  music on my Echo Show 10" and the voice sound was very much better. Although the Echo show 10" does not fill the room like the studio speaker, it produces better sound overall.
title: Poor, unnatural voice sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ratz
content: I originally got my first Aleza, an Echo Dot for the living room. One of the main reasons was music. I was very disappointed in the Dot. Returned it for the Studio, and am very happy with it. My house is not huge, 1,350 square feet, but I can play the Studio loud enough to be in a neighboring room and hear is really well. I have since gotten a few GE light switches for it to also control. Very nice.
title: Sound quality is very good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: spidermanjlj
content: Excellent speaker just as good as a Boses (which I have).  My daughter bought it for me as a gift and I am playing this more then my Bose with a Subwoofer on my computer. I am a Jazz fanatic (real Jazz not that smooth fake stuff) and It connects to my Amazon Prime music and sounds great.  I no longer play my CDs just sit and tell Alexa to play a play list an artist or a specific album and enjoy.
title: Just As Good (or better) As A Bose Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard
content: Oh my God it sounds so much better than the Echo plus. It really fills up the room with a sound. I'm going to get another one so I can pair them up. I think the microphone on my echo plus work better but maybe it's because the speaker is louder. So my plan is to get another one and maybe get a subwoofer for Christmas. I also did the high definition quality through Amazon music and I can actually tell the difference.
title: Waaaay better sounding than Echo Plus.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bill Langton
content: We wanted to upgrade our smart speaker arsenal at the house and purchased the Studio! Wow! What great sound and of course, Alexa integration. We use it along with another Echo (3rd Gen) and a Dot to give us whole house Alexa coverage. This allows us to control our vast array of smart lighting, thermostats, cameras, etc., from just about anywhere. The Studio really provides room-filling sound for an affordable price!
title: We Love Our Studio!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Josh Yates
content: I bought both the HomePod and the Echo Studio to try them out together. I am totally in the Apple Ecosystem and I wanted to choose the HomePod, but I couldn’t. The sound of the Studio is just awesome...and it’s changeable with a slight EQ system in the app. I have Alexa all over the house because it integrates with more. I was going to add the HomePod specifically for sound and keep Alexa for our smart home. I am returning the HomePod...which TOTALLY surprised me. The bass is much better and the the overall sound is just awesome.
title: TOTALLY SURPRISED!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bryan C.
content: I love this speaker. I was looking for a great sounding (audiophilish quality) speaker that had alexa and tons of features. This speaker has don't everything I wanted it to do. I keep it connected to the bedroom TV and I use it to play music every day. I saw some reviews about people having trouble playing music on it. I have had no issues at all. I tell it to play music on pandora or Spotify every day and it works great. Sounds great with movies too. I have considered getting the echo sub for added bass but it isn't really a necessity either because I have a full 5.1 home theater system in the living room if I really want to enjoy a movie. The echo studio works exceptionally well as a soundbar type of setup just sitting behind the bedroom TV and and I likely will put more of them in other rooms for multi room audio.
title: Exceeds my expectations

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John K
content: Not so sure about this yet... has it for 2 weeks or so now... still undecided... Pro"s 1) bass is definitely improved over previous devices 2) doesn't break up at loud volumes unless you push it to 10 Con's 1) doesn't seem as responsive to voice commands like my echo plus 2) still not sure about the studio quality sound, but it is better
title: Good and... eh...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J. Shrek
content: No good, only highs and pounding bass. the mid is extremely lacking, result in shilling sound not very pleasing.  It can get really loud for a giant ball room though.  3D music is meh...not much difference. I prefer a good stereo good, balanced sound.
title: Mid-range is lacking, unpleasing shilling sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bsf
content: I was hoping for a superior sound quality from the Echo Studio, but I was disappointed when I listened for first time. Definitely an upgrade from the Echo Plus, but I wouldn't call it 'studio'. Another downside is the zero visibility of the alexa light indicator on top of the Echo if you are not watching over the level of the device. Lets say, if you are sitting and the Echo is your eye level, you will not be able to see the indicator lights. On the plus side, the included ZigBee hub makes this a worthy upgrade from the Echo Plus. I think a more fittingly name for the Studio would be 'Echo Plus II'. The 'studio' is a little misleading.
title: Not quite 'studio' sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: chinnman
content: This speaker sounds fantastic, right up there with the Sonos One and arguably as good (but not better) as the Apple HomePod. The Alexa integration and built in Zigbee hub help with connecting devices. It also can serve as a simple Bluetooth speaker. Very versatile, and can playback 3D sound (ie Sony 360 Reality Audio) if you have an Amazon Music HD Unlimited subscription. I highly recommend.
title: This is One Powerhouse of a Smart Speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jim J  in MD
content: I truly love the upgraded sound on my Echo Studio! It's truly an advancement over the past iterations. I love the 3D sound quality and the bass a great deal. Very happy with my purchase!
title: Love my Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Adam Altmann
content: This is awesome. The only thing stopping me from buying more is the fact that if paired in stereo,from exiting I’ve read, I cannot use it to play anything but amazon content. I want to be able to pair two together and play stereo from an auxiliary source.
title: Good for music  Lags when playing Audio from videos

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: T. Colacino
content: I had an original echo on the 1st group to roll out years ago and finally upgraded. The studio sound is much better and with now being able to use it a home theater option it works very well. I went with the option of getting a Hues Phillps Smart Bulb free, I already have a light set up in the house but it does not handle dimming. Overall well worth the cost. I'm definitely a Echo family as we a also a Tap and Auto.
title: Can't Believe I Waited This Long

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: mrbjr
content: Don’t believe everything you read about this speaker. No matter what they claim, the sound is pretty much directional, but it’s a beautiful sound coming out. I have ordered another one to stereo pair and since I had two echo pluses paired I’m pretty confident this will make a significant difference. Expecting the new one tomorrow and will follow up after pairing. Received number two a couple of hours ago and set up was a breeze including pairing. The sound in stereo is just plain awesome. Abbey Road blew me right off my chair. 😁
title: Have to hear it, superb sound; but

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richie
content: I have been an audiophile for a while and own and have owned top of the line products from parasound amps, rotel , carver and more. speakers from martin logan to klipsch. the amount of great sound these little things put out is amazing! i have 2 of these in a pair with an echo sub and for $530 total you cant beat the value. sounds better then a lot of other systems that cost double and it can do wayyyyyyy more!
title: Amazing sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Amanda Le Blanc
content: I am really happy with this purchase we wanted a sound system for my office and this was a perfect choice. You really hear surround sound. I was looking for something for meditation and this was AMAZING!! So happy with this purchase totally worth it!
title: That BASS THOUGH

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sevans
content: This Echo Studio arrived yesterday. Initially it stopped part way through the set up process so I started again. Once I was able to get music to play it played with high treble and nearly no bass. I’m currently unable to modify the sounds to get the full body sound that’s advertised.....but Alexa did add “bass” to my shopping list. SMH. I really wanted to love this for my home office but this is a dud.
title: No bass and high treble

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jesse Miller
content: I have 2 echo studio speakers paired with an echo sub and they sound amazing! But, only when they work.. the audio drop is still an issue and my speakers all sit within 6ft of my router running 5g with a great band with. This seems to be an on going problem amazon has yet to fix and until they do so I would not recommend buying until they fix the issue.
title: Audio drop strikes again

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rick Moynahan
content: I heard the Echo Studio and was impressed.  I was also interested in getting a Zigbee controller.  I've had the echo Studio for about a month now and I enjoy its sound quality.  But I'm thinking I probably won't use it as my Zigbee Controller as I'm not sure how I would share with my Google Home devices that I also enjoy.  If you are looking for a great speaker I'd put this on your list.
title: Impressive sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brian Felix
content: I bought 2 of this echo studio and I'm returning 1 I managed to pair them together and the sound was great, but later was having tech problems that only one was working and the other won't than after minute it work again, I give up trying between only you get stereo sound for streaming on amazon music, Spotify and other in the Alexa app and fire tv, stereo does not work on Bluetooth again the sound is good but it's not Wow amazing for the price I guess it's an okay speaker.
title: Its sounds good, but was hoping something much better

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P. Ma
content: I’m going to have to agree with the most helpful review that this Echo really shines when you pair them. We enjoy the increased immersion when watching our TV and when playing video games. If I had to nitpick, I just wish that you can pair two speakers over optical. Instead you must split the optical signal, but that would make it just two speakers each running its own set of channels.
title: Sounds so goooood

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Randy Robinson
content: Middle-age guy here, I have 2 3rd generations and two dots. I have one echo hooked up to my surround sound system to play and it sounds really good!!! But when I got the echo studio it blows everything else out of the water, the 3-D experience Is great, but I listen to a lot of classics which are not digitalized, and they sound great on the echo studio as well. I am very pleased with this purchase, and would recommend it highly!! Great sound for a great price!!
title: Love it!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sharon
content: The Echo Studio is incredibly awesome.  The music fills the room fantastically.  I feel like I’m at a concert because the sound surrounds you.  I love to hear my music loud and the sound quality is incredible.  I love having the ability to request any song I want to listen to with Alexa fulfilling it immediately w/my Amazon Music HD subscription.  This is my first Alexa product and I’m very satisfied.
title: Awesome Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DaveCPP
content: This is a great sounding speaker with exceptional voice recognition. I also have an Apple HomePod and I think the sound quality on the HomePod is marginally more refined than the Echo Studio. The Studio seems to be a bit too heavy on the bass tones but it’s still a great way to fill a large volume of space with a ton of sound. Perhaps some way to tune the equalization would make it perfect.
title: Great value for a ton of sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ron
content: This unit sounds great on its own. So good, I bought another one. When adding to speaker groups with other Echo units, it does not work too well. Each unit gets confused on what is playing through the speakers, and most of the functionality of "Echo, what is this song" or "Echo, turn the volume to 6" do not work. So I find myself saying "Echo, play my music on all speakers at volume 5" and it's hit or miss. If anyone knows how to correct this, please let me know.
title: Issues with syncing multiple units

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Derf Keebslak
content: I am thrilled with this additional Echo device added to my collection.  Echo Suite makes your smart speaker sound like a Bose quality stereo.  It is also very good at hearing my voice requests.  This is my main source for everything from music to news to podcasts.  LOVE IT!!  Set up was really a snap, especially if you already have an Echo and the Alexa App set up already.  No brainer to set up & connect.
title: Home Stereo Quality - WOW!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Julian Saturno
content: This is now my third Echo. I had the original and then the following models. I finally bought this one bc I thought that this one might pick up on my voice better than the last, it doesn't. Its a bit better, but the first one was bomber. It never struggled understanding what I said, even from a good distance. This studio echo though does have good sound quality. Overall It drives me nuts, but at this point a necessary evil in the smart home world we live in.
title: almost never understands my voice

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ray Sinlao
content: I pre-ordered this a while back and have been meaning to write a review when I received it. It is small but powerful. We live in a small condo and keep it in our living room. We love that we can pair it to our phones or simply ask alexa to play our favorite songs! Great for our many get togethers we have with friends!! We originally had the smaller echo dot but this is so much better! glad I purchased it!!!
title: This speaker sounds so good! Great for apartments or smaller condos

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fred
content: Just received this and was stunned by how good the sound is. I have a house filled with Sonos speakers including Play 5's which I really enjoy. But the sound of these is excellent, very similar to the Sonos, and I have always found Alexa to be very helpful. The setup was also so easy since I also have multiple Alexa devices. I highly recommend these based on the price/quality ratio. It's a steal.
title: Wow!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jeffrey metzger
content: Speaker sounds amazing. Any bugs that others have had, has been resolved! I have an echo dot, echo show, 3 echo flex, and the echo studio. I used to stream through my surround sound with the subwoofer. No need to do that anymore. My echo show and echo studio provide amazing sound and I don't need to revert back to that again. It is very convient and sounds great! High quality!
title: Amazing product!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael Hughes
content: The sound is very good although not $100 dollars better than the Echo 3rd gen.  If you had (or have) other Echo devices it’s nearly impossible to switch the new edition to “primary” device.  So, unless you subscribe to Music Unlimited, you won’t be able to access Amazon music with it.  The “music everywhere” feature that allows you to play all Echo’s at once sort of comes and goes.  So, it’s a nice sounding device but the system makes you doubt if it was worth the money.  Probably not.
title: Good sound, Sketchy Function

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KMM
content: Was really looking forward to this! Unfortunately it can't be paired with echo dots, can only pair with either my soundbar IR my TV but not both, etc.  I had the Sony 500 and returned because I thought I would be able to pair this with other Amazon products for better sound around my place but since I can't, I'd rather pay the extra $$ for much better sound quality from Sony. Disappointing.
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Anthony S.
content: I was impressed at 1st, but have been without any sound system/speakers besides my aging Logitech 5.1 PC speakers. I gradually became frustraited by the inability to customize the sound to the music I was listening to. The basic "Bass, Midrange, and Treble" just dosen't cut it. Amazon needs to introduce a full sound equalizer on the next release. The bass was very good, the mids were meh, and the treble was very weak. Given this I have decided to return my Studio. I was at a big box store today and heard the Apple HomePod - despite being a bit smaller the sound was exponentially better.
title: Good but not great.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Procrastadopter
content: We have Alexa units throughout our home, with this being our “anchor” unit in our main living area. Installation was easy. Sound is good. We’re having problems with this unit responding to commands. When we ask “her” something, we often get no response. So, we ask again a bit louder. Lots of times, an Alexa unit (typically a Dot) in another room will hear and answer. We call this unit our special needs Alexa. We’re pretty happy with the Alexa system overall- and when this unit “hears”, it responds fine. For the money, maybe another Echo would have been as good a fit.
title: Good concept. Good sound. Easy integration. Poor “hearing”.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Eehsan
content: I don't know why I buy this thing so late. It sounds really good and for sure worth the money you pay for it. Amazon music HD is also great and their combination provide you with a unique easy to use and versatile experience of HD music. I had different versions of Alexa at home, but this one is totally a different experience, even compared to echo plus. Worth every penny.
title: Sounds fantastic for the price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: A B C  1 2 3
content: It’s good. Home theatre sounds awesome. Can only setup two studio and one sub with fire tv cube. I bought four of these bad boys of studio and two subs and it doesn’t pound the house. There maybe better deals elsewhere for the amount of money I spent on these and for what’s worth. I only kept them because I wanted to have them paired with my echo dot. Klispe sell there stuff for the same price as a set of studio and subs. I should have went that route instead.
title: Good.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: S2019
content: First of all the sound quality is good, but it's not as impressive as I imagined. It's very sensitive to voice even far from it. However, this thing is really buggy. 1. For some reason, when I use it as a Bluetooth speaker, I need to double the volume. Also the Bluetooth is really hard to connect. I often fail to connect my phone to it. 2. I linked my Apple Music and sometimes it just wouldn't play the music. 3. The multi-room thing doesn't work well. Some times only one Echo has sound and the other is just silent for a while. 4. I also use Philips Hue Bridge to control my lights. Often I need to ask Alexa twice to turn on/off the lights (even though it says OK the first time)
title: A little bit disappointed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Angeles
content: Initially, I did not think that this sounded that much better than the regular Echo that it replaced and it does take up a lot more room. However, waking up this morning in my bed, I could listen to NPR much better than with my traditional Echo. Setup was incredible easy. Setup was totally automatic. All I had to do was open the Echo app and it installed automatically.
title: Decent

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Karthik K
content: Wow! The sound just fills the room and you can feel it. We’ve placed this in a fairly open space in our family room, the sound truly fills the whole space just like how those humongous speakers fill up a concert hall/stadium with sound!! If you have a subscription to a service like amazon music unlimited or tidal or any other service that has 3D audio tracks, it sounds even cooler! The bass is really punchy, I guess this was also made keeping in mind some people might use this as a subwoofer (?) so that’s a plus too. All in all, highly recommended!
title: Really impressive sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Amalfiman
content: I was looking for a decent speaker for my library.  The ECHO studio is quite a bit larger and heavier than an ECHO, but basically functions the same way.  I was hoping for better base and  sound quality than what I got.  I would say the studio sounds better than the ECHO but not that much better.  I don't think this speaker will blow you away if you like to listen to music.
title: Not as happy as I thought I'd be!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shorediver
content: When Alexa is responding, I love it. Unfortunately, every day there are times when I get no response, and have to go over and press a button to get Alexa to respond. I desperately want to love it, and this is my first Alexa device. Have not decided yet whether I'll keep it.
title: Great when it is working!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J. Hatton
content: The Echo Studio works great as a better sounding Echo. The voice recognition is great as always and it sounds better than a standard Echo. The music integration works without a problem. I was not impressed with the sound quality. When compared to an Apple HomePod, the sound is just mediocre. I felt that mids were muddy. The speaker lacks that pop you get from the home pod. The bass was much weaker in comparison.
title: Alexa works great. Mediocre Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bernard dworkin
content: Amazon has done a con job here.  Although the speakers are great and Alexa works well, it only plays what Amazon wants you to hear.  It's free music library is limited.  It's related functions, like security, or light control, are designed to get you to buy more Amazon products.  They have not disclosed enough here.  There is enough to enjoy, despite getting sucked into an Amazon vortex.
title: Beware, bait and swallow

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LuckyNewb
content: I bought the echo studio hoping for a soundbar equivalent speaker, but it's really just the same as an echo with some bass added. I would go for a similar priced soundbar with dolby atmos. If you need the alexa functionality, look at adding the echo input adapter.
title: It’s just Echo with some Bass

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jane Davis
content: I HATE IT.  IT HAS MANY DEFECTS AND HAS HAD SINCE I RECEIVED IT.  I hired a very knowledgeable man, who has the same model and loves it, to set it up when it arrived.  i EVEN HIRED SOMEONE TO DO A FACTORY RESET but that didn't help the problems among which are: the radio simply shuts off for no reason at all.  this is extremely annoying. the volume has WIDE fluctuations without my telling it to change the volume, even in the SAME song or station i'm trying to pla often when i tell it to change to a specific voume, it doesn't do it. there are other problems also. this is a LOUSY PIECE OF EQUIPMENT. I KEPT IT THIS LONG BECAUSE I WANTED TO MAKE SURE it wasn't just me making some kind of mistake, and that it wasn't the ratio station that was to blame etc. I WANT MY MONEY BACK.  What do i have to do to  GET my money back? NO I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS UNIT, NOT EVEN TO SOMEONE I DON'T LIKE.
title: this ALEXA STUDIO  is a piece of junk.  i am thoroughhly disgusted and upset.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ace
content: I think the product is amazing with a few caveats. First it should be way more plug and play like apple products. I have the studio, subwoofer and fire stick and to get them all to play together it took 30 minutes and a few YouTube videos to get them working. I have tried to take just the studio to a friends house to show how much I liked it and have been unsuccessful in getting it to play which definitely doesn’t help in the selling point. However all together and hooked up I enjoy it very much. Fills the room sound is pretty good and makes movies enjoyable for the small size and lack of cords. Definitely recommend.
title: Sounds really good.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: lejlah88
content: Much better than any previous Echo device available. Don't get me wrong there are better sounding speakers out there but we won't get into it right now. Let me just say this, if you want to have better sound experience with Alexa integration get this unit, sounds very good, plays loud and will sound satisfying for most of the music genre. Good range, and decent sound all around.
title: Very good, not perfect but huge upgrade from any other in Echo family!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Adam Vargas
content: Amazing product......  there were a few days where optical had audio cutouts, but was fixed with firmware update. The only real issue that has yet to be addressed is that a dual unit stereo setup can work for firetv streaming, but not via optical/aux for tv/bluray/other hardware audio.  However this wasnt really built with that in mind.  If they did however make that possible, this could possibly replace my livingroom home theater setup.
title: Great product with even more potential if they try

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kathleen Ann Kozich
content: Wow the sound is really superior. I can't believe how great it is. It hooks up immediately almost by itself. It is automatic in alot of ways. For those that are not tech savvy this is the Alexa for you. It does my light my tv my coffee my intercom to my roommate through another echo speaker it does everything and it hooked it all up by itself all I did was plug it all in pretty much
title: Self configuring device mostly just plug it in

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cmill1960
content: The sound is acceptable.  Alexa response time is slow compared to the other 4 dots and the studio and the plus device I have.  I was really looking forward to the zigbee hub to control my lights and other home devices.  This unfortunately did not happen for $200.  I believe amazon needs to do some software development or change the touted features of the device.  Not so happy with the devices actual functioning and integration.  I could have purchased a number of other devices for sound and music.
title: Disappointed:  Zigbee hub does not recognize devices nor does it have the ability to control them.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KDJ74
content: The Echo Studio Hi-Fi speakers are seriously powerful and affordable.  Amazon has done it again...definitely worth the investment.  The easiest way to set up the speakers to the FireTV is to press the plus sign (+) and then select “Set Up Audio System” and Alexa will handle the rest.
title: P.O.W.E.R.F.U.L

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Carlos Salinas
content: So the studio is actually a great quality speaker for the price, HOWEVER I am now on my second one after getting the first one replaced and I am still having the same issue. The issue is that the speaker sound cracks heavily when connected to my phone especially with heavier bass songs,  however it sounds fine when I tell alexa to launch spotify via wifi within the unit. However you lose the ability to control it from your phone and have to give her voice commands to get specific songs or playlist to come up. I honestly think this speaker fills a nice gap in the alexa device ecosystem however i’m disappointed that it has an issue with one of the main reasons you would want this speaker. Will most likely return.
title: Scratchy sound via bluetooth. 2nd device already.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Josh
content: This is by far may favorite of the echo line so far. I have a 5.1 2000wt system that I'm replacing with 1 echo studio. The 5.1 system is a little louder, but the sound quality on this studio is amazing.  Then the integration with the multiroom music through my house,  and how it links with the fire stick... I definitely recommend getting one of these.
title: Do not hesitate. Just buy it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ford Crews
content: It sounds great for music, but Home theater mode on fire cube keeps getting out of sync.  I end up having to un-pair it and re-pair it in alexa to fix.  I also hooked up with tos cable, which sounds great, but the first time alexa plays any kind of notification, it turns off TOS input and the only way to get it back is to get up, unplug the cable, and plug it back in.  I hope they can fix both of these in future software updates. Until them, it's just a big great sounding alexa.
title: Home theater mode on fire cube keeps getting out of sync.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chris Johnson
content: I can not recommend this product. I got this and the echo subwoofer at the same time. When it works it is great. But majority of the time it does not work. Simple question like "what time is it " and it gets hung up and doesn't respond. Music is a maybe, sometimes it work sometimes it does not. Not worh the money if you ask me. Just get the echo plus no problems their.
title: Can not recommend this product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chip
content: When I first received this speaker you had to turn off the Stereo Spatial Separation to get better sound, recently Amazon sent out a firmware update that fixed that issue.  Now the speaker sounds amazing.
title: One Happy Guy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JohnBoy’s
content: I’m believable. Don’t let the size fool you about sound . This speaker is easy to use and really fills up a room.It has a 3.5 mm plug in . Even and older tv that had the red and white audio out rca jacks or optical out , you can buy for $8.00 dollars a connector that will plug in to your Studio Speaker. I have the rca adapter and I assume you can get the optical one.
title: Thomas Edison would go ballistic if he heard the sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DeadlyJudas
content: I love this thing.  The sound quality is awesome.  It was a present for my wife and she loves it for playing her music on it.  While I can't stand most of the music she listens to (pop tunes, etc.) it does sound great.  I've also used for my music (mostly metal) and it sounds great for that too.  Very easy to set up, especially if you already have other Alexa devices on your network.
title: Easy to setup and the sound is fantastic

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C. Taylor
content: I purchase the Alexa products to function as internet connected speakers to play music. Unfortunately, Amazon will push whatever new features they want and automatically enable them. Now, my studio will loudly alarm early in the morning. When I ask about the alarm, Alexa responds that I purchased a product 3 months ago and wants me to rate it. I'm pretty disgusted that Amazon is injecting their advertisments forcibly into my home. Seems like something that should be illegal.
title: Infringing on my privacy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Enid
content: This speaker sounds really great. Before this I listened to music mostly in my car only (not a headphones person). It's so nice to be able to listen to music in the house again and have it sound good (instead of just using my phone) I bought one for my mom and dad for the anniversary and loved how it sounded so much I got one for myself too
title: Sounds great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R. Martinez
content: I bought primarily for my TV in my bedroom. After listening to a display unit, I decided to go this route and am very glad I did. Setup through the app was easy to connect to my Firestick 4K. The audio sounds great and really fills the room. I really like that I can control the sound volume from my Firestick remote. I have been trying to get used to voice commands to control my TV but I am getting there :)
title: Great sound from a small package and smart too!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Commander K.
content: I've never been so impressed with an echo product that I had to immediately go write a review for it but this echo did it. For a single unit the sound from the echo studio is incredible. I would easily spend 4x the price of this echo for a sound system that would come close, and this comes from someone who spent years installing professional audio systems for homes and events. Absolutely excellent when convinced with high bitrate amazon music.
title: I've never had to immediately write a review, but after first listen I can right here.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Claudio Villavicencio
content: I compared both the Apple HomePod and the Amazon Studio Echo.I’m a Apple fan and i tried to love the HomePod but the Echo Studio simply blows it out of the water and Alexa is light years ahead of Siri.
title: Good product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nellie O'Neill
content: Se escucha espectacular. Mucha fidelidad. Probé  varios bocinas y niguna se escucha como esta. Ni bose ni sony, ni la q vende Ikea se compara con esta. Por fin compré una q se escucha súper bien. La recomiendo.
title: Me encanta!!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Energyguy
content: Surprisingly large. Really thumps out the bass. Amazon really excels on the connection process. So fast and easy. There is a 3 D sound check. Microphones are sensitive enough to pick up voice without shouting. I got it marked down on sale, so great value. Next day delivery in my area. Bought it on a Saturday and got it delivered Sunday.
title: Room filling sound for a great price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Larry A. Myers
content: PROS: Can get really loud, which is what I was looking for, plus better fidelity. Voice sensitivity is very high too. CONS: Big and Ugly. I compared to a Sonos One and while it beat the Echo Studio in most areas, the Sonos had a slight edge in sound quality, tho at a lower volume level. And it was much nicer looking!
title: Turn it uo to 11

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Charlie Hornig
content: Can't see the indicator light from below a straight line of sight - which is actually an issue.  Can believe they didn't think of this!
title: Can't see indicator light from below eye-level.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: triple-t
content: Having purchased an studio from a brick and mortar (because Amazon sold out!), it's been an excellent replacement for my 2nd gen echo.  Huge improvement in sound across the spectrum both audio quality and room presence. main issues i have is the price is about $50 too much.  All our other rooms have echo dots connected to powered bookshelf speakers..... much better audio quality for less $$$. But for its footprint and as an upgrade to a old echo, has been great.
title: excellent echo replacement but music can be better

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: rvlxn
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Great sounding device but for some reason, voice recognition is not great. This Echo Studio replaced my Echo in the same spot but it is not as responsive as my Echo in my normal voice/volume. Sound wise, it is awesome. Although in my opinion, my Bose SoundTouch 10 and Harman Kardon Onyx 3 still sound better.
title: Sound check...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: mif962
content: I have to admit to being much more impressed than this device than I ever imagined. If you have Prime, this is a great home speaker, and a digital assistant. Sound quality is excellent for the price- can't imagine much better. I'm listening to a Dianna Krall album right now and it feels like I'm in the studio with her.  Maybe not quite as pure as the HomePod, but darn close, and half the price (I got mine on sale). I don't think you'll be disappointed.
title: Much better than expected

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David Kloth
content: When I started using Amazon Prime Music, I knew I needed a Bluetooth speaker.  At first I bought a cheap used one to learn how.  When I decided to move up in quality, the Echo Studio was just being released, so I waited.  It's friggin' awesome.  Sound quality is very good for a small speaker and amp.  Alexa is a pretty effective and easy-to-use music assistant.  I could have saved some money and bought "something less," but I'm glad I didn't.
title: Alexa, write a review of my Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LalaBb
content: I’m impressed with the sound quality, given the little package. The bass on this thing kicks, even all by its little self. Connectivity was easy as we already have several Echo devices, so as soon as I plugged it in, it configured itself. This is going to be my favorite Echo device hands down because music sounds great coming out of it. It’s just as good as Bose or Sonos, but your cost is subsidized by this being an Amazon device.
title: Impressive

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jerry (Zell) Curry II
content: I bought a second Echo Studio because the first one sounded so good I wanted a pair, eventually getting the sub to complete my home theater configuration. But to my dismay Amazon techs tell me that you can only hear them synchronized through Amazon music or another music app but not through the firestick 4k. That sucks. And they give you a Phillips color change light bulb but you have to buy another gadget in order for it to work. What a joke when they're so many color changing bulbs that just screw in and link up to your Alexa hub.
title: No 2 speaker pairing with the Fire stick 4k ☹️

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mike V
content: VERY UNINTUITIVE HOME THEATER SETUP GROUP, FAILED TO ASSOCIATE MULTIPLE TIMES UNTIL RESET LOCATION AND DEREGISTERED AND RE-REGISTERED. NO LIVE HELP, AWESOMELY OVERPRICED. SOUND QUALITY MIDLING.  SAD I BOUGHT THE PAIR.  PAIN IN THE REAR TO SET UP WITH FIRE STICK 4K; INITIALLY STATED NOT COMPATIBLE??? DROPS CONNECTIONS AND SYNC WITH 4K FIRESTICK REPEATEDLY.  DON'T EXPECT THIS TO WORK SEAMLESSLY AT ALL WITH YOUR ALEXA SET UP. AGREE WITH OTHERS ABSOLUTELY NOT READY FOR PRIME TIME
title: FORGETS ITS PART OF THE GROUP AND DROPS INTERNET FREQUENTLY

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steven Strom
content: Maybe i came into this with too high of expectations? i currently have a couple Echos (3rd gen) and i am really impressed with the sound quality from those devices so when i saw this Echo Studio for twice the price and great reviews and details i was expecting studio sound with a good amount of Bass. I'm definitely satisfied with the bass improvement but outside of the bass improvement the overall sound quality is similar to my echo 3rd gen.  4 star speaker, bot not 5
title: Pretty Good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mr.Breeze
content: Paired it with another studio in my den and wow! The left spkr and right spkr designation is wonderful. The only down side is, in my opinion, I don't have the ability to set individual equalizers and volume to each speaker. Whatever adjustment you make on 1 also changes 2. This would be helpful in fine tuning balance and eq sounds. I'm very happy with these.
title: Great Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jonathan and Beth
content: Got mine today, it was a breeze to setup. I just plugged in and both connected to my Wifi without any input from me. I grouped both studios I bought with my echo sub in my living room to get an awesome sound. The 3D music was awesome and the home theater sound thru my fire tv was great as well.
title: Great new addition to echo lineup

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Keith Berman
content: Wow ! Have always been a Bose fan but was so disappointed with my Bose 500 Alexa speaker. The microphone had a hard time hearing me and the sound was meh. Just upgraded to the cheaper echo studio and wow, the sound is ten times better. Music sounds great. And it linked to my other devices with no issues. (Not sure why some had problems connected to amazon music mine worked instantly). 5+ stars
title: Better than Bose ! Incredible sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Colorado-zon
content: Really expected more.  The first gen Echo had decent sound from a tiny speaker.  Moving from the 2.5" (I think) to the 5.5" (I think) I thought it would fill the room with good sound.  In short, it sounds like poor equilization and we didn't really enjoy music on it.  Moved it down to the kitchen. So, it's basically a $200 Echo Dot now.  Bummer.
title: Sound is meh

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Road1
content: I'm really impressed by the Echo Studio. The music is clear with good bass depending on your settings. It has no problem filling a large room with great sound. It's very responsive even with the volume maxed out. Still manages to pick up your voice when speaking Alexa. Far better than the Apple Homepod and a hundred dollars less.
title: Great Device..Great Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gary Hill
content: I have owned and operated a recording studio for over 47 years, I do know good sound when I hear it!  With a Amazon ECHO STUDIO, I do hear "very good sound"!! Well worth the price, loaded with features and very well made from very good quality components! I can make requests from just about anywhere, and ALEXA responds absolutely flawless! ALEXA can hear every word said, even over a high music volume level. The only way to not be heard is you must turn off the microphone, just a touch of the microphone on/off button for total privacy. You will not need a manual to get started, just plug it in and meet ALEXA. You must have a manual to learn all you can do. They should of included a manual in the box, but they do not ! Check U tube for more info. ENJOY!!
title: Most important feature for me was the absolutely AMAZING SOUND QUALITY!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Glen
content: Nice speaker; does have its connectivity issues though.
