Worked with the bluetooth on my tv for about a day then wouldn't connect at all, tried optical but then you have to disconnect and reconnect the cable every time you turn on the tv otherwise it doesn't work and then have to get up to control ther volume directly on the speaker.  Nice for music and such though
title: Good for music

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: radiohead jeff
content: Well this product sounds good not amazing but good. What drives this product into the abyss is Amazon prime music along with Alexa who seems to be dyslexic at best. Horrible. Amazon prime music even sucks on my $300 Beats headphones.. pops hisses and the bit rate is noticeably slower and of poor quality. Sorry but next time I’ll pay more for a Sonos system and play my own music.
title: Good speaker bad service

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: WILLIAM J. WEEDON
content: I have had 4 different speakers for the kitchen over the years. The others have been from just ok to above average, but the Studio has great fidelity for its size and Alexa makes a great cooking partner. It is not for critical listening for the audiophile but it is outstanding for everything else.
title: Best background audio so far...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mac
content: The sound is so good. I placed it in several spots and in different rooms trying to decide just where I was going to finally put it. It automatically adjusts to the room and surroundings. It had a great sound no matter where I put it. Crisp, clear sound with near perfect balance. This thing has great sound quality even at high volume. It's a keeper.
title: The sound is fantastic. Perfect for the bedroom. Wow, I love it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Christian
content: Pairing 2 of these Studios in the basement has been amazing at each end of the basement. Great build quality and a ton of sound in one unit. Even found some book shelf speaker mounts on Amazon that almost look like they were made for them! Boom!
title: It sounds great!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shiloh
content: I bought an echo studio to create a home theater with all my echo speakers as surround and I'm deeply disappointed.  I have been an Echo person and I set up my home so all my device are alexa-connected. However, this time around im not happy. Sound is okay but would've been better I With more speakers. Why wouldn't you update your system so you can connect all these devices to play as surround speakers. Why can I play multi-room music but cannot do it when I watch on my fire tv? You have to buy another echo studio or sub to do it. It's frustrating! I know you have to sell the echo studio and sub but for all of us who owns several echo devices this shouldn't be an issue. Sonos, Bose and Polks system are able to do it. If I have known that echo studio is a lame duck system then I would've bought sonos.
title: Lame duck system

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Greg L. meier
content: Sounds good,not great though. Equalizer is ineffective. I probably would have saved the extra money and Bought a newer version of the device I already had. Bass is definitely improved
title: Just ok

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Garrett G. Graham
content: I bought one to use with my FireTV and so far I am not disappointed. After having decent LG soundbar and a standalone amp with some bookshelf speakers I think the Echo Studio sounds better and I can hear dialog much better. I will likely be pairing with a second one and I am not sure I will need a sub.
title: Greatest Echo Yet

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Eddie Dean
content: I followed the provided instructions, but found that it wouldn't pair with my Fire Cube TV. I called tech support, and Paula helped me resolve the issue. Turns out that the Echo Studio just needed a software update. I've been SO HAPPY with the Echo Studio ever since!
title: Run software update right away!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andy Marchant
content: I am new to Alexa driven products.  But I did not want my first Alexa speaker to sound like a $20 Bluetooth speaker from Wal-Mart.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The sound is crisp, and the bass is just right.  I have had the speaker for about a month now, and I wish I had more time to listen to music, but this is a wonderful addition to my home.
title: Closest thing to a homepod out there

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Becks
content: I have a number of Alexa's all over my home. I absolutely love the speaker integration so I can play music all over at the house at the same time. And upgrading to the Echo Studio makes it even better. This is an excellent sounding speaker and really lives up to were expectations! I have the Echo Sub linked to one of my Alexa's and this new Echo Studio sounds even better than that. I'd highly recommended this if you're looking for a high quality, great sounding speaker with the added benefit of Alexa capabilities.
title: Great Sounding Little Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brian W. Mcshan
content: When the speaker first arrived I did not like it what so ever and was very disappointed.  A technical service member reached out to me and had me do a factory reset.  Well, that fixed the issue.  I also figured out that from my phone via Bluetooth you have to have the volume turned up as well.  I plan to dive into what this truly sounds like now that it is working right.
title: Not Bad for the money!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Paula
content: Placed our studio on top of our china cabinet.  It fills the room with music.  Never distorted,  even at high volume.  Voice recognition works well. Was easy to connect it to wifi and our other Amazon devices.  Can't rate tech support because we didn't need it! This device is capable of playing 3D music if you purchase the 3D plan from Amazon.
title: Echo Studio fills the room with music.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mark E. Poindexter
content: I have been looking for a sound system that is comparable to Sonos 5 or HEOS 7. The Echo studio as a pair plus the subwoofer is the answer. I have heard from other reviews that the Echo studio as a pair without the sub are good. That’s true. But when you add the subwoofer, you really get the added “ umph” that compares to Sono or HEOS. The speakers pair easily. The subwoofer is a little harder but it connects with a little bit of fiddling. The other benefit is that you can run the pair in the same room for stereo or put one of them in another room for mono playback. Sometimes I play them together and if I throw a party, then I can move one to another room and they play the same music with both having Alexa capability.
title: Compare to Sonos or HEOS.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bruce
content: Love this. I bought the regular Echo and liked it so much I wanted another so after reading a bunch of review I decided to get the studio. Big difference in the sound quality. Everything else is the same in regard to how it operates. The Studio is a lot larger. I like that you can pair it with another studio and the Echo Sub which I may get at some point but at the moment one is just perfect.
title: Amazing!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J. W.
content: If you are in the market for premium sound from a speaker that doesn't require much room, this is the product for you.  I would definitely purchase a second. The sound quality boasts rich heavy bass and premium highs and mids. Upon its first setup, the speaker will calibrate by sending out sounds to gauge the the size of the room and equalize the sound to fill the room with sound. I definitely recommend this product.
title: Wonderful full sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kyle Feldman
content: I really like the sound quality for what you get out of a standalone speaker. I will say the only thing I don't like is it can't be used as just a Bluetooth speaker. Has to be connected to wifi and your alexa has to be set up. With the bad out of the way. I'll say the quality is great and comparing it to my echo, jbl flip, and Samsung sound bar and powered sub. The echo studio has more clarity, full range of sounds in the experience.
title: Good quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Beatleist
content: I have two of these that I use with two Echo Subs and Two Echos - I have them grouped and the sound quality is excellent! And since I use the set up with my Amazon Music account - it works out perfectly!
title: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: heidi
content: The echo studio works well and has a nice sound. I received a free light bulb with the purchase and love that too !  I had trouble with the light bulb staying connected  with unit and called customer service for help.  The employee was very helpful and did an excellent job not only fixing the problem but also answering other questions I had
title: Great purchase

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Hey"Lo" JM
content: Great product!!! Set it up in my living room and hooked it up with all my other echo devices. Now I have bass and more sound and all my devices can play together as a group. Now I can go from the living room to the kitchen to the bedroom and hear the music all around the house
title: Love it!!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Haime
content: I am using the echo studio in conjunction with my fire tv cube. For a single speaker it fills the room with outstanding sound. Like all amazon speakers it was very easy to setup.
title: A most impressive smart speaker.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: teta
content: I love that I can move it anywhere in the room and get a beautiful volume out of it if you move it in the TV outside on the deck you can watch TV out of the open it’s amazing
title: Voice

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Odinson
content: It is a fine purchase for a decent intelligent integrated Alexa Atmos speaker.  I wanted more bass but it seems Amazon is no longer restocking their Echo Sub in the USA markets...what a shame...
title: Fine purchase

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Konsento2020
content: It'd be nice to be able to sync and control the Echo Studio's volume from ur phone (I use my phone, or whatever other device). What happens is u have to manually and separately adjust the speaker's volume to High so u can then adjust the volume from ur phone (or tablet). So when ur done listening to music from ur phone (or tablet) via bluetooth, the Echo's volume stays High and Lord have mercy if u trigger Alexa. Yes it's going to be super loud so cover ur ears. I'm sure the scientists ar Amazon behind the technology in these apparatuses can very easily fix this so I'm hoping they'll read my review. Excellent speaker for $199. I highly recommend it. Indeed, indeed, indeed.
title: Excellent speaker. You cannot be disappointed.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Hoffman
content: The studio blows away my echo Gen 2 and echo dot in terms of volume and sound quality. The sub is certainly noticeable. The only reasons I have 4 stars instead of 5 is: I think that there are better options out there in the price range for sound quality and sometimes Alexa doesn’t hear me which is pretty annoying but most of the time it is fine.
title: Overall very happy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John-Michael
content: It is a great sounding studio speaker.  Full sound can adjust equalizer, and just beautiful sound. I’m pleased that I ordered it. Plus it s Alexa.  I do not think you will be disappointed , but keep in mind exactly what it is and supposed to do it’s not a bose SoundTouch 30  but ispts not supposed to be. It’s an excellent choice.
title: Alexa studio excellent choice

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jamalaldin Mansouri
content: I have a Google Home Max that's way larger than this. As a Bluetooth speaker it's alright since it lacks some volume, but as a streaming device with Alexa Cast and Dolby Atmos source for fire TV, it's sensational. Connection with TV is a bit on the unreliable side as sometimes picture and audio don't sync up. But excellent for music and podcast. definite recommendation, when it's on sale!
title: Surprising for the size

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JRHark101
content: I just got this little bad boy up and running and oh my goodness this thing sounds great!! Just bought 1 so far, I already had the sub and 2 of the Echoes and it sounded really good. So far with the 1 studio and sub it sounds a lot better then the other setup. I recommend this product to anyone that listens to music because it sounds amazing! I’ll be adding the 2nd one before to long.
title: Amazed.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C8992
content: Very easy to setup and sounds fantastic especially for the price.  These are not to be compared to studio monitors or professional audio gear. It’s a smart speaker for everyday use and for that purpose it’s excellent.
title: Small size but Big Bang for the price!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: kbraven
content: The sound that this puts out is amazing.  In combination with  Amazon HD music this is a winner.  I have had a HomePod for over a year and it has been good; but the echo studio I think is far superior.  I wish that I could trade my HomePod in and buy another studio.  Music that is labeled 3D is stunning.  Well worth the bucks!
title: Small but mighty!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dougie D.
content: This is by far the best smart speaker for sound quality, but I think if you're buying it to experience Dolby Atmos surround sound it's okay it's not really going to give you that kind of experience. But it's really good sound quality especially paired with Amazon music HD.
title: Great  Amazon music HD sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Thomas W P Slatin
content: The initial setup took about 30 seconds, followed by a few minutes of changing the settings on my Alexa app.  The result was an amazing sound quality, far superior to any other Alexa I have ever heard.  The sound is amazing, authoritative, and bold.  The only one drawback is that this Alexa is huge, a little bit bigger than a pineapple, and it is heavy.  Aside from the added size and weight, it is nearly flawless.
title: Amazing!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Zachary B.
content: I have a about a 3200 sq ft home with several echo devices that I always thought sounded quite nice, but the echo studio is really something fantastic. The bass and depth of sound is unreal. I plan to purchase another for the opposite end of the house. Just those two alone would fill every corner of my home with awesome sound.
title: Wow

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P. Anna
content: It is so much better than the previous Alexa! Quick on recognizing our voice and responding to our commands and richer sound quality. It is bulkier than the previous versions, but the sound is so much better that is worthy. The voltage covers 100 to 240V - which seems to be a common question. I added a picture of the specs.
title: 100-240 Voltage - great sound and great voice recognition

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: HM
content: Great design, great sound. I needed to play with the EQ quite a bit to get the sound I wanted - the default EQ setting (flat) sound wasn't very good.
title: Great sound. Play with the EQ.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: sadiayah
content: So far, I’m loving this speaker. The only Shortfall I see so far is when playing my own music, the volume level dips very low. This wasn’t so with my echo. Also the Alexa app freezes when using the studio when trying to skip a song or play over. I don’t know if that has anything to do with the speaker. But I like the quality of the sound of this speaker.
title: Volume level is low when playing your own music

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rod
content: The Echo Studio that I've purchased, is the first Alexa device I've purchased. I have used other smart devices but decided to go with an Echo Studio. The sound quality is exceptional. I'm still learning about Alexa, as a voice assistant, its capabilities, etc. And I've only had the Echo Studio for a little over a week. So, at this point I am very much a novice still. So far, it's great.
title: The Echo Studio is great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gary Linn
content: I always buy the best because that is MY M.O. to do.  However, I purchased a 9.99 alarm clock with an Alexa Speaker built in.  You cannot tell the difference in quality between the 199.00 dollar one and the 9.99 one.  UNCANNY.  I am keeping the expensive one because hopefully it will last longer.  But, I wouldn't bet on it.
title: You absolutely don't have to have the expensive one

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Christopher Sloan
content: I had been eyeing this for a while to replace the Echo Plus we have in our living room (this moved to our bedroom). The sound it produces is great and fills the room with the bass which is a nice plus compared to the Echo Plus. Sometimes the voice recognition doesn't always pick up when playing louder than normal music, but that is probably expected to some degree. The small foot print is nice as it can sit just about anywhere, as long as its not obstructed by overhangs or on the side.
title: Powerful compact speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: arliss
content: Unbelievable sound! All I can say is wow!
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: fpcross
content: By all means this is an excellent speaker. The mids and highs are clear, natural and well balanced. However, I definitely cannot say the same about the lower end of the frequency spectrum--the bass is weak! If your technical team could only correct this issue via an OTA update, either by directing more watts to the subwoofer, modifying its frequency range, or simply raising the volume of the sound coming from the 5.25 inch woofer. The technical part of how to do it is obviously the perview of the engineers. I am only a professional musician and producer, so I DO know what good bass sounds like!
title: Poor bass sounds

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John W. Edwards
content: AMAZON,  Thanks for developing the BEST of the best electronic devices!  The new Echo Studio is "WORLD CLASS"!  It is easy to use and the sound is EXCEPTIONAL!!
title: AMAZON, THANKS FOR ALL OF YOUR GREAT ALEXA PRODUCTS!  YOUR PRICING AND QUALITY ARE "WORLD CLASS"!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Herschel R. Johnson
content: Yeah, I like everything about this speaker so far. The sound is really good. I am upgrading from the bose mini so its a bigger sound. I also own two sonos1 for my surrounds and use them for playing music. Since I have a sonos sub also, the Studio cant compete, but the studio is mobile. I like the Apple speaker for its size, but the studio rocks
title: Awesome Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ralph H. Zwirn
content: I wanted to get the best possible sound for the TV in my bedroom. I decided to couple the Echo Studio with the Fire TV stick. With a simple setup to use the Echo Studio as a Home Theater speaker for the Fire TV, I am now enjoying truly incredible sound in a small space! And, apart from TV, the sound of my music over Amazon Music Unlimited is now really incredible! Best Alexa smart speaker I have ever used!
title: Great Sound for Small Places

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dave M.
content: Totally fills my kitchen with great crystal clear sound . Added echo sub . Now even better, easy pairing, great with amazon music app ,even hears commands with music up
title: Great sounding, space saving speakers

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lightkeeper
content: Easy to set up, rich sound and much more bass than you get with any other Echo device, however, I would still like a bit more bass.  Have not paired with TV yet - that set up seems confusing as to which Firesticks it works with or not, but hopefully will get that figured out sooner than later so I can try the surround sound feature.
title: Rich sound but still a bit lacking on the bass.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Joseph
content: Great sound and bass
title: Best Alexa so far!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Javblanco_
content: Its a good speaker. But not awesome, the re-calibration is a bluff. The sound its just like a regular 360 speaker. Actually Boss or JBL have better sound quality. The HD 3D streaming from Amazon its just ....... higher qualityvstresm qith less compression. But not 3d as you get with a proper dolby atmos setup. Just pass!
title: not a good choice. I guess amazon will remove it from the line up very quickly

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David R. Vincent
content: Pro: quality sound, good price, Alexa integration Con: confusing to set up, especially with Echo speakers in the house, Alexa has trouble explaining Amazon Music options and specific songs. Amazon Music has layers of options, unlike Apple Music. When I add up the costs of the layers, Apple may be a better buy.
title: Great speaker with Alexa integrated

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B Blythe
content: But...It will only pair with another Echo Studio . Wish it could pair with other Echo models (i.e. Echo Plus, Echo) for left-right stereo, without having to immediately go out and buy another Studio. Also, because it is integrated into Studio's essentially flat top, the colored status light ring is easily visible when looking from above, but difficult to see when looking at unit from the side. If put on an eye-level shelf, you can barely see the light ring if you are sitting, and cannot see it at all if you are lying down.
title: It's very good.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Susn
content: Absolutely love, love, love this speaker!!  Incredible sound!
title: I love this speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shannon Lewis
content: I really liked my single echo studio and decided to get another to set up as a stereo pair.  I set it up and really enjoyed the sound quality UNTIL... horrible gaps ruin the transitions in Abbey Road / Dark Side of the Moon, etc.  NO GAPLESS PLAYBACK.  It's a catch-22 - you can get gapless playback by pairing bluetooth, but then no stereo.... stream over wifi, stereo sounds great, but agh... those gaps...
title: can't play gapless audio when stereo paired!!!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brett D. Nicholson
content: Barely sounds better if at all than the Echo. If it was priced for 85 then I might have kept it. Not near enough treble. Returned after a few days. It is also taking a very long time to get my return. It is July 4th today and I returned it June 22nd at UPS  it is showing that they have not received it. Amazon never takes this long. Getting frustrated
title: Too expensive for the sound quality and very slow return time.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Trevor Trent
content: I've had this for a couple weeks now.  All  in all I would say it's good.  I just have a couple issues.  First, the sound quality is good but still lacks.  I realize it's a $200 speaker, but i was anticipating a little more.  The bass isn't quote what I was hoping for. Two, it's bluetooth or optical in for the inputs and it doesn't come with an optical in cable. Third, if you change inputs to bluetooth, you can't get back to the optical in to use it as a soundbar without either unplugging and plugging back in the cable or resetting the whole device.  I heard that was supposed to change, but they've been saying that for quite some time.
title: Good but not quite there

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William G. Rushworth
content: I wanted to upgrade my first generation Echo to the latest and greatest model. So fat, I have been really happy. The bass is definitely tighter and more powerful and the treble sounds richer. It is quite a bit bigger and heavier so factor that in if you decide to purchase one. The Alexa app is as clunky as ever but adding the device was pretty easy. Overall, a definite improvement !
title: A definite upgrade !

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: A very disappointed customer
content: Don’t buy it it’s garbage
title: Don’t buy it it’s garbage

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott C Newell
content: The performance of the speaker is quite good, in line with the advertising. However there was annoying start in the bass when at lower volume. I checked with tech support who were helpful. They agreed with me that the static is an issue. Tech support authorized an exchange. The 2nd speaker had similar static issues but occurred with less frequency than the original speaker. I like the overall performance of the product in spite of the static issue. I’m hopeful they can find a fix.
title: Static in bass at low volume on both original and replacement echo studio.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Byron Rhodes
content: Movie theater style sound. I believe it would really be nice with to working in tandem. For a small room its perfect. Nice bass and beautiful highs. Update bought another one. Works fine in the fire family but don't understand why the 2 speakers cant work in tandem with digital out to one. Thinking of returning the 2nd one since only 1 will play with my ps4 and cable.
title: Fire home theater only.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Zayn
content: I dont care about alexa is vs siri etc etc... This review is simply for the ones who care about it’s audio quality vs the homepod. Homepod is by far superior with a deeper cleaner punchier bass, way better voice clarity, and just hits those instruments a whole lot better.
title: Sound Quality vs Homepod

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lee
content: It does have a good sound, but I'm afraid I can't give it has high praise as others. I use to listen to music when it was analog and through JBL speakers. Nothing better (fidelity). Anyway, Alexa was not that smart. I keep having to have adjust volume between tracks. So I have to keep asking Alexa to either raise the volume or lower it. If anyone knows how to remedy this I will change my rating. Apart from the speaker, Alexa still needs a lot of work. I have her hooked up to my fire stick 4k and she still can't carry out some pretty basics commands on the apps I loaded, e.g. YouTube. I'm going to keep this only because I may have a party and it is loud. I may one day buy some JBL's again but for now I'll keep the studio.
title: Sound uneven between tracks

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: K. C.
content: I bought it originally for the home theater feature with my fire cube. As a standalone echo device to listen to music, the sound is great, but im not sure you need that much response to play music in the living/family room, i think a regular echo would do as good as a job. My issue is the sync with the fire cube is not good. It is clunky to sync voices with tv providers or movies. The sound is not as good than sound bar and subwoofer through the fire cube. I even bought optical cables hoping that would be better. Summary As stand alone its good For home theater needs a lot of work
title: Good speaker, not good for home theater

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TFrancis
content: Wow !!  Amazing sound. I like that you can pair it with another set of speakers (echo only) but not that the two speakers need to be identical. I guess it makes sense. Without pairing to other speakers it sounds amazing. It can be added to a speaker group with dissimilar echo devices. Adds a tremendous deep rich sound with crisp base. Not muddy or over done on the lows. Very satisfying.
title: Very satisfying.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: moises and mom
content: the connection sound system option for home theater system only works with matching speackers. Like, I had to buy two studios and a studio bass amp to get the set. Was hoping that all of my alexa devices would connect for movie and tv play. Sadly not the case. they will all connect to play multi room music though. Hoping for an update!
title: Amazing sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cycloper
content: The first thing I noticed was that the voice pick up for commands was sharper than my old echo. The set up was almost totally intuitive and automated. I barely had to do anything to get the Studio up and running. The sound was so incredible that I had to get one for my girlfriend to put in her living room for entertaining company.
title: It has incredible sound quality and volume fills the room

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Phil
content: If you plan to use this for a home theater NO! If you plan to use this as a smart speaker for your kitchen or a small bed room. YES. If you plan to use this as a Bluetooth speaker for a television, NO!
title: Not made for suround sounds..

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tech
content: Frequently disconnects from fire tv. Can’t use it at all
title: POOR CONNECTIVITY TO FIRE TV

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ricardo arriaga
content: 2 echo studios Along with a 4k firestick setup as home theater. Excellent for what it is but in no way a replacement for Even a mid rage home theater in a box. For a condo or an apartment this is enough as long as you are not expecting high fidelity sound. Don’t get me wrong it sounds pretty darn good for what it is and serves its purpose 100%.
title: Good enough

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Britton Day
content: Sounds great but if you want home theater and then you have to buy two. This does not hook up with two echo dots to create home theatre, disappointing since there is no echo sub anymore. Also you have to yell at Alexa to get a response, not what I want to do to listen to music. All around with echo I am dissatisfied. For the money invested its not worth it. The app is near pointless and very basic.
title: Its a shame and now Im stuck. Buyers beware!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William J Carfagno
content: Fill a big area with rich sound. Deep base and great high end. Thinking of getting another for true stereo. Had a setup problem, tech support was great. They could not resolve, needed to research with a third party. Received return call exactly when promised. Problem was not with the Studio but my setup. Great product.
title: Full Rich Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KindleKent
content: The only downside is the woofer is so strong, it might shake or vibrate things on the same shelf, stand, etc.  I had it on my large glass and metal 3-shelf TV stand.  I had some pictures and some other knick-knacks on various shelves.  Had to move a few because the base from the studio was rattling them.
title: Sounds great.  Would not buy any other version anymore.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kerry W. SaLee
content: I ordered this as the main source of music for the whole family that would live in my kitchen. I ordered the Sonos one first in that speaker was all high range and middle. Then I ordered the speaker thinking it would have more bass which it did but I was still not happy as my echo show eight has better sound. I have Ordered the echo show 10.1 in hopes that it will be what I’m looking for
title: Very frustrated trying to find a music solution for whole family

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Harold Goff
content: Sound is perfection.  Vocals are pitch perfect and instruments are spot on. Crisp vocals and everything sounds as if you are there. Everyone hears differently, so unless you've had a hearing test recently confirming your "audiophile" ears are pitch perfect... do NOT listen to anyone! They sound great to me. Judge them yourself. I highly recommend the Echo Studio. Beautiful sounding music for your ears.
title: Beautiful sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andre
content: I’m an audio guy and I would recommend this to anyone I know and don’t know. I work in a warehouse and the sound carries about a good distance of the building. I’m very impressed. Not much impressed me, on a small scale, but this has a great sound. Might be a Christmas gift for my 3 sisters, aunt, 2 cousins and gf! The audio is awesome!
title: Bose alternative!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William R.
content: For me it's all about the bass! For it size the bass response of the Echo Studio is  equivalent to the little echo dot - that is not acceptable! I was very disappointed  when I activated my Echo Studio and did not get the sound I was looking for. hopefully Amazon can provide a subwoofer that is compatible with the Echo Studio.
title: Inadequate Bass Response!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jean Carlo
content: Amazing sounds, designed and ease of use and set up. Wish it was a little smaller though... but I would definitely recommend this over the Apple rival!!!
title: Amazing Sound!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: rjbmann
content: Sound quality is fantastic but as far as listening.... I need to repeat numerous times my request before Alexa attempts to respond. Then all I get is a spinning blue light. Works great if you push the action button and make a request.I have had no issues like this on my other Alexa devices. Love the sound quality for my music . Do not like the  issues with the Alexa response
title: Great product but

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: F. J. Ryan
content: Really torn on this product. I'm an early echo adopter and have purchased 7-8 since they came out. This is by far the most expensive, and capable. But it just doesn't seem capable enough to justify it's $169 price tag. I enjoy listening to it, and I'm going to keep it, but I'd feel a lot better if it was priced $40-$50 less.
title: Good, but not good enough for $169

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cooker
content: The sound from this Echo Studio is awesome. I have been using an Echo Dot (3rd generation) for music streaming — mostly Sirius XM stations. As good as the fidelity from the Echo Dot is, the Echo Studio blows the Dot away. Through the Alexa app, it has a Stereo Spatial Enhancement that fills the room with sound like adding additional speakers. Control (volume, station selection, pausing, etc.) is equally easy via either voice or through the app.
title: Awesome Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Randall Conrad
content: I was expecting this to have amazing sound based on all of the hype, when frankly it didn’t sound any better than the regular echo that I already own. Which is why I returned it
title: Not the great sound you’d expect

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MrMind Marcial
content: The product itself is amazing!  Amazing sound and  deep bass.  But... I ran into a problem where the damn thing is stuck with a SOLID green light (not flashing or spinning) I know what those are.  I contacted support.  And guess what?  They have no idea how to fix it!  Wonderful right? I wasted my time chatting with them.  So now I’m stuck with a round brick until I can fix it myself.
title: Amazing Sound..but

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Henry L. Blosser
content: We now have four echos.  When listening to our echo dots, the sound was not quite what we were looking for.  We already had a regular echo and were quite happy with it.  I wondered how much better the sound would be for an echo studio.  The sound is great.  The bass is quite good and we can enjoy any kind of music without sacrificing any range.  We are very happy with our Echo Studio.
title: Love My Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Miska the Amazonian
content: I wasn't sure what to expect with Alexa Studio, but this handy Hi-Fi device is quite the awesome compact Studio speaker.  The sound is incredible, with TONS of bass! Alexa can hear me just fine from across the room and even from another room if really required.  Nice little unit, good value for the money I feel!
title: SUPER NICE sounding speaker, really the best speaker in the home now!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Don A
content: The Echo Studio is a Great sounding speaker it has great mids and Highs the Lows are ok you would need a Sub woofer to get Better Low sound. The Mics for alexa are pretty good they can here me across the room. You would need two if you wanted stereo or Home Theater from the fire TV. Overall it's a Good speaker!
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Becky L. Pearce
content: The Echo Studio plays constantly. It has the best audio quality. We have a Tap, an Echo and a Riva. The Studio far exceeds our other devices. Looking forward to many years of great music.
title: Echo Studio is a must for any music loving family.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: manfredkwg
content: Pro: Great sound compared to other echo devices. Con: Needs a way to select input source. It has a optical input but you cannot choose source, like telling Alexa to play music vs the optic input device. I had to unplug and/or reset the device constantly for it to work with an optical connection. I ended up not using the optical input... Which means I need another speaker. Another con is that it looks pretty ugly. No sandstone option... Why did they try to make it look like a huge dot? Overall if you're replacing an echo or echo dot, this sounds way better. But do NOT expect to use this as a sound bar (or other media connected speaker) AND a free standing echo device.
title: Issues with optical in.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bigbobby827
content: Good sound quality, but can’t compete with Apple’s HomePod. To get that sort of sound, you need to subscribe to Amazon Music Unlimited to get the HD sound. That’s the only way it can compete sound-wise tO the HomePod; but, a major sound advance over the Echo. Alexa integration is seamless, tho.
title: It’s really good, but.....

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: NICK
content: It’s a great speaker sound is awesome , but I brought it thinking I cane create home Theater by connecting the studio to my echo plus.  YOU CANT DO THAT you need 2 of the same devices So I am disappointed, and it doesn’t make sense that you can’t Create a home theater connecting the echo studio and echo plus together they just want you to spend extra money to have two of the same devices
title: Good  but disappointed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mountain Aviator
content: I have linked it with the Amazon bass. Each room has echo units in them. If I use the Everywhere command the sound is OK. But alone the sound is so so. I was hoping for a wonderful, deep sound that would rock my world. It gets confused time to time. The other echos will continue to play but the studio drops out. After a few minutes it comes back on.
title: It works OK, nothing to get excited about!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: S. allen
content: The Echo Subwoofer sounds better. The only reason I got the echo studio is beachside the subwoofer is no longer available and thought it would be comparable. There is too much treble even when treble and mods are turned all the way down and bass all the way up. I would rather have more subwoofers than the echo studio
title: Not as good as the echo subwoofer

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B V
content: echo sudio is not compatable with fire tv i bought 1 year ago. i feel amazon should have warned me of this before i purchased it since they have a record. i wanted to use as a supplemental speaker and this is not possible. i also feel the sound is not a major improvement over original so what is the point. disappointed
title: not compatable with fire tv

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TEDdotcom
content: Underwhelming. Had so much potential but speaker didn’t deliver the claimed Dolby Atmos sound quality. Tried it for a week and a half listening to Amazon Music 3D audio tracks and various HD songs. Used Spotify Premium on it too. The VIZIO SmartCast Crave Pro SP70-D5 speaker sounds much, much better than this. I will be waiting for the second iteration of the Echo Studio though.
title: Underwhelming Speaker. Waiting for Echo Studio 2.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Susan
content: We've had both Echo 1 and 2 - this is way better. We have an open kitchen / dining room and this is in the center. Covers both rooms great
title: Big improvement from Echo 2

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andre Almodovar
content: My Echo Studio is the best speaker in my home. For only 200 bucks you dominate your room by filling it with a deep bass roar along with the clearest mid ranges and highs!
title: Alexa is the Goddess of Thunder!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeffrey H.
content: I have 2 Echo Studio Speakers Hooked up thru my 4K Fire Stick. Its setup for my Home Theater, And since These speakers support the Dolby Atmos and 3D Sound. It is Awesome, The sound is Incredible the 3D music is also Awesome. I'm Super Happy. It was so easy to setup thru the 4K Fire Stick which you have to use with these Speakers, Well worth it. Movies sound just like it does in the theater. Every different sound coming from a different part of the room. Fire Sstivk works great and has very fast processing. The bass is Incredibly good Especially when the Dolby Atmos is being used in a Movie. For the size of these Studio Speakers they are a real bargain. You really need 2 of them to get the full sound Capabilities.
title: Echo Studio Speakers and Fire Stick 4K

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Philip Musgrave
content: I had really high hopes for this speaker, I have had 9 different echo devices (multiples of first 2 generation dots, first two generation echo's, echo tap) and this is by far the worst with me having to repeat myself to ensure it has heard me.  The sound is good, but not as rich as the sonos.  I find myself wondering if I should return it because I'm just not feeling like I got $200 worth out of it every time I have to repeat "Alexa, what's the definition of insanity?"
title: Meh, should've been better

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Uncle John
content: Sound is great I have 2 units hooked to an echo sub and they sound great. I was going to use them for a sound system with my 4k stick but, I heard about to many problems one being sound syncing. That would annoy  the heck out of me  so I just use them with my Amazon HD music and they sound amazing.
title: Awesome sound easy pairing with sub.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sockster
content: You are enjoying the echo studio as an upgrade to our original Amazon echo. The sound is good but just not sensational expensive for what it is.
title: Good sound. Not incredible

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Timothy J. Vogel
content: I read reviews here where people said that the Studio sounds like the regular Echo. Not a chance. This thing is way better than that. I tried it in the middle of my living room, and it sounded fantastic, but I had to move it out of the way and onto my desk. Still awesome. I think I'll get another.
title: Super good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Martin T. Leonard
content: I gave this to a relative as a Birthday present. I set it up and made sure it was working. I just went over to her house and found it doesn't work, she says it never did! She apparently tried it months ago, it didn't work and never used it. I just spent an hour trying to get sound out of it and zero, nothing. It's apparently just a paper weight now.
title: Absolutely no sound comes out of it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fred O.
content: It won't play on any of my Apple devices. I guess this is Bezo's Revenge? I went through a number of tech experts at Amazon, only to be transferred un-knowingly to a non-Amazon support, who started to wreak havoc on my Mac i.e deleting important personal files, movies. This tech support would not help till I agreed to pay them $189.00 and to subscribe to their IT support. I've been a customer of Amazon since 2003, I love Amazon Prime and every other service they provide. So let the buyer beware. Oh it does tell me the weather forecast.
title: Only plays on my earphone out put on my iMac

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Satisfied in SC
content: I purchased two Echo Studio smart speakers right before Prime Day while they were marked down AND still available.  After I set up the two speakers and stereo-paired them, I added my Echo Show (2nd Gen) to the group to create a whole new sound system for my living room.  The sound quality is amazing, especially when I’m streaming 3D or Ultra HD music.  Songs that I have been listening to for years now sound better than ever before!  I also used a Toslink to Mini Toslink digital optical cable to connect one of the Echo Studio speakers to my LG smart TV, so now I have the equivalent of a TV sound bar along with great streaming audio from Amazon Music HD, etc.  Christmas came early this year!
title: A definite 5-star rating!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Paul B.
content: I had the original Alexa Gen 1, but it was stolen from me in a house clean-up by one of the crew members!  This one has a better depth of sound and a larger footprint, which is with a Pro or Con.  Still waiting on the Subwoofer to be back in stock as it's a little lean on the bass side, but not bad at all!
title: Studio Version on Alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Patrick Oliver
content: Really keen to love this product. Have it paired with a second studio and when they work with my 4K TV its an incredible experience. Dolby Atmos, really detailed, amazing, 3D sound. But product is still very glitchy and buggy. Often cuts out for no reason. Seems to get overloaded easily. I'm sure the bugs will be worked out. In the meantime we have a product that allows us to glimpse what could be...
title: When it works correctly an excellent product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Retired Michigander
content: What an improvement in sound quality!  We listen to music a lot and now do so on the Studio because of its ease of use and size.  The Dots are nice for the commands, info, etc, but the sound quality was just ok (what else could you expect from such a small speaker?).  The Studio is a big improvement.
title: Nice sounding

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dan J. Matthews
content: Able to work better by itself and have not tried to match it with other devices yet or paid for 3D music, whatever that is
title: Light years better than the sub woofer

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brain King
content: 3D tracks from Amazon Music sound amazing. Probably too much speaker for the sized room (home office), but I am liking Amazon Music HD so much, that I haven't used my Spotify account for quite awhile. Sounds so much better than the plain old Echo 2nd Gen I had before (traded in for $30 credit).
title: Fantastic audio quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Warden
content: Echo’s just keep getting better. The sound quality in this newest echo is amazing. We have it in our family room. It was also play HD music. Just love this new one
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David from T.O.
content: Excellent product, excellent price at $200. From the perspective of an average Joe who is no audiophile but likes music (and is overall generally a snob), this is a great product. I put the Echo Studio in the living room and it is able to fill that part of the house with quality sound even at high volumes. Connect it to Spotify and off you go. Very impressed.
title: Very impressed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jason W.
content: Definitely worth the money. Prior to the studio. I owned a Bose speaker that I returned because the sound quality was not very good. The studio to my surprise blew the Bose away.. I paired this with a Echo sub and will purchase another studio from even better audio. This is a fantastic set up and would even make for a good home theater system.
title: Fantastic speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Luichi Tejeda
content: Excellent choice to have good sound quality in a small, handle but, the best thing, intelligent device
title: A complete intelligent device

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C. Thomas
content: Very happy with the studio. Gave three stars on integration because I assumed it would integrate with anything Alexa but I guess not. Sound is great and the extra bass is a Very welcomed.
title: Nice little hifi upgrade.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jeffrey greene
content: This is the best Alexa speaker I've ever had! I wish I could buy four more and have them do dolby/dts surround but I think that's beyond its capabilities. Maybe in Echo Studio 2.0 we'll get surround sound! I am also using the Echo Studio as a speaker for my desktop pc and its way better than the last pair I had for the pc.
title: The best Alexa speaker ever!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steve Barduson
content: Did not sync with my LG OLED TV. Need to use my 4K fire stick I had for my older TV. That was a deal breaker for me. I wanted the Atmosphere sound but it is only possible when using a fire stick. Plus with the zombie apocalypse going on I couldn’t reach anyone to help make this worked. Packed it all back up and sent it back.
title: Must use fire stick to get Atmos sound!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cdburns123
content: I wanted to use this instead of a sound bar and it has worked out great!  We were watching a show we always watched and my wife said, where is that music coming from.  It was from the show, we had just never heard it before because it was so low.  Thinking about adding another to group.
title: Very Nice Addition

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Siva Shankaran Vasanth
content: Does amazon make any money of this speaker! The speaker provides  a 3D sound experience if placed at the right spot. The speaker is one of the best devices amazon has made in my opinion. It’s a steal!!! Love the sound, the bass effect and it’s humble looks.
title: Humble but mighty in sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Omar
content: I didn't expect a super sound quality, but I think the audio controls could be better & are very limited, 3D sound is not good for music. What I did expect was for this to connect easily via bluetooth with my TV. Unfortunately I could not get it to work yet. TV shows the pairing, Studio makes a connection noise but the sound doesn't come through. It woks very well with my Iphone though. Not unhappy with it , but a little disappointed. Still, I think it sounds better than similarly priced offers.
title: Decent sound for an all-in -one speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Xxx-xxx-xxx
content: The Sound is incredible truly a Experience That is remarkable good sound Quality and tone pitch  and  Clear and  distinguish -
title: A Music orchestra  .

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: El Kabong
content: Besides upgrading from my Echo Dot, I also eliminated my external computer speakers and now also utilize the Echo Studio as my primary speaker. Definitely impress with this speaker but disappointed that I have to pay additional $$ for Amazon HD Music streaming to take full advantage of the speaker's full capabilities.
title: Great speaker but more $ for HD streaming music?

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fidel Quintero
content: Great sounding speaker, still fully functional as an Echo device. A bit bigger than what I thought so I had to place it in different spot than my previous Echo Device, but the sound is worth it.
title: Awesome sound, still an great Echo device

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shawn Richeson
content: Home-run y'all.  If you need an HD hands-free digital assistant that listens, does what she is told, and then some, this is the gadget.  Get the Amazon music package and you will love the sound as well.  For only $13.00 a month, it is not worth stealing MP3's off the internet.
title: LOVE IT

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Julio Michel
content: The fact that I can't create groupings of speakers the way I want - is ridiculous ,  That Alexa goes offline or sleep at random is unacceptable - Still learning how to get over some of these hurtles - but for the price - these issues should have been resolved prior to going to market.  Over all - it is a a good starting point that with updates I hope will get much better
title: It is a good start - but the technology has a long way to go

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Vaderkosh
content: Excellent upgrade from the standard Echo. Incredible crisp sound and it fills the room perfectly at any volume.
title: Outstanding Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Debra Cheehy
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I love the sound quality of the Echo Studio.  Paired with my Echo It produces fantastic sound in the room. With all the Amazon Echo features this is a great add on to the house.  Set p is plug and play along with the Alexa App on your phone.
title: Great sound with all the Amazon Echo features

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: penguinpower
content: Good sound and features. I just feel like for $200 the sound quality could be better at higher volumes. I've spent the same amount on other speakers that were much clearer at higher volumes. Don't get me wrong this is much better than an echo dot but might be better off going with something else and using bluetooth from alexa to stream.
title: Great features so so audio quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeff Conaway
content: This replaces a Sonos Move that we had on our deck. The Sonos would lose connectivity so often it became useless. It wouldn't hold the connection with the Sonos soundbar or subwoofer and it would interfere with other Alexa devices in the house. The Echo Studio solved our issues. I have never tried to connect it to the other Sonos equipment we have but I have never lost a connection, it doesn't interfere with my other devices and it sounds great.  I'm sticking with Alexa. No muss, No fuss.
title: Always Connected

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jjsink
content: Wish it sounded better. I was a bit disappointed when playing it in a speaker group and it didn't sound as good as the other speaker in the group, 3rd generation Echo. I tried the sample 3D sound clip and immediately killed it. The selection sounded like a bunch of screaming demons.
title: Doesn't sound quite as good as my 3rd generation Echo speaker.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Marianne
content: They really are nice - we have 3 pairs in 3 rooms.  They help my elderly mother hear her TV better than her doctor-ordered TV-Dex hearing aid sound streamer which sends the sound directly into her hearing aids.  The sharp clarity filling the space is much easier for her to hear; the Dolby Atmos sound is really outstanding, especially in our large open area!  You really don’t even need a subwoofer.  Sounds very good for everything we play - TV news, Amazon Music HD, music videos, movies, etc..  I am impressed in part with the value for the cost, as I have a pair of high end speakers which cost many times as much, and don’t sound that much better than the Echo Studios.
title: Amazon Echo Studio playing Dolby Atmos sound is the ticket!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: kay Perkins
content: I have an echo so took my echo studio out of the box plugged it in. Waited a few seconds for it to play it start up sound.  And that was all it took for set up.
title: Easiest thing to set up

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom Gillard
content: Unreal bass sound!  No woofer needed! I had to go into the Alexa app and turn the bass down. Unreal bass from this little thing. I set up two on each side of my LR and with the app I made them work in stereo with each other. Super, super happy. Be sure to go in to the app and set your preference for bass, mid, and treble. 🐸
title: I was worried about the BASS...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gene
content: I love this. It adjusted itself as far as sound in 3D when setting up. Easy to set up other dots as left and right if needed. Sounds are awesome almost as good as the speaker I paid over 500 for from Bose. Will definitely consider replacing some of the dots I have if the price falls again I bought this during Prime Day.
title: Product Review

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Turner Media Sales
content: Had issues but the sound quality is really what made me give up. If they improve the sound I would put one in every room. Come on you guys "can do it"
title: poor sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chris Ruskie
content: As long as you are ok with the confines of mainly working with Amazon music it's an excellent speaker.  It works with other services but not as easy to use as with Amazon music.  The HD and 3D audio songs sound really good, the speaker fills space nicely with balanced sound.  I don't have any other $1,000 or $10,000 sound system to compare it to, but it certainly serves it's purpose for me.
title: Excellent speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott Holtz
content: I am using this as a soundbar for an Insignia Fire TV via Bluetooth and I could not be happier. I live in a small-ish space and wanted some deeper sounds than my other Alexa devices. I have one in every room and this is by far the best sound for the price I have found. Very happy with this purchase.
title: It has trouble hearing my voice over its own awesome sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Daniel Castro
content: I was a bit skeptical about buying a speaker that at first looked to good to be true.. yes i watched all the videos and reviews and fell in for it. Honestly greatest speaker available right now. 3-D Audio is still quite new and not much is out there for it but it definitely brings audio to a a complete different level. This speaker is mind blowing. The bass is ridiculous and keeps the music clean and crisp. I am in love with this speaker..
title: I still cant Believe it!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: FG
content: Finally!  I have been looking for the right sound system.  I wanted small but powerful with clear rich sound...and Echo Studio delivers it all.  And when you move it from room to room it adjusts to the acoustics! No matter where I use it it sounds awesome!!! I wish I could give it more than five stars
title: Best sound system! Thank you Amazon!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bestbit
content: It’s a bit bigger than I expected but looks good and sounds very good. My brother and I bought if for our Dad, who loves classical music. The separation is incredible. You hear each instrument so vividly. When we pull into his driveway these days, he’s usually got the music booming and he’s loving life (at 80 years old) just that much more!!
title: Worthy of being called Premium

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Hamesh Shahani
content: would not connect to apple music properly. would not play my apple music playlists. Spent much time trying to set it up and it to play apple music... should not be this hard. Additionally, if you use as bluetooth speaker to stream from phone, cannot add another bluetooth speaker with this method. for me useless as someone who uses apple music primarily and looking for a multiple speaker set up. For Amazon Music users can imaging would be a better experience.
title: poor apple music support

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Skipper
content: I bought to use primarily as an Alexa enabled speaker to use on the porch and deck when entertaining. It works fine for that. It doesn't always hear me when the music is playing though. The other Alexa's do a better job of that. For the price, I probably should have gone with 2 Alexa's spaced apart.
title: Good speaker. Pricey.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: WD
content: It covers more space in the house than the echo dot; so we hear it better in other rooms near by without it shouting at us at its own location.  That is impressive.  We still have more to learn about it, but its initial purpose works great
title: sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Samuel A.
content: Little background..i have had an echo since 1st generation. Love it big fan.the only reason i dropoed to 4 stars is that i dont kniw that the size and quality of the studio echo warrants the design.  For the larger foot print and price tag etc...i dont feel like its equally advanced in the delivery.  With that being said its still amazing..i jyst comparing to my other echo.
title: Is bigger better?

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gary M. Gibson
content: I like the treble and midrange but was expecting more bass. Create software update to increase the bass.
title: Good speaker but needs more bass.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: L. Pollara
content: I bought my first Echo in pre-sale.  Since then I have this Echo Studio, an Echo, 3 Dots and a Tap. Beside the wealth of information I get daily, I now get really good music quality as well. I would recommend Echo especially the Studio version if you enjoy music.
title: WOW

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Eddy N. Lopez Frias
content: The sound quality Is great, if you’re planning to use it with Bluetooth or WIFI it is great!, But when using it in Aux in mode the sound complete cuts off mid movie and it is really annoying, I’ve noticed the issue happening a lot during quiet scenes or when the movie is paused for like 5 seconds, the echo just dies and won’t turn on unless you replug the optical cable, so if you are planing to use this as a Sound Bar please NO!, stay away! Unless the issue is fixed which it hasn’t and I’ve been using it since December of 2019.
title: Excellent sound, but terrible as a Sound Bar replacement

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Hermanji
content: This is exactly the speaker you would hope would flagship the Alexa speaker line.  The base and volume missing from the other single speakers is front and center here.  The microphones are also more sensitive, and of course it comes with a built in hub.  Living single is not living alone with Alexa around so indulge and enjoy.
title: I'm glad I waited for this

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William Muntner
content: Only brought for 3d music sound quality not so special and barely any rock and roll no Pink Floyd 3d songs to choose from. Only 1 3d rock playlists.  I called to complain claimed Rock and roll 3d songs being added. FALSE! No Yes No Asia groups that are made for 3d. Do not buy if expecting a good selection of 3d music
title: Not enough 3D content hardly any Rock and Roll

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dragula
content: The system works ok with certain fireTV apps and not so great with others.  I get constant sound syncing issues with non-amazon apps.  I use two echo studios for theater sound and have another echo plus.  It worked together for awhile then stopped working together.  I have reset the systems over and over again.  It's always a shot in the dark when I want to listen to Spotify.  Sometimes the music plays and other times it's silent.  I wish there was a better integration system with using multiple Amazon echo products + FireTV without having to buy $100+ equipment.  At this point I should have gotten a regular home theater speaker setup.
title: If you use more than one studio with other Alexa Echos FireTv, you're going to have a bad day.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Larry
content: I am a believer. This speaker sounds fantastic, I have owned mostly Harman Kardon  Onyx. This speaker does more than compete , even my significant other notices the sound quality and that’s a big plus. I did have some problems with my sync to Apple Music, and the tech department was less than helpful. I was able to figure it out although I almost returned it. All in all very happy with the sound.
title: Great Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeffrey S. Schweitzer
content: It’s a good product. The integration with smart devices like Hue isn’t easy or perfect; getting it to understand scenes and settings from Hue is finicky. It tries to sell me things a bit too often. But being able to ask for music, make purchases, etc is a great convenience. Sound quality is good.
title: Good product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Janice C.
content: Well, my original Echo stopped functioning. So, after ordering and returning a Show, I purchased this. This sounds so good! I can see why some have purchased 2 plus the sub to make a stereo sound system. Easily handles loud volume and it has very nice bass for a small device. Small is relative here as I was surprised how large and how heavy it is compared to my original Echo. Incidentally, it does everything else an Echo device is supposed to do and does it very well. This one’s a keeper.
title: I love this device!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Trent
content: Sounds amazing in my living room, easy to set up. Only draw back is that it does not have AirPlay 2 compatibility so if you are using an iphone, you have to do everything by voice which is kind of a pain, but the sound quality rocks.
title: Sounds great, traded out from a HomePod and dont regret it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevin R.
content: I am a huge Alexa Echo fan, period.  And I really enjoy the Echo Studio's sound quality.  That said, I was hoping for a more powerful sound.  In fact, I've been on a quest to upgrade the sound - I do like my music to be loud and clear in the house - and was certain that this going to do the trick.  It's gotten me closer, but, still not there . . . . .
title: Nice sound, but, without much power.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James Andrew
content: After a week of owning this Echo Studio, I am very pleased with its sound and performance. I purchased a optical cable to use with my Samsung television. Great bass and good treble performance too.I may purchase another one soon for stereo. I recommend this.A+ transaction.
title: Great sound and performance.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mr Benz
content: The sound factor is truly great!  It will adjust to the acoustics of the room!  IT WILL SUPPORT YOUR APPLE MUSIC!
title: This is truly a smart speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andrea
content: I love this speaker so much, I purchased another one and the sub woofer! It was an easy set up through WiFi and Bluetooth. It sound on my computer is awesome... I have an old Bose system on my TV set in my bedroom and I’m patiently waiting for it to die so I can do the same thing! Awesome!
title: Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KTG
content: Integrated Alexa kept stopping music playback regardless of whether router was on 2.4 or 5.0 GHz band. Often did not respond to voice commands just gave a glowy circle. My echo dots perform without flaw so I'm a bit disappointed and will return it.  Good sounding speaker tho.
title: Intermittent playback, Alexa often confused

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gregory
content: They price on this is hefty for quality sound. The sound quality isn't significantly different from my previous echo from a few years ago, back when the only choices were "Echo" and "Echo Dot". If I could go back in time I could save about $90 by not going for this supposedly premium version.
title: Not quite what you pay for.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom Holmes
content: Studio sounds every bit as good as any one of our Samsung Soundbars.
title: Spectacular Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jordan r
content: Ah spent over ah weeks time of  alexa telling me.. hmm ah don't know what went wrong...or hmm something went wrong. ..and im standing there like an idiot' thinking im somehow supposed to resolve this ?when ah don't know what the problem is...7 days  it did this ...soo ah cant do that right now anymore... so packed it up went to the grocery store walked up to ah stranger handed it to him..and fiona appled and said "this is bulls***!@#$%" said thanks and walked away..in the  mean time instead of being productive ah was talking 2 a speaker...
title: True story

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: L. A. Walling
content: After a few days, I returned this. I had no trouble pairing with my Fire Stick and the HD music sounded pretty good. However, it would take about 30 seconds for the Studio sound to come on when watching a show and sometimes it cut in and out.  Sound wasn’t as dynamic as I had hoped.
title: Not as dynamic as I had hoped

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steve Cas
content: Its great, awesome actually! Although it was supposed to come with free Hue light bulbs, it didn't but thats on Amazon,  never heard back about them. But the Echo Studio is incredible. Great Awsome sound, I've been using it alot more than my Denon X3500 lately. I Love my Denon, I'm just say I've been using the Echo because its a new toy, the sound of the Echo is incredible and I have running everything in my entertainment system. Get it, put on some Pink Floyd and let sounds fill your room!
title: Wicked Awesome sound!! Crisp n clear Pink Floyd all day!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kris Nandury Jr
content: Synchronous paring between two Studios and a 4K TV Stick - can control each with the other.  Imagine asking Alexa to play a song on the speaker and seeing the lyrics on the TV... and then hear exceptional Dolby Atmos level sound with what is playing on the television.  Stereo sound is fantastic and Alexa is extremely responsive.  Bravo.
title: Excellent pairs!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kishan M.
content: Echo Studio sounds excellent, the speaker is easy to set up and Alexa can hear you from across a room.
title: Premium Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KARL C LHERISSON
content: Great audio and easy setup.  The only gripe is trying to locate which songs in the Amazon music library are recorded in Ultra HD.  Haven’t used the smart home hub functionality yet but I’ll update this review once completed.
title: Great sound and easy setup

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jim Ackert
content: The sound quality is excellent. When the unit calibrates for the room acoustics, it plays a 3D sound file that sounds awesome. But playing back Pandora music stations, it doesn’t sound much better than the Echo Gen 3. This device really needs the Amazon HD stream to make it shine.
title: Nice unit, good value, needs Amazon HD stream to really stand out.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Thomas
content: Everything about this speaker is great, except one major issue. When paired with a 4k Firestick I continually have sync issues. It varies from app to app so you can't use the delay feature. Maybe with the next version the integration will be better, but for now I would suggest getting a separate soundbar.
title: Not ready for market

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: E. Shaw
content: Sounds great if you're jamming...however for normal everyday listening there isn't enough thump with that speaker alone.  Sending it back...not enough low end range.
title: Base is not very responsive at less than half volume.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Don A. Eckert
content: This unit is everything I was looking for and more. The sound quality is exactly what I thought it would be. I use it to connect my firestick 4K so I can get my TV through it. My movies sound great. This was definitely worth the purchase and I will be purchasing another one as well.
title: Great Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Undefeatable Shiflers
content: A single echo can be used for blue tooth streaming, but not two echo's paired in stereo, or three with sub. Amazon needs to do a software upgrade so you can have that and stream your files to it. Works fine with amazon music and sirius, but it appears that amazon wants to keep you on amazon music, and not allow you to stream your files to a three speaker system that cost me 600 dollars. That is not fair, please upgrade the software.
title: Two studio's paired in stereo with sub cannot be used for blue tooth streaming....

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Taylor Foster
content: The speaker have an average sound quality, voice recognition is below par compare to first gen Echo.
