There is an annoyed announcing message everytime bluetooth device connect to (can't be turn off).  Bluetooth get disconnect intermittenly (not sure if the problem of just a deffective unit).  I have to returned the unit because can't stand the annoyed message (now connecting your device xyz...such and such).  This happend quite offent in the midle of the night all on it own.
title: An·noyed announcing connect device via bluetooth.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: S. W. Graves
content: I am still evaluating the “Studio” I suppose I am comparing it to Bose “Wave” devices. Thus far, no issues. I can’t tell a lot of difference between standard audio stations and the Amazon Ultra HD. I will revise the review as soon as I have time to give it a full test run.
title: The Jury Is Still Out...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dennis Brooks
content: This speaker is really excellent.  It has nice bass sounds, adapts to the space it's in, and Amazon support is quick and good.  Only thing I don't know is how giftable it is, really.  That all depends really on what you want to spend for a gift.
title: Great sound and great price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PrairieGirl
content: Terrific sound - which was my main purpose for purchase. I wanted a "stereo" quality sound and was torn between this and a well-known much more pricey option. I am so glad I went with the Studio. Not to mention, it's just a fun item to have! We regularly use to play games, which there are many to choose from
title: I get more use from my Alexa Studio than anything else

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andrew Ritschel
content: For the last forty years I have considered myself to be some what of an Audiophile.  I have a very discerning ear for music reproduction and I've spent many thousands of hours listening to high-end electronics and loudspeakers.  This compact speaker took me by surprise even though I had read many of the online reviews before purchasing it.  For the price...it's a real bargain! AR-NJ
title: Amazing Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donna Bailey
content: I also own a 50" Toshiba Fire TV 4K and was hoping to link the new echo studio to that TV. I was disappointed to find that the Toshiba Fire TV 4K is not compatible to use echo devices in home theater mode. I do have other TV's for which I use Firestick 4K and this works great on those. The sound is very clear and compared to my gen 2 echo, the studio is in another league for richness and clarity. Would definitely purchase more echo studios if they only worked in home theater mode for the Toshiba FireTV's. Amazon please upgrade the OS on the Fire TV's to include pairing echo's in home theater mode.
title: Sure wish this paired with Toshiba Fire TV 4K in theater mode!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R. Lockhart
content: Well first of all let me say , I feel that the Echo Studio has VERY GOOD Sound, but when I played Rocket Man by Elton John in 3D, I was blown away. My only problem is trying to figure out how to make it work as far as with my TV, Blu-ray Player.
title: High Hopes

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andy Marx
content: I've bought numerous Alexa-enabled speakers, including the Sonos One, the Bose 300, in addition to the Apple HomePod. The Amazon Studio is without a doubt better than all of them. The sound is incredible. Don't hesitate to try it yourself.
title: As Good As Apple's HomePod!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DJames
content: This sounds amazing especially with the echo sub.  I’ve had some issues with my Fire Cube losing sound for a few minuets, or until I regroup it with the studio and sub. However that problem seems to have largely gone away, so I’m guessing a firmware update has addressed it. I am planning to purchase more of these for my home.
title: Sounds great with each sub.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kameron Clay
content: Worth the money! Great sound. Alexa works even when the volume is all the way up.
title: Sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MLF
content: The studio, in the den, does not pick up commands as well as the Show 8 does in the open kitchen so the kitchen tends to answer and provide music playback although I’d prefer that would not happen. Also the sound quality is not on par with, say, Sonos UNLESS you pay the premium Amazon 3D music and I prefer not to fall into that trap. Would I buy it again? Probably not
title: Disappointing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: G. C.
content: This thing is badass. Great sound and control of other devices. I’ll be adding another to my home as well.
title: Great buy.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JP
content: Unfortunately I’ve been living with this for a year. It very often does not hear us. it’s microphone is somehow not sensitive enough compared to our other Alexis. I believe there was a speaker out when we got it but I wasn’t sure the sound just did not seem very balanced but after about five months The sound quality kept deteriorating now the speakers are just raspy and some songs that seem to hit a certain frequency play so poorly we can’t even listen to them.
title: Do not waste your money on this.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Primary
content: Nailed it. Use this as a home theater speaker for my FireTV. Can also be paired for voice control while acting as a speaker. Very good Atmos playback.
title: Nailed it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Victor Vazquez
content: Superb sound quality. Better than two 3rd gen Echo Plus in stereo mode. Then only con, not available in sand stone. The setup is a breeze. I would recommend this speaker over the 3rd gen Echo Plus. I look forward on getting another to have them in stereo mode.
title: Better than two 3rd gen Echo Plus in stereo mode.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Melvin Maldonado
content: The sound is clear and well balance, is easy to set up, but is not as loud as I expected. I put it in my home office which is pretty small and even there the ECHO STUDIO doesn’t feel loud at all. If you like your music loud like me, then look for another speaker.
title: Not as loud as advertised

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard R. Casper
content: Came with a light bulb that doesn't work.  It's so frustrating.  They send a free light bulb that requires you to purchase a bridge for.  What a scam.
title: Phillips light bulb is horrible.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chef Gil Evans
content: I didn't expect such a huge unit, with such amazing sound. I purchased this for outside use. The sound is awesome being outside. The only issue is, when you have the unit cranked up,  good luck with Siri hearing your commands. Other than that, I love this.
title: Amazing sound, issues with sound recognition when volume is high.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Robby Alexander
content: This speaker is amazing. Good bass plus clarity. Alexa is not that intelligent though. Pair it through your phones Bluetooth to play your already purchased music with having to pay for a subscription. Once paired via Bluetooth you can command Alexa to play your purchase Apple Music!
title: I was shocked at the sound output

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jason
content: I felt this device (echo studio) was very limited and only gave rich sound through the amazon music app. I have a fire stick and a fire cube and four echo dots. For the price i paid i was expecting rich sound with using the fire cube which i felt was limited to adding additional speakers. Also the echo studio's maximum volume was not as loud as i expected! I am very happy with the four echo dots i purchased and they preform well for the price. Will be returning this item (echo studio) ! For 200 this speaker is useless!
title: Limited on volume, sound quality was good but accessibility to fire cube very limited!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donna B. Kinder
content: We were amazed at the full quality of sound from our new Studio. The music library is fantastic. With the availability of SiriusXM, my we can now listen to sporting events not available on TV. Keep those innovations coming but it will be hard to improve Studio.
title: Our new go-to for music and more.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yojan
content: Me encanto para mi mejor inversión muy buena calidad de sonido me gustaría comprar otro debe ser espectacular 2 juntos lo recomiendo
title: Mi echo preferido 5 estrellas

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: joselobo
content: great sound, outdoors on my patio. i like the Alexa integration & WiFi sound quality. also, can use Bluetooth for access by my Android phone & PC running Windows-10 Media Player. very happy with this. in considered comparable Bose & Sonos, glad i chose this one.
title: great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Denny Lawson
content: Solid build provides a good sound at all levels. I was pleased with my 3 other Alexa/Echo devices. The Studio is worth  the extra cost to increase the richness of the music. It is our primary source of music playback in our 1000 sq. ft. open floor plan LR/DR/Ki
title: Great balanced sound at low levels and more

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Christopher J.
content: The Echo studio is an amazing device the sound quality and base that comes out of this thing has me shocked every single time I use it. Voice recognition works for me even when I’m rocking out. My only complaint is that when I open the Alexa app to adjust the speaker volume the music will skip for a split second not a huge deal and definitely not a reason to skip out on the studio
title: Huge sound in a small package

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: george robinson
content: it is essentially an echo w/ a small built-in subwoofer. the sound is certainly superior to an echo alone. I use mine in an area that takes the place of where I had an echo to make the sound in my house more subversive when I tell echo to play music on the "everywhere group". I used the displaced echo to create a stereo sub pair elsewhere. I wold imagine that creating a stereo sub pair w/ 2 studios would sound great.
title: if you can't afford an echo AND the subwoofer...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B B
content: The design is fairly bad. It’s very difficult to see the light on the unit to tell if it’s hearing your commands. We have the Studio in the same exact space as the old gen 1 Echo used to be and we almost have to shout sometimes for it to register.
title: Bad design

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: E. Curtiss
content: The sound on this is amazing! My son in law purchased this I was so impressed I bought one for myself it just fills my home with beautiful sound. I don’t see how anyone could give this a bad report unless somehow they received a faulty product.
title: It’s got that great deep sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jason chappel
content: The studio performed beautifully! As far as sound quality it is above what was expected. Just out of curiosity I linked it to my tv via Bluetooth, it had issues lining up the audio and video as expected. I recommend using the optical input.
title: Beautiful addition to the Alexa family!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Robb
content: This speaker is built high quality, it's heavy, it's beefy, it sounds like butter, beats like honey, total bang for the buck, best deal in town, homerun, no brainer.  You won't regret it 👍 Plus, the Alexa thing is pretty fin cool.  She sounds hot, lol.
title: I bought one more!  May buy another still!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary C
content: The sound quality is excellent. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
title: Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fritz kuhlman
content: The sound quality was quite disappointing. After all the reviews, I was expecting a step up from my Echo+, it wasn't. My Echo+ has better bass. I really thought about returning the Echo Studio but decided to keep it. The hype isn't reality, this thing is average.
title: Disappointing sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Frank J. Winters
content: It took a couple of days for the Echo to settle in -- we needed to find a good place for it. Once we did it sounds great and Alexa finds most music we ask for -- using apps I forgot I had in some cases. All in all an excellent experience (after a couple of weeks) and the price is super.
title: Excellent sound and voice control

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C. Alaimo
content: This speaker is the Bomb! Excellent sound, easy set up! No issues whatsoever!  Love it! Another great Echo device!
title: The Bomb!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: A. Product Reviewer
content: My son tested it head to head against his Apple Home Pod (the one that's about the same size) and they came up on par with each other. Minor differences here and there, but in the end it's really about which eco-system you want to be in.
title: I love it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Allan Kolbes
content: Set up in under 5 minutes. At first the sound was odd and flat. After playing different types of music it adjusted itself to my room, and blew us all away. I would give it six stars if someone came out with an equalizer app and the ability to direct the spatial stereo per the music manually.
title: Blown away

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Billlewis84
content: First off it works great set up took like 6 mins. Sound quality is fantastic. I would definitely recommend if your looking for alexa capability with good sound. As a added bonus it controls Phillips hue bulbs no need for the hue hub.
title: Received as gift

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Turtle
content: Wow  sounds great Love it Fills the room Ultimate
title: Sounds fantastic

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MF7557
content: I LOVE this speaker. I have linked up my other Echo's in all the other rooms and it is so cool! The quality of sound is pretty good and I love being able to speak to it and have anything I'm in the mood to listen to available at command.
title: Love my speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joshua Funk
content: This review can be summed up in one word, wow! Such an incredible sound at the $200 price point. They deliver a full body sound, that's great both in the upper mode range with a deep base that sounds very balanced. Fills the entire room.
title: Immersive sound at a great price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dawn
content: What a sound this has!! When you put the Echo Studio in any place in your home it will adapt the sound to where it is in your home, so if it is in a small area, it will adapt, in a bigger area it will adapt, we have used this to play hard rock, country, slow any type of music it sounds great, the bass is awesome as well.
title: WOW! AWESOME

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TruckMan
content: When I received this unit I was surprised by its weight. It is definitely solid, which is one reason the audio sounds quite good, with a lot of depth as well as clear upper tones. No, it may not have the range and register of a high-end system, but it plays very well within the Echo family. Installing and adding to my Alexa app was also very easy ... easier, in fact, than setting my my Echo Dots. I set it in a corner of my living room so it is out of sight, but it still fills the entire room with a rich and balanced sound.
title: Superb, rich audio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Drknght
content: This things sounds amazing! Blew my mind.. I read and heard all the reviews and once I heard it in person , I was blown away... had to order a second one so I can have the whole Atmos effect! Couldn’t be happier! Adding the subwoofer next
title: Sounds awesome

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ITechNate
content: Amazed at how good this speaker sounds! Paired it with an amazon remote so now I can control it from anywhere in the house, the sound really does fill the room! It’s easy to move, I find myself taking it from room to room because I love how it sounds! Alexa can understand me better than other echoes.
title: Best echo device

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David H.
content: Love the sound. In addition to listening to music (streamed or bluetoothed), I also use it as a "soundbar" for my TV. There are two issues though... the first is that the Echo Studio can not hear you when the volume is turned way up (understandable, but it should have come with at least a simple dedicated remote), the second is that several times per week it stops working altogether and has to be unplugged to be restarted... not real good for a device that is intended to be on 24/7.
title: A Really Good Device with Some Shortcomings

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J. Emlay
content: It works well and this unit certainly has more bass but they have no business using the word "studio" in it's name.  The mid range is just eh and the high range is almost nonexistent. (yes I used the app to makes changes, didn't help)
title: I expected better

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: L. Palmer
content: Great sounding echo, the best by far.  It sounds good with standard Amazon Music but comes to life with Amazon Music HD.  The only thing so far is that I wish there were more options / adjustments on the equalizer than just three channels. (Bass, Middle, Treble)
title: Sounds Great! Amazing with Amazon HD Music.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rae Williams
content: We have always loved the echo for playing music in different areas of the house but got tired of moving her around.  When we decided to invest in a second one, the studio sounded perfect for our musical needs.  We were not disappointed!  She sounds better than the system in our brand new truck.
title: Sounds better than my truck

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jaice
content: I know there are a lot of high quality blue tooth speakers out there that cost an arm and a leg. But this one is decently priced and the quality of the sound is very pleasing. It gets pretty loud at max volume and the bass is enough to shake my coffee table. Plus its fun to play dog noises on and watch my dog look around super confused. Definitely recommend this.
title: Very nice

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael Whiddon
content: This was my first Echo product.  I say “Echo” because when I would call her Alexa my spouse looks at me like I moved an ex girlfriend back to our home.  Calling her Echo works ok except when certain Geico commercials come on the TV.  The Echo 3D Studio will not replace your nice surround sound system BUT the sound is plenty sufficient for most entertaining scenarios.  Sounds as good as any speaker, that size, you could pair with your phone.  Alexa (uh.... Echo) seems to respond quicker with this unit.  My Echo Dot is a tad slower.  Easy to set up.  Highly recommend.
title: Sounds great... worth a try.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ADAM BRUCE
content: For over $200 it was what I mostly expected. There is room for improvement. Also if your home theater receiver has Bluetooth it gives this product more versatility and improvement in sound quality (depending on your sound system).
title: Buy this first, then get the Echo Dot...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Varsity02
content: It’s like hearing your favorite music for the first time. I was hesitant because of the price, but it’s worth it.
title: Amazing Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Roberts Jr.
content: The sound is very good. Pretty good base with addition of Echo Sub - but only after a period of self-adjustment.  I got better base a day after pairing with two Echo Studios for stereo sound. Alexa has some difficulty understanding song/artist requests. She often responds to my request by playing something else. I have Amazon Music Ultra and created my own playlists - “My Music” within the Amazon Music account - and Alexa will too often respond to my request to play a playlist of my own creation in “My Music” by playing instead an Amazon Music curated playlist. All in all, though, I am enjoying.
title: Very good sound. Alexa occasionally frustrating but improving.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: G. Picou
content: After a Echo Dot speaker blew out, I decided to try the Echo Studio. I was NOT disappointed. This small device packs a powerful room filling sound for our favorite music. Thank you Amazon for continually improving your offerings. This ne is a keeper!
title: Awsome sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Russell
content: I originally wrote a favorable review of these, but it's hard to like them when any music you play on them eventually stops even when I didn't tell it to, or even when music is set to repeat.  A regular old stereo can do that, but Amazon has a big problem if they can't make their devices at least stay connected.
title: The greatest speakers, unless you want music to not stop.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: OMEvans
content: This was a nice addition to my echo collection. It is a great speaker, and a fully functioning echo. I use it for listening to music plus I have it connected to my fire tv via bluetooth and to regular tv via an optical toslink.
title: Great speaker, great echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ryan A Dyson
content: I'm primarily listening to music or streaming radio on this device during the day and it is an endless source of frustration. The sound is perfectly fine, even great for my purposes. No complaints there. The connectivity, on the other hand, is terrible. Bluetooth is so inconsistent that it's unusable. Playing Spotify through this speaker is only slightly more consistent, but if you want to switch to the next song, that can be waaay to much to ask of this device. My little old first gen Echo Dot was a champ at this in comparison. Why is this technology getting worse?
title: Great Sound, but Connectivity Issues Abound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Carol Levy
content: Good quality sound at high levels. Equilizer on phone for Echo doesn't work. Electrical interruptions short out the Studio. Hard to get back on
title: Needs some tweaks, could be great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Edgardo Delgado
content: I used to have a Bose wave radio, the big one. For me the best sound I ever heard for 1000 dollars. Now this echo studio has very nice sound for the price (169 dollars). Probably will buy another one and use it with the fire TV 4k in my TV.
title: Excellent unit.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LTJ
content: Greatest speaker for its price point and it’s abilities. My one year old loves sitting in front of it and letting the sound of the music just get wrapped around her, which is the best way I can describe the sound and experience of the speaker. I listen to a mix of things as well and have not had a terrible experience with any. Even familiar songs so much better on here. Also, for those of you that have it, definitely play the 3D songs on Amazon Music on the Echo Studio!
title: Great speaker, best version of the Echo by far!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: grant taylor
content: Picked mine up on Prime day. Looks good and has sounded great everywhere I have placed it. It won't be the loudest speaker out there, but excellent value at this price point.  I put it in my living room and have had it up to 65% and was loud without being too loud. We could still converse and enjoy the music.
title: Nice Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R.T.3
content: Hi fidelity? Not really. Somewhat better sound than a standard echo, but to claim it is "hi-fidelity" in my opinion is stretching the truth quite a bit. If I had heard it before I bought it, I wouldn't have spent the money.
title: Not what I expected

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: CMP4kids
content: Found it very difficult to work and set up with our FireCube. Its so big that it looked terrible setting in our family room. Doesn't blend in and hide. Just too big for that. The sound quality was not as good as Bose Solo 5. We returned after one week trying it.
title: Hard setting up, didn't like aesthetic of it. Sound quality was not as good as Bose Solo 5

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: "Hammer"
content: Music is crystal clear and sounds great. Pairing with a firecube is mixed. The sound is great, but it's impossible to set at a level where you can hear dialog and the movies sound doesn't blow you out if the room. There is a vast sound difference between dialog and music or effects in the same movie.
title: Mixed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William F. Weidman
content: The sound from one Studio is good but put two together and wow outstanding. I had to call support to pair my set and they were very helpful and easy to work with. Over all this has been and continues to be a 5 star experience.
title: Buy Two

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cody Laverdure
content: Not a single complaint, well from me at least, my neighbors downstairs say otherwise haha. The sound quality is amazing (after the update) with spacial enhancement. The bass is great, I use it as a home theater for my Samsung TV, and honestly if I had a house, I would buy 3 more. Don't let the negative reviews fool you this is a great buy, best speaker I have ever owned, especially for the price.
title: great f***ing speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P.
content: This is not a HIFI stereo but it sound pretty darn good ..perhaps even better if you had two of them but I am pretty happy with this one, and it is in my honest opinion way better than my regular Echo (1st gen). I will add the subwoofer for a deeper bass and will update then.
title: Way better sound and louder

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Greatgrandpajohn
content: Great sound for the money. The size is ok but it is a tad heavy. Not a bookshelf speaker. I was in the market for a speaker and thinking of getting a Apple HomePod. It’s a bit pricey and only plays Apple Music. The echo studio plays it all and was $100 less. Great buy. I’m very satisfied.
title: Great sound, good value!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Heather
content: This speaker is loud! I don’t plan on pairing it with a sub because I live in an apartment and the base on this thing thumps hard. I do plan on getting a second echo studio so I can pair them together for amazing surround sound!
title: Perfect for my apartment!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: heavyd
content: This echo studio sounds great. I stream music from several sources. I have mine connected to an echo sub. I am not a sound snub. This speaker is not perfect but if you want something that sounds great at a good price buy this
title: Get it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Luis Manuel Feliciano
content: I am super happy with my Echo Studio. It sound looks and performs amazing. Music comes alive, Movies are better and awesome. Works perfect with my fire tv cube 4k and paired with a Echo Sub brings thunder to my room. Worth every penny.
title: Must Have

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dazride
content: - Like the more base tone in this unit - Size is good for putting in most places in the home or patio - Easy for my spouse to set up and configure - Liked so well purchased another unit, so have the great sound quality in two rooms
title: Great Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ROB
content: I am impressed with it ,but it is difficult to  pair. Kind of upst that the price went down very shortly after  purchasing.  It would have been nice if they would have offered that price to me, since the timing of sale was so close to my purchase.
title: Good sounds

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mateus
content: I will say i was not all that impressed with the sound quality until I upgraded to amazon music HD.  There was a noticeable difference following the upgrade  This is our first alexa product and we are finding it much more useful than we thought we would.  Highly recommend this if you’re looking for an alexa product with room filling sound.
title: Love it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Christopher L Brantley
content: The speaker sounds great, and  when connecting it to the fire tv stick, it added the surround  affect like larger systems.  Another good thing is that its able to hear you pretty well at higher volumes. The build quality seems great so far, but time will tell.... in the meantime, i love it!
title: The all in one!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael A. Cavallo
content: I love the sound that comes out of this speaker but if you have more than one Echo product you want everything to play at once.  Sadly, Amazon does not play Slacker or LiveXLive everywhere. You can only play it on one speaker at a time. The days when they would add sources regularly seem to be coming an end. MAC
title: Great Sound...limited access

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: SteveT
content: Sound is better than a traditional Echo, but still not great. I am disappointed in the sound quality. I've realized that spending the same amount of money on some dedicated speakers that you can plug into a standard Echo produces much better sound.
title: Improved sound quality, but better/cheaper solutions exist

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Puckette McDonald
content: I love it! I really don't know why I waited so long to get one, but I finally did and I'm totally in love with it. I'm still in the process of figuring out just what Alexa can help me with so it will keep me entertained for a long time.
title: Don't Know What Took Me So Long

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gregory Cruz
content: This speaker is even better than I hoped it would be.  There is no other single speaker that produces the stereo separation that this speaker does...and it's down-firing woofer gives it a meaty sound that so many of these speakers lack.  Spacious, accurate, airy, and deep...all at the time.  Best wireless speaker I have ever owned.  Buy it.
title: It's all about the sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mark fulger
content: Tons of great reviews on here so I bought two...needless to say they are very underwhelming. Not that loud. Not much punch to them. Cuts out sometimes. Volume drops sometimes. They interrupt each other when speaking to them. Equalizer isn’t great and impossible to tell if the setting “stick” since in the app they always look reset. They are pretty much just blah. Not sure what is better at this price point though...so I will probably keep them. Added the echo sub too....that little thing is wayyyyy too loud for their speakers. Even with bass set to minimum.
title: Hard to explain...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P. Turner
content: It’s now my primary sound system. My Bose 901s are on the basement as they take up a lot of room. Alexa is great and getting greater. I’m adding a sub to really push the bass. It doesn’t need it but I’m patriotically recycling my tax refund (although it’s getting smaller and smaller-(same pay, more taxes, less disposable income, but WTF?).
title: Wonderful sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Anthony Johnson
content: Got this while it was on sale and I’m going to grab another one the next time it’s on sale. I’m a Apple addict but I can’t spend $350 on a speaker especially when this is as good if not better. I’m still trying to figure out how to connect the speaker to a smaller echo for the home theater but other than that this speaker has been great!
title: Love it, gotta get another one!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Amber
content: I love it. I have had And Alexa since the prototype. I have the first generation or the original that was only given to limited people. I loved her then and she’s only improving. I am so happy with this new generation. She has a nice sound quality that adheres to whatever room or space you are in. And the thing I like about this new model is that when I say Alexa even if the volume is superhigh she’s always listening so that she can stop and listen to what I have to say. Well done Amazon.
title: Perfect!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Constance B.
content: Really like the sound. Better than I imagined. Really powerful speaker.
title: Great sound. Can’t be beat

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Patrick Kane
content: It’s pretty good.  But not a great audio device.  It’s my first Alexa product and it’s pretty neat and all that.  So the Alexa features are cool.  There is some lag time between my phone and the device as far as turning volume up and down which bothers me because often when you want to turn down the music there is a reason for it.  Maybe it’s just me.  I absolutely love Bose products - and know that Not everyone agrees with me on that.  But I can’t imagine anyone fighting with me that the echo studio stands up against likely any quality audio device.
title: Decent

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C.K.
content: Moving from Sonos you this..eventually they Sonos sounds little better, they voice recognition is much better. I basically only need one alexa for my TV and smart speaker need
title: best  sounding alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: mike sirois
content: This thing sounds amazing and I think much better after the last update I would definitely buy another one hands down
title: Awesome sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Stephens
content: The best sounding Echo that Amazon has put out there..  Better than my Echo2 , better than my Dot3 , better than my show10 or 5..  better than my paired 2 Echo2's with sub..  Might put he sub with it to see how thay sound together...
title: Can't wait till I can afford to get the second one

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Thomas Hull
content: This is going to be simple. I love this speaker. Sounds quality is awesome. The way it bounces sound off the ceiling and walls truly is incredible. This really fills my office with music. Love it. Well worth the $200 for someone who loves music and having Alexa right there.
title: I Love This Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: vjnnc
content: Received this as a Christmas gift.  We have several Echo devices in the house and this one by far exceeds the sound quality of all others.  Just perfect!
title: I'm impressed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nick C.
content: This is loud! I upgraded from an echo dot. There is a night and day comparison between them. I can listen to full music with zero speaker crack. Very easy to set up. I migrated the dot to a bedroom. Very happy with this speaker edition.
title: Loud, Clear, and well built

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Helio
content: I love it the music that comes out of there is amazing and atmos sound wow
title: Amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jose
content: Too expensive for something that never gets simple commands. The sound is great but not worth the poor performance.
title: Eh

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jean Richard
content: Great speaker. I too was skeptical about this "3D Audio" but it does work. Really start to hear music notes and instruments not previously heard on music I listen to regularly. Definitely needs to be placed with space, meaning nothing in front, behind, on top, or on the sides of the speaker. This way you get all the sounds.  Highly recommend!!
title: 3D Audio Rocks!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TedVTID
content: A great replacement for our echo dot. Sounds great and loud enough, but I was hoping for bone-shattering sound
title: Unreasonable expectations

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard Rossi
content: Overall, the sound quality is pleasant.  This product suffers from 2 issues in my opinion. The sound volume could be more robust. I just can't crank it as loud as I would like. When set up in a multi room environment, the volume gets out of sync and it's difficult to reset to normal. More 3d music content from Amazon music would be nice.  This speaker does sound impressive when playing a 3d music source, albeit it's wimpy volume.
title: good but not great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dave G
content: Generally, it works great as both a stand-alone unit and as a speaker for the Fire TV Cube.  However, once in a while, the video - audio get several SECONDS out of sync with a reboot of both devices usually clearing the problem.  I downgraded Sound Quality for this issue.
title: Great, but sync with Fire TV Cube is not perfect

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DL J.
content: I love the sound on this speaker, it rocks my house great base and all around sound. I am still getting to know Alexa. We fight from time to time and she never takes the bait..lol my music sounds superb, I like setting reminders and alarms...
title: Echo Studio what have you done to me😊 I told my iPod to play next

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donna
content: Great sound. Very loud
title: Great sound n volume

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: SteveMc
content: Great sound for about 1,000 sq ft area (indoors). I can finally hear Muse with the sound quality and volume they deserve. Installation note: set on firm surface for best quality. A rickety table is not ideal
title: Good volume, great quality sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: OldSoldier
content: Despite the intriguing design, I found the sound quality lacking.  The Alexa features did not make up for sound quality for me. I returned it and ended up paying much more for a competing product.  But I consider myself an audiophile and sound quality is more important than price for me in most cases.
title: Not for audiophiles

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nikkibeach
content: Far superior sound and volume to regular echos. I have it also hooked up to the tv and a firecube and it significantly improves the experience with a virtual surround sound system in compatible movies and shows.
title: Great sound, great for tv also

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LKLD
content: Just didn’t live up to the hype of “Oh my god! The sound is amazing!”, that I’ve seen on some YouTube channels. It’s better than the Echo Plus for certain, but it should blow you away with sound quality.
title: It’s Okay.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fabián Cedeño
content: Nunca escuché un sonido con más claridad en un equipo de casa y respecto a su relación calidad-precio; he oído monitores de estudio en este rango de precios que no tienen tanta claridad y potencia; tiene bajos poderosos que no sacrifican la claridad.
title: Excelente sonido para un equipo de casa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MIKE
content: I like this speaker but it would be MUCH better if you could connect with other Echo products.  I have the show and several "dots" and being able to connect them all would be great. I have all of the others connected and use them more than this one speaker.
title: This is a great speaker and easy to setup.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew Propst
content: The sound from this device was even better than expected. So nice I purchased a second one and paired it to have stereo sound in my bedroom and connected to my Fire TV Stick. Rich lows and crisp highs. Set up fairly easy and takes a little while. Overall very impressive for the price.
title: Echo Studio = Happiness

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Amy
content: This speaker produces great sound- I don’t think it could be beat at this price point. I love it. I am glad we upgraded for our living room, it makes a huge difference! I was raised by a dad obsessed with speaker sound. We had tube amps, the huge speaker wire and thousands of dollars worth of equipment- all that stuff. The sound quality from this little speaker does not really compare to that and I am not sure it “fills the room,” but it is better than anything I have had in my adult life. I highly recommend.
title: Great quality sound for the money! Worth it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Skye
content: Sound is great. Alexa’s ai needs more work but that is to be expected considering technology is ever growing. Integration is its downfall. Does not work well with existing Apple and google programs, and you can’t use the device as a Bluetooth speaker!
title: Umm.... It could be $50 cheaper....

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mr. J
content: just received yesterday, really got high hopes for this device , the sub was such a disappointment the Bluetooth never really connected it was a waste of money for me, wish I could return but anyway make sure you buy 2 year maint. plan with any Echo device
title: HOPEFULLY BETTER THEN THE SUB

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dave Vickers
content: I have it in my RV and it rocks play all my music through my iPhone my music library and XM app! Won’t need to pair with another on it gets loud as you want it to with crisp highs and midrange the base a tad weak but gona order the sub to see what happens!
title: All you need in a RV great 3D sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ronald
content: Got this for couple of days now. Tried connecting it via toslink with my samsung tv. Sounds will goes on and off in the middle of watching netflix. Another issue is it will always go offline after couple of hours of not using it. Despite restarting my modem and my echo it does the same thing. Tried to reset and install if many times. Called customer support did everything they told me but seems not to fix the issue.
title: Echo studio goes offline and sounds Keep disconnecting while connected to samsugn tv via toslink

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D-Rob
content: Only issue is that at times is loses connection with my Fire stick. Have 2 studios and they don't always sync up with the home theater group that includes the Fire stick. Little fustrating, have to play spotify music, then stop it, then fire stick will sync. It's odd but it works. When both studios syn with Fire stick, the sound is awesome!
title: Loses sync with Fire Stick 4K

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Voldewarts
content: This is an awesome device but if anyone can answer this question get close  To your studio and pick a song that's 3-D Do you hear a buzzing or hissing  noise when ever it plays anything for instance play 7 ring by ariana grande's when the audio starts then stops  In between  you start hearing it Better if herd with higher volume
title: Buzzing or hissing noise during 3-D music playback

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jack Ruby Built The Pyramids
content: This Echo Studio doesn't sound horrible but it also doesn't sound much better than my Echo gen 1.  The subwoofer component is nice but I don't think there is much value in this model as a stand alone unit at $170-$200.
title: I expected more at this price point and with the number of speakers

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alyssa Mazz
content: I hooked this up directly to my tv to get surround sound. The sound goes in and out on HBO all the time. Ruins watching shows. You can’t keep the tv sound on at the same time as the echo studio because it echos. Super disappointing buy. I have spent soooo much money on Amazon Alexa products and am really disappointed with this. I would return but I threw away the box immediately because I had faith in their products.
title: Dissatisfied, disappointed, not worth it for TV

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bird
content: Unbelievably great. A whole new way of listening to music
title: Great buy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James Spiazzi
content: you sold a unit that is known to carry sound output which it does well,however you can not get a surround sound with one speaker.so when i went to connect external logitech speakers to this to my astonishment YOU CAN'T.totally sad thinking on the developers side.even with my echo dot 1st gen i can hook up external speakers to get more of a surround sound.very dissapointed.thinking of returning it. when it comes to music this was it's purpose.
title: add on

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Guinn
content: I really like this Alexa. She sounds great . It has very good bass and crisp highs. I was thinking about buying the additional subwoofer but its really not needed unless I want to rattle the walls. I love the sleeping sounds. The ocean waves are most relaxing and help me fall asleep.
title: Excellent sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard C. Ortlip
content: Awesome sound with deep bass. The best sounding Echo so far.
title: Awesome sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Private person
content: Amazon’s Alexa Studio model is certainly a much improved device over previous devices. The fidelity of all sorts of music is enhanced to the point that it’s beginning to sound like what was originally produced by the respective artists. While it’s a step in the right direction there is still plenty of room for improvement with the software and equalization schemes.
title: Way better fidelity....

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: eschorn
content: Could really hear the difference in songs mixed for Dolby Atmos 3D. The question will be if this format eventually gets widely adopted for music. If not, this speaker will still be a good value for its price range.
title: Good sound, that can be great with the right format

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jontimothy...
content: Great sounding speakers, setup was terrible, had to contact Amazon to accomplish it and the tech tried to tell me it wouldn't connect to a 4k fire stick. I told him to read the on line directions, that it was designed to work with it. Finally got working and sounds great.
title: very hard to hook up!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Daniel A. Windler
content: I'd been eyeing this for a while, and finally pulled the trigger on Prime Day to take advantage of the 25% discount.  I'd previously had two (2nd gen) Echo Pluses (I think same as the current gen Echo) in a stereo pair with an Echo Sub, and I replaced that with the two Echo Studios.  I'm not an audiophile, but to my untrained ears, it sounds much better than the Echo Pluses.  I'm very pleased with the sound.  Although some reviews said that the microphone isn't as good as the Echo, and that Alexa sometimes doesn't hear you, I have not encountered this problem.
title: Very satisfied

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JF
content: Thanks a lot Amazon!  I went into Best Buy to buy a single light bulb and after hearing the Echo Studio they had on display I ended up ordering one (Best Buy didn't have any to sell). Super happy with my purchase, love the sound.
title: Love It

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Colleen
content: Sounds good but won’t work in conjunction with both surround sound and fire TV had to pair with just fire tv.  Now I have to move my old home theatre to the basement for the movie room.  Wish it would pair with both to enhance the steep experience.
title: Good but...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JoseColon
content: I have to hear it by myself... stunning crystal clear sound. If you read this, stop reading reviews and try it. Ah, if you want to pair it with another speaker for HOME TEATHER only with another (2x) Echo Studio is your solution. If you paired Echo Studio with Echo dots, it works only for music or multi-room music and it sounds awesome.
title: Amaze

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matt Agnello
content: When music is at reasonable volume, Alexa is too quiet. When Alexa is at a reasonable volume, music is too loud. It has a lot of difficulty actually hearing people speak, such that I have to repeat myself several times or, especially for the women in the house, it never gets what they say right even after training. It does the job of an Echo fine when it does work, and the sound quality is better than other echos, but I don't think it's worth the price I paid for it all together.
title: Volume is all over the place

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brandon Cheers
content: Great product by Amazon! The sound quality of this device for the price especially is excellent, I did alot of research to decide this smart speaker over the sonos 1, plus I have plans for an Alexa powered smart home in the future for lighting my gaming room and this was a necessary addition for sound 🙏
title: Great quality sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Samuel Morales
content: Will you really actually read what I say let’s put it to the test what I loved everything what I disliked I’ll wait for Echo studio to point out where hopefully you’ll put lights on the button so you can see when you’re reaching for them just like the echo thermostat which has a motion sensors to light up so I can see what I’m doing. Just a little thought.
title: Just a little thought.needs lights on the buttons and sensors when reaching for it..

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Willi Alcantara Gutierrez
content: Es dispositivo presenta un sonido espectacular y en las pruebas con música 3D el sonido separado es un espectáculo. Su principal uso es para música, pero igual se controlan todos los dispositivos en casa. Aún me falta probar el equipo enlazado al firestick. Reconoce los comandos de voz  sin dificultad, incluso desde otra habitación.
title: Echo Studio excelente sonido

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lee B.
content: My Studio is fine, sounds great. I'd highly recommend the Studio if it wasn't for my wife's. My wife's has a low-level ticking/grating sound even when not playing anything. It's rather annoying. Can't hear it when the music is volume LVL 5 or more, but below that... We will be returning/exchanging hers.
title: Bought 2, one good, one not so good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D Johnson
content: I wanted a echo studio for a while.  Now that I have it, I can say that it is a ok buy.  Don’t get me wrong, the sound is clear, and it does get loud.  But I also have a regular echo connected to a echo sub, and the over all sound is better.  Adding a echo sub to complement the echo studio I think is beat for large rooms.
title: Larger rooms also need the sub

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RMM
content: I bought this because Alexa is just so easy to use and you. The sound is fine If you like you like the way Bose speakers sound. I personally like how Ultimate Ears sound better. More of a balanced bottom mid range and treble...if you like more of a bass sound /bottom end than this most likely isn't your speaker.
title: Its very convenient easy to use-sounds good enough/not amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Diego R.
content: The device has no problems per se, however it's one of the most priciest echos around, and maybe I am not doing something right but this 3D sound sounds as good as my nose sound bar so don't really see the point, maybe it's juts a bigger speaker than the regular echo
title: Good but not great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Anslem Brathwaite
content: I recommend this product! I like the sounds that come from it/makes u feel immersed into the movie/music. I just wish it could be a bit louder but it proves to be a wonderful upgrade for your television audio cheers...
title: I works great!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Beorn
content: Sound quality is good, but voice recognition is an issue.  Alexa doesn't listen, or respond well to my requests and commands, I sometimes think I am speaking to my ex-wife. Maybe I should ask Alexa if she has a headache?
title: Alexa likes to ignore me

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jerry Lee Head
content: This product works great with your Amazon Music Unlimited subscription, with the 3D upgrade. It sounds best with the available 3D music. With all the other music, I found I had to turn up the volume more to get a better quality.
title: Great Sound Quality with 3D

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: kevin davis
content: Love the studio combined with multiple echo dots it makes for a great whole house system ready for another one wish I had caught the Amazon sale before I bought the first one but definitely worth the money
title: Play it with bass

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shane
content: We love it. It’s the best sounding Echo. Perfect for the living room, bedroom.  This company is headed in the right direction.  I’ll purchase another. It can be a bit glitchy, but it’s not a big deal.
title: Great Purchase. Best sounding Echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D. Petrilli
content: Really like the studio the best. I have 2 first generation echos and 2 2nd with a subwoofer and 2 studio all stereo paired. The studio is by far most pleasing. The 2nd generation with subwoofer is very good also.
title: Very good HD sound with Amazon!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nick26
content: There is nothing to dislike in this smart speaker. Its so much more than that .I just love it and being wheel chair bound amazon is a blessing for me.Thank you for your wonderful service and products.
title: wonderful device

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lizamt5
content: I love my echo studio! I am a music lover and listen to music everyday. I was looking for an upgrade from my echo dot and I decided to purchase this. The sound quality blew me away! This thing gets loud! This is definitely my favorite purchase of the year. I highly recommend this product.
title: The Echo Studio is AMAZING!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Greg F.
content: Excellent sound with great voice recognition. Worth every penny and may buy another one.
title: Great add for any house.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: AJ
content: With 5 existing Echos around the house, I was more than excited to experience the sound quality from this ""3D sound"""  device. NOT impressed, certainly not a Bose, and waiting for the 3D to happen.
title: Disappointed!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: dikarlus
content: It’s Echo... it’s wonderful. The sound is crispy and HD. It takes the whole environment full of music. Love it!
title: Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dewayne
content: Wow... oh my god... This speaker sounds absolutely amazing when playing music from Amazon Music with HD, ultra HD, and 3D Music.  I highly recommend you use this service to maximize it’s full potential. Probably sounds just as amazing with optical audio in. I can only imagine what 2 linked together would sound like. This should cost twice as much, (and probably does to Amazon). I highly recommend this device, you will NOT be disappointed.
title: Amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jim B.
content: The sound is remarkable. It blows away my 1st gen echoes, my 2gen echo dots and my echo show. The Dolby Atmos makes this speaker fill the room with amazing sound for one unit. Well worth the money!!!!!
title: The sound rocks!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: pdxDesigner
content: Easy home theater integration with Fire Cube. Excellent sound. My previous home theater setup I had a Sonos speaker, the Echo Studio sounds as good or better, and is so much easier to use. Great value. I'm thinking about getting another.
title: Great choice for home theater

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lee M.
content: The audio quality is on point! The sound from this smart speaker fills up my entire living room and kitchen. No matter what genre of music I throw at it there is no distortion and the clarity of mids and highs along with the bass kick is tuned perfect.
title: Design and sound is on point!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Edward
content: I have Bluetooth headphones and the studio speaker requires multiple attempts to switch back and forth. Sometimes it’s good but sometimes it is really frustrating. Otherwise it’s a big improvement over the TV speakers.
title: Frustrating

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott Edgecombe
content: The availability to connect to the phone is intermittent.  Volume control works also only works occasionally.  As a device for music this does not work well.  As an Alexa device it works very well, but you don't need to spend anywhere near the price tag to get this functionality with other low fidelity devices.  I'd stick with a low cost Alexa and separate speaker system.  It is unfortunate, as I was hoping I could get what was promised and have both.
title: Using this to play music from your phone via Spotify is unreliable

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KR
content: Can’t believe the sound quality at this price point. Sounds amazing. If you love your Echo device, you need to upgrade to the Echo Studio and fall in love with Alexa and your Echo all over again.
title: Upgrade right now!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Byron Watson
content: I have paired this with an Echo Show in the kitchen so that music plays out of the Echo Studio, but I can still see timers and other such information on the Echo Show. Works great and sounds great.
title: Sounds much better than other Echos

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary Mentillo
content: The sound is awesome but the interface is lacking.  Alexa only allows volume control 1-10.  You can not say mute without turning the volume to 1.  You can not adjust the volume with the Alexa app.  Maybe I just have not downloaded the correct app or skill.  I looked but did not see one for the echo studio.  I also bought an optical cable which does allow tv over the echo studio but it does not interact as well as I hoped.  I also like that it’s a hub and is suppose to work without the internet but I have not tested it yet. Hope it is a hub for all my echo devices
title: A great speaker but interface needs some work

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: T. Clark
content: Quite bulky on the counter. Sounds better than our OG Echo but not as good as anticipated given hype, Dolby Atmos, etc. having the indicator lights recessed on the top is less convenient as well.
title: A bit nicer sounding than an original Echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Keren Rosado
content: Better than I expected. Sound is full and clear and pretty awesome for a speaker of that size and price range. So far I haven't had any hiccups regarding connectivity or pairing. Instructions to pair or connect the device are pretty straightforward but require a little bit of reading. I got mine connected to my fire TV 4k as a home theater set up and I love it.
title: Great value!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Flora Carbon
content: I've had the regular Echo in my kitchen but sometimes you just want to blast your favorite song and the Echo just couldn't cut it. The Studio fills that gap. However, when I moved the Studio to compare it along side my regular home stereo in the living room it fell way short. At $200. just a tad of buyer's remorse but it's the holidays and I deserve it.  (A discount of 15% or more would definitely eradicate any of that remorse).
title: Great kitchen speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott M.
content: I like it but the microphone doesn’t work as well as the dot. It’s in the living room and probably 20 feet away from the kitchen dot. I often have to repeat instruction to the studio and sometimes when I do it gets picked up by the dot in the kitchen instead. Always had a great Alexa experience but If I’d started with this studio I would have never continued on because it’s frustrating to repeat things frequently to the studio.
title: Microphone is below par

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cocuy
content: Great speakers wish you could connect4 more speakers to it to get a real surround sound i have the echo sub connected to it . But at this time thats the limit . I found that when set up as a home theater with a fire cube 1 speaker in each of the echo studios are mute. Not sure why. But none the less it is basicly wireless system except for a outlet plug . And i love the fact that you can relocate these anywhere that has an outlet nearby without reconnecting or moving a bunch of speaker wires.
title: Great sound comes out of these

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JamfSlayer
content: This is the best sounding Alexa yet. Please add a model with a rotating clock or screen like the dot 3 and show. It replaced an echo dot 3,which had the clock, and my wife misses that. Spectacular otherwise..
title: Spectacular, but needs a display

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PKMAN
content: It’s about as good as my Bose SoundTouch 10 but it’s all directional so that makes it ideal for my great  room, where I place it in the middle, between the living room, dining room and kitchen.
title: It sounds good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tanner Fleck
content: I got this to use as a speaker for music, control my smart home and be a sound bar. Unfortunately if you play music on it then wanna use it as a sound bar you have to unplug the device then plug it back in. For the price I would expect this to be seamless
title: Has some issues

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Todd
content: The free Dam Philips Hue lamp is useless without a $63 Philips bridge. Just a tease and a waste of time. Thanks for nothing Amazon, not only a useless piece of junk, but wasted my time to figure out that echo was never going to discover it. The Echo studio is nice, but the Philips hue bulb scam ruined the experience.
title: The free Philips Hue lamp is a useles scam.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Floyd Palmer
content: I first purchased the Echo Dot then a colleague of mine suggested I buy Echo Studio. This speaker has some amazing sound. The louder I turned up the volume the better the sound. This booger puts out 3D sound that enables you here the song in studio quality. I just might get another one.
title: Amazing... Speaker Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kaveh panahi
content: If you are hoping to play Spotify on this, the app won’t allow you to link your account through Alexa App. The only way to play your Spotify is by using the Bluetooth. That means you can’t use Alexa voice recognition to play your songs. Big fail. I guess amazon is trying to push their own music streaming service.
title: Won’t link to Spotify

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fredrick T. Jacobi
content: We used Echo at a friend's house and really enjoyed the experience.  We purchased this model for the deeper sound. We now use it on a daily basis.  It's easy to request a certain song or particular music group or genre.
title: Nice addition to our household

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: josh
content: Got this one hoping Alexa could hear us better, but our gen 2 dot has better voice recognition and it's really frustrating to have spent so much on something and it not be at least better than the old cheap version. The sound quality of the speakers is great though.
title: Not as good as it should be

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James Alexander
content: I use this speaker now in addition to my surround sound system. I like the surround sound system better although sometimes I just want to hear music immediately without going through all of the steps to turn on the system. The Echo Studio has a very good quality, deep clear sound which I can turn on in a matter of seconds to hear my favorite music (Amazon and Apple) in my living room and other rooms if needed (I have 4 other echo devices so being able to hear everywhere is sweet. I also like the small size and looks. Hard to go wrong at this price.
title: Great sound quality for the money-

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steven K Lund
content: Setup was easy and sound is excellent. Looks nice on my coffee table.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Teria S.
content: Alexa is a game changer for me. I tell her to play some of my favorite music and call people on my contact list and she does. My favorite part is when she plays for me rain and thunder on loop mode all night just like I like it . It’s very calming for me and helps me relax after a hard day of work. She’s a must buy...
title: Alexa talks back is a plus!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alfred Charron
content: Oh my goodness this thing thumps!!!! The sound this speaker gives is leaps and bounds above anything offered by Echo speakers to date. Pair this with a 4k fire stick to get incredible surround sound out of this one speaker. Highly recommended.
title: Best Echo on the market.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Peyton Bradford Parker
content: Got two paired with an echo sub. The sound is significantly different with the pair and sub - impressive! Along with HD subscription from Amazon music - Period Classical music with channels by composer - Nikolaus Harnoncourt, William Christie, Karl Richter, etc... - sounds magnificent!
title: Two paired with sub - sounds magnificent!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Billy
content: Absolutely sounds amazing. Worth every penny!
title: Sounds amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary
content: Excellent sound quality and it was very easy to set up. The mic pics up Alexa requests from the next room.
title: Great sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PatArick
content: The sound is great.  I’m a HiFi guy and musician with a $3000 analog stereo. Hopefully that gives this review street cred
title: Damn good sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Zeek
content: Sounds was nothing special -- I chose to replace with an echo dot and hard wire to two Harmon speakers I already had but did not like using with the app from Harmon -- now I control them with echo dot and they sound great.
title: Not Impressed with sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PedsFlightRN
content: Love the ease of use of this new product! Is it an audiophile’s hi-fidelity product? No. But the sound is pretty amazing from a speaker with this small of a footprint. We have a very open concept house and it is able to fill the space. Try it out, you have nothing to lose.
title: Perfect for us!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Doug Hirsch
content: This "little" speaker sounds great.  I have tried it alone, as well as paired with the sub, and both options sound better than my sound bar.  The kids all love it, and can't wait to take it outside by the pool in the summer.
title: Great sound and quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Reginald Nelson
content: I love the clarity and the bass I can install 2 Studio speakers in my home and submerse it with sound. This is a good buy. I believe it will also decease in price, it will be an even better buy.
title: Quality Sound... That Bass

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cindy.Mcg
content: Love love love the sound and it pairs with my Alexa enable TV in the bedroom for nice sound while watching TV or listening to Music. Alexa is easy to wake up. Perfect this over the surround sound I had set up previously.
title: Great sound good for music and TV.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard Arkwright
content: Get a pair for great full sound. And Alexa is a great companion to the already convenient speaker package
title: Great speaker for the money. Fills the room. Get a pair for great full sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bill
content: I was so excited to get this. I was equally disappointed in it. I think my old echo has just as good of sound as this one if not better, I believe it’s clearer.
title: Soooooo DISAPPOINTED. RETURNED IT

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rodrigo S. Loureiro
content: I recommend everyone to buy two of these and use them in stereo configuration. A single speaker cannot reproduce stereo sound, but if you pair two of these, you'll have a great setup
title: great sound for a single speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RJ Levesque Jr
content: My wife and I are completely enjoying our new echo studio. We have had it for a couple months now and we love it, the sound is beautiful. We control our HD 4K Fire TV Stick with it.
title: Great soundbar replacement for our HDTV

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Daren Higginbotham
content: It took me about half an hour to set up . This is my first Alexa device and I am floored with the quality of the sound . Strong bass, clear accurate treble and mid range.  Oh ! It controls all of my smart devices also. I am very happy so far.
title: Very impressive sound !

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cowardly Lion
content: I like the Echo Studio except the sound quality leaves something to be desired. As such, I don't feel it's worth quite what I paid for it. On the whole I am barely satisfied but I'll keep it just the same.
title: sound not the best

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gabe
content: Sounds great and does what it’s designed to do. Incredible sound quality
title: Great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cameron Gordon
content: Great sound. Be careful turning it up using the Amazon Alexa app. I accidentally touched the slider to 100% volume and my ears are ringing. This thing is loud! Integrates perfectly with Amazon Music HD.
title: Powerful,clear sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Eric Fleck
content: It works just as well as the Echo and other Alexa units however it is not Studio Sound quality.  It is far better than the older Echo (Cylinder type) but is it worth the $$, maybe not.
title: Sound good but certainly not a true stereo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: emily mcgee
content: I was very impressed with the sound quality. But disappointed with the lip sync problem. There is an issue with the sound matching the mouths on movies and shows. Adjusted all the way and still an issue. Tech support says this is a known problem when using with a projector. Hope they will have an update soon.
title: Lip sync issue

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sinohe K. Terrero
content: I researched a lot before buying the Echo Studio.  I don't regret the purchase because we are an Alexa household and I think it's the best option but the sound quality is not what I expected it to be.
title: Best Echo but sound is a bit overrated

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: nauticalx
content: Great sound, Easy setup, looking forward to making my Wink obsolete and having this be the home hub. Sound is amazing definitely multiple steps up from the plus. I had to move pictures off the shelf because the base was vibrating them enough to move.
title: "Alexa"

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RHD
content: Was on sale for $169, I think. For the price, it is excellent and deserves 5 stars. Sound has full rich bass, but a little thin in the mid and highs. If I paid $50 more, I think I would have been disappointed, but at this price my kitchen music is good.
title: Great on sale.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gavincen
content: It has amazing room filling sound that can honestly be heard through the entire house! The bass on this is enough to feel in the floor on higher volumes as well and even at higher volumes the sound is sharp and clear!
title: Amazing sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Elcid
