content: Sound was fine slightly above average for a $200 speaker. The Alexa integration works spot on, she will recognize my voice even over loud tunes playing. However the marketing claims are slightly over hyped on this. The sound stage is pretty mono. If you are in a small room, and sitting in the sweet spot you get a decent stereo effect. However for most use cases treat this as a very high quality single point audio source
title: Good speaker despite over hyped marketing claims

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Miss Ellie
content: I love the sound. I didn't realize how bad my tv speakers were until I got this studio. However, there are alot of times that I have to disconnect and reconnect.  My echo 3 didn't have these issues
title: Great sound, Connectivity issues

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PJung61
content: Amazing smart speaker. Picked it up for $30.00 off the reg price. It was a replace fir my 1sr gen echo. The sound quality is unbelievable. Read the online review and they were all positive, which made me purchase one.
title: Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: runner
content: Works great fills the room with great sound..I’m not a audio file but the sound is better than the speakers I was using..very good overall sound good base. Better than I expected
title: Great sound plus

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Luis Lema
content: I have several echo devices, 1st get, 2nd gen, echo plus and echo studio. The microphone in the echo studio is not as sensitive as the other echo models so I have to yell Alexa from across the room or put my mouth next to the device so it can respond.
title: Microphone not as good as other echo devices

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dennis Rouse
content: My Studio is only a few weeks old and fills my 24' patio with sound.  I use the Studio for music but it is capable of more but as is it fits my needs. The Studio replaces the original Echo
title: Studio for the patio!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dudley Smith
content: I got this to have good sounding music while I work in the garage/outside the house.  Both audio channels can be heard unlike the Echo Plus I have in the living room (mono only).
title: I Now Have Music In The Garage

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jocko at the Corner Lounge
content: Volume can change as different song are selected, that is not good.  I thought the machine was suppose to be constantly adjusting to the way I had set it up. Of course the sound is not the quality of my home stereo system, but it is much easier to access songs.Sometimes it plays some weird versions of the same song several musicians have recorded therefore I need to know the version I want. Also it  would be nice to know if I can set up various favorites lists and if so, how to do it.  Overall, its fun to play and I enjoy it.
title: It is fun to play what you want when you want

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: doh predator
content: if your looking for great sound this is what your looking for. i am very happy with this purchase. wanted a new alexa and this fits the bill. great sound better responsiveness. and a built in hub.if your looking for a sound bar for your tv check this out.
title: Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Douglas W. Metcalf
content: Have a problem with "Song ID On". Play stops after one song when it's on. Tech support was arrogant and did not call me back when he said he would. They identified a software problem, but three or four weeks later - no fix. Otherwise, I love it!
title: Tech support not so good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jason Brandenburg
content: Home run by Amazon. These speakers are amazing with powerful bass and perfect highs. Using it for outdoor theater and inside my home office. Setup in theater mode paired with a Fire Stick 4K and works flawlessly.
title: Home Run!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Robert Finke
content: Not bad for the money. I replaced my old Yamaha stereo/floor speakers with this. It's not too notch sound but it does a pretty good job compared to the stereo. A better eq would be nice.
title: Pretty good for the money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shivam
content: Sounds great in general, but has random frequent audio disconnects when connected with Fire Stick 4K. I have noticed tons of customer facing the same issue, hoping there's a software update in line to fix the same
title: Sounds great, but has random frequent audio disconnects when connected with Fire Stick 4K

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: rhino
content: The sound is incredible in this Echo Studio. Sometimes when you listen to music, the sound will go down but ask Alexa to turn it up, the volume goes up. So far we're happy with it.
title: Concert hall sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J.B. Kohn
content: I’ve had my studio since June. In all that time it has never been able to reliably stream music from spotify. Volume controls do not work from the app. Constantly have to disable and reenable the Spotify skill. Volume of music will stay loud while alexas voice stays soft. It’s the buggiest echo interface I’ve ever used, and Amazon clearly has no interest in fixing these issues. Sounds nice when it works, but if you want to listen to spotify on your $200 speaker, get something else.
title: Complete garbage, don’t waste your money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fast Eddie
content: Nothing to dislike.  Looks nice.  Music sounds great.  Voice recognition is outstanding - it recognizes everything you ask.  It even has a dry sense of humor.  Plan to get another one for the basement.
title: Great Sound and Voice Recognition

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: even_stephen0
content: Sounds great in my apartment. It analysis the room at set up. Knowing this. I set it up on s centrally located table. With over 5,000,000 songs available with the Amazon HD music subscription its even harder to stump than the dot which I moved to the bedroom.
title: Sounds great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Wands89
content: Set it up today. It’s a bit buggy. Connected to iPad and Bluetooth goes in and out. Also having issues adjusting equalizer on Alexa app. The studio doesn’t always respond as I slide the bass/midrange/treble adjusters.
title: Buggy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Flier
content: My intent was to significantly upgrade the sound quality of my Echo 2nd Gen. Did not happen. The studio is in the same location but does not have the full sound experience I was expecting.
title: Expensive upgrade to Echo third gen

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Maria Cruz
content: Love the sound i purchase 2 im using them as home theater i wish you could add a center speaker i will definitely will add a subwoofer in the future but so far im in love with it!
title: Amazing sound im not regretting it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Coachk1177
content: Very impressive for its size, good things do come in small packages!  Setup was easy as is all Alexa devices. What I will say is that placement is key for great performance. Placing in the center of the wall is ideal. I originally placed mine somewhat close to a corner and didn’t hear it’s full potential.
title: Size truly doesn’t matter

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David Evans
content: I bought this specifically for the sound quality and it has lived up to the hype 100%.  I use it in my new home office and it has been a great addition.  When I have a few minutes to listen to music during the day it really fills the room with sound.  I was a bit skeptical that it could tune itself to the room but it really seems to have done just that.  Plus it has all the great Alexa features you want.
title: Wow, really great audio quality.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Baggman
content: I upgraded from the Echo 2nd generations to these.  The sound quality is definitely better however music with a lot of symbols are lost.  Even if you turn off the stereo enhancement feature it’s a little better.  But it defeats the purpose of the clarity and depth.  So I would leave it on.  There were some minor tweets but with the help of Amazon’s Tech support my issue was solved quickly. Overall I would recommend them but pair two of them with the Echo sub.
title: Echo Studio Needs Improvements

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rich Marrese
content: I really like the studio cause the sound is so clear. It’s a little challenging to set it up. Once it’s set up it’s great. I’ve used this in the living room and the backyard. The only this is I wish the speakers had more bass. I’ve purchased the Alexa sub and am waiting for it. I have two paired up. Pairing was pretty easy and sound great together. I would have given 5 stars had they had more bass and set up would have been a bit easier.
title: Great speakers wish they had a bit more bass

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kornelia
content: Echo Speaker is nice, sound is good .  But Alexa ..... not even bit close to Google.  Disappointed. I give Alexa D  maybe C as grade  Wish it responded like Google.  Most of the time I get "I don't know or I don't understand "  come one amazone make Alexa and A not D .  So Echo as music player it's solid B +, Alexa on the other hand gets D.
title: Echo is great.  Alexa hmmm that's other story

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PhilG
content: I've had echos from the 1st gen until this one. i honestly don't hear any improved sound. its just bigger. the voice response seems less sensitive and we often have to repeat commands or raise our voice to get a response. whispering doesn't work well and my advice is get the cheaper model
title: meh! i dont get it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John L
content: Homepod sounds way better but just apple only is ridiculous, the only thing I they should change is the light should be visible from the side like the 3rd generation echo dot
title: Way better than homepod

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brohovsky
content: Averagely disappointed. It never heard me
title: It’s fine but it never hears me speak

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Thomas Foose
content: Purchased this speaker for our back porch. On initial start up the speaker conducted a sound test and adjusted itself to the acoustics. Love the sound from this speaker. Rate it’s performance well above the others Alexa speakers hands down.
title: Best Speaker out there.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RealAle For me
content: Its not a bright sounding as my Bose500 but it was much easier to integrate with Alexa! After a couple of weeks it started to distort, never played at high volume not not related to over driving it or anything. As soon as I see my refund I will be ordering a 2nd bose which is in my  checkout cart.
title: After a couple of weeks it started to distort

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Colin Potter
content: I bought this Echo to have next level sound in our bedroom - and it did not disappoint. Wow! Fantastic, clear, room-filling sound. Aux port allowed me to connect my CD player. Combined with Amazon Music Unlimited, I can hear all the songs I love on a fantastic sounding device.
title: Fantastic sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Review Guy
content: But I was proven wrong! This thing sounds amazing. It will easily replace a small sound system for a living room. I do think it could be a little cheaper, as it's pretty pricey. But I am happy with it none the less.
title: I was skeptical

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michelle K. Kasper
content: Really enjoying this upgrade. Sound is fantastic, but I'm not audio engineer. Great for music and podcast, every streaming movies through it in my kitchen when I'm working.
title: Sleek and small design - great audio impact

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: charlene t. houston
content: Simple instructions to follow in setting it up.  I especially enjoy playing music on it and the quality of the speakers are unbelievable.  I  have just begun to use a few of its many features. You do have to download the program onto your mobile phone to use many of its features.  You can use it to place a call and speak through it to any of the contacts you have listed in your mobile phone.  The possibilities are endless.
title: EASY TO USE

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael E. Stone
content: My Echo 1 attendant's voice is louder than the voice on this device, which is what I use the most.  However, for music this device is much better.  i do not like the light ring placement in this device.  My device is on my fireplace mantle and I cannot see the light ring from my seat in my family room, where I could on the other device.  These are fairly petty but I had the other device in this location for 4 years (still operating fine in another room).
title: On the fence.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Loyd
content: I was looking for a better speaker that integrated well with Alexa. I ordered the Studio with reservations. However, I must say the Studio out performed my expectations many times over. The sound is excellent. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for good sound at a reasonable price.
title: Great Product.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William A. Reising
content: Alexa is quite amazing.  I’m still learning what it can do.  The sound quality is great. My favorite so far is Alexa play the rain sound.. so it plays for an hour and shuts off...
title: I’m happy.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kathy Osbun
content: Works well with my dots. So have music throughout  the house. Love it.
title: Love it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeff D.
content: Sounds great just as advertised
title: Worth every penny

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: alejandra z.
content: I don’t know why people have been giving this less than 5 stars! I love my echo studio, the sound is amazing! Alexa works very well, I upgraded from the echo plus and it’s worth every penny!
title: Worth every penny!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David J Shimek
content: I would think a $200 speaker (times 2 for stereo) would sound better - Why is there no interface for sound control for my computer - I am listening to music on my computer and need to pull out my phone or IPad to adjust sound
title: Sound is just OK

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Charles Williams
content: Very happy with the purchase.  Yes there are better speakers available, but NOTHING comes close to these for the price.  The Studio has a very acceptable level of performance.
title: Great product even if it was twice the price.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sazqwatch
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Nice deep bass. Rich full sound experience. Way better than any other echo device. If you only plan on getting one Echo device, this should be your choice.
title: Best Echo Sound Hands Down

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott Girouard
content: I have set two of these up in a small cabin to take the place of a standard stereo. Great sound and have the advantage of Alexa as well. Next step is to hook my turntable up to them.
title: Great sound - almost as good as a small stereo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: J. Mac Berwick P.I.
content: Easy set up.  No Echo or any of my speakers except for my Bose ($1500 used) even comes close.  Combine it with more Echo devices and you have a concert in your bedroom!!!!!
title: The new speaker is amazing

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joey Zaza
content: Great speaker, awesome sound and capabilities
title: Love the Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Robert J. Hamburger
content: Easy to set up - nice sound
title: very nice sound  -good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DRG
content: Sound is fine, not the depth I imagined but just fine.  Problem is that it will arbitrarily shut off and discontinue playing.  When we request to continue playing Alexa say ok, then doesn't play.  Sometimes we have had a garbled song to which we have to shut it down.  We called a help number that was very good in helping us reboot the system.  But a day later it is doing the same thing.  Not sure if it is not cooperating with our internet but we never had these problems with the Dot.
title: Difficulty keeping the music going

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donald R Luther
content: Having this frees up a lot of space in the house.  Getting rid of a lot of CDs and stereo equipment.  The sound is as good as high end stereos from years ago.  Very acceptable for me.
title: Works great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom Barritt
content: Sound is very good for a small speaker - voice recognition has been spot on. I have had issues with Bluetooth with other speakers (Bose in particular) when connecting to any Alexa - nice to have it all in one and have great sound.
title: Sound and looks nice in the living room

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Denise Chalukian
content: I actually like it very much..  I was disappointed in the sound. I was hoping more of a stereo sound. I am thinking I may of been thinking of the sound of the subwolfer for more base. I might as well add that and see how that sounds. I can always return it. I have. The studio and two dots. I regifted my original Alexa. My friend loves the Alexa. I do to.
title: I am thinking of adding the subwoofer.I am hoping to get sterof a stereo sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Neuroscience Professor
content: I have had an Amazon Echo from the get go, but the sound does not compare with the Amazon Echo Studio I got for Christmas.  The sound is so rich and deep!  It fills my large living room like it was a concert hall.  Bravo, Amazon!
title: amazing sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David lee
content: The speaker was actually purchased to go in my garage. I love the fact that all my devices are connected throughout my house and able to play music and messages from anywhere.
title: Love

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: AnnieB
content: This speaker is comparable to other high end speakers of its size, and is reasonably priced.  It has real depth of sound and great balance. I highly recommend it.
title: Wonderful Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Julian L.
content: I really wanted this two work... I bought one Echo Studio and it was okay. Then I decided to buy the second one a day later for the Stereo Pair. Worst decision and waste of Money! I can't listen to Spotify at all. A song will play and ten seconds later it drops and I have to hit play again. Such a huge inconvenience for anyone who just wanted to listen to their Spotify playlist. Just might end up returning both of them and Buying the Sonos One with Alexa as well.
title: I really wanted this to work..

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yusniel Fernandez
content: It was a bit overhyped in my opinion. But it does sound very good, much better than Echo Plus. It’s much better now to listen if I have it paired with my phone via Bluetooth for music. I recommend it if you will buy it for listening to music often.
title: Very good for listening to music.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary Stiltjes
content: Every single time I try to use this with our 4K fire stick and Sony TV the video and audio jump off sync if I pause or fast forward a commercial. I’ve tried messing around with the audio settings from the tech site, still doesn’t work. I should return it, but the audio for music is really impressive. My other disappointment is that it won’t pair with the fire stick remote.
title: I’m so disappointed.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dorothy
content: This is my favorite Alexa so far.  Quick response to voice commands, ability to listen to Sirius channels, etc.  The sound quality is excellent.  Definitely a good investment.
title: Excellent sound quality.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Marshall
content: I use this mainly for music, I have a few other connected speakers and it sounds really good, the music is noticeably clearer. The bass is a little lacking in my opinion but it does have a little bit of bass. I ordered 2 for my small living room but it was too small of a room to make a difference, so keep that in mind if you want to order 2 for stereo pair.
title: Great Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David Hallene
content: 3D radio was impressive. I purchased the echo studio mainly for the built in hub. Amazon tech support was way off in regards helping with integration. Thank goodness for “You Tube”.
title: Great speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: T. Garmon
content: Perfect for my outdoor area.
title: Great speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brian J. Melton
content: It’s nice until the music cut out constantly please I have a song shut off then I’ll start on the next song play half shut off Doesn’t with metal country opera any type of music
title: Go silent

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: SBMongoos
content: Sounds much better when the volume is turned up. Remember you can go into the Alex app and change the highs, mids and lows. Haven't tried the 3D music yet.
title: Nice speaker..

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kindle Customer Fan
content: The Speaker is way Nice. But its almost the worst to listen to the Radio on it(Radio Adds keep on saying "Alexa" IN THEIR ADDS). Just change her name then you will be fine.
title: The speaker is great but...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brittany Nichole
content: I wish she could hear our voice a little better over the music. I also wish she didn’t have to be plugged in to use all the time! Other than those two things, the sound is fantastic!
title: Less than great voice recognition

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jennifeo
content: It sounds fantastic. It's just really large. I wish it were a little smaller.
title: Great Sound / Too big

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Robert C. Fliss
content: I am just getting to know everything that Echo can do! It is totally amazing and I highly recommend it to everyone. Alexa play music! Alexa print a crossword puzzle! Alexa tell me a joke! Alexa do whatever!
title: Alexa can do most everything! Just ask.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeffrey D
content: As described.
title: Good value

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Elien R.
content: Buy the complete setup,2 echo studios and a subwoofer and set them as a home theater, complete waste of money, after months of use the left one fails a lot,the right one won’t power on if there’s a power outage, you will have to restart, the lip sync is terrible, the subwoofer equalizer needs a lot of work, on low volume gives you a good bass, but if you raise the volume the sub doesn’t equalize well. I do not recommend this product at all.
title: Complete waste of money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shaquille
content: The sound is incredible! The bass is super clean. The voice recognition is kinda weak. It’s usually takes about 2 tries to get alexa’s attention. I generally have to yell a little bit.
title: Pretty good speaker for the money!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yarg
content: Great speaker as a stand alone or paired with other Alexa devices. Best sound than any of the previous devices. Would be nicer if it were portable.
title: Very Cool

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Otoniel Gonzalez
content: This is hands down the best smart speaker for the price. It sounds excellent and you can’t beat Alexa. I’m tempted to buy a second one so I can replace my home theater soundbar. I just wish the whole Fire Stick/Cube wasn’t necessary for movies and such. Other than that I highly recommend this speaker. It’s bonkers!
title: Excellent!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: mizzy
content: Best sounding echo especially when used with hd Amazon music
title: Best echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alan Smithee
content: Good bass response.  I am not an audiophile, and this speaker meets my needs perfectly. Really fills the room with music.  It is a bit large and placing it in a. Unobtrusive spot may be a challenge.
title: Overall Good Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alfred J. Hardwick
content: Awesome sound from a small speaker
title: Quality 3D music sound hearing every instrument played

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yep!
content: Great product!
title: Great product!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: GAH-Cinci
content: The sound on this device is wonderful! The only thing I was disappointed by, was I couldn't get hooked up to my Samsung large screen TV. I was hoping I could.
title: Nice addition to my Alexa devices! Best one yet!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Big Hoss
content: The sound is amazing for it's size. I use this as a base and have 5 echo dots throughout our home. When we say to play music everywhere, we get music and quality sound everywhere. This is by far one of Amazon's best devices yet.
title: You can actually hear the difference.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: trustyson
content: A good "echo" device but the sound didn't have the punch I was hoping.  My similar size Bose speakers sound deeper.  Perhaps just need a separate subwoofer.
title: Medium sound - hoped for better bass.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tohouri Bailly
content: You don't know how good this thing is until you feed it right. I am going from my Sharp TV to my old Sony E9000ES via a digital cable. I then go trough a Behringer FBQ 3102. And then I go to the Echo Studio. The sound from this Girl here is clean and you get some base that you would expect from a 12" sub. I didn't notice any distortion. Now, if you're crazy like I am and you throw in 2 Definitive Technology SC2000, you'll feel an earthquake with the sound still clean all around..
title: Wow! This is all you need

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R. Moore
content: Better than the original but some design features could be better. Top light ring not noticeable enough. Needs a dimable clock/ day date/ weather, with color choices.
title: Good  but improveable

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nathan C. H.
content: I have this paired with a sub and I usually have it with an echo when I play music and the three together are the perfect system for music in an open style home. Great base and full surround sound.
title: Excellent

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brian R. Williams
content: This is the best Echo stand-alone device so far to play music. The sound quality is generally quite good but can be a bit muddy and boomy with strong bass. It reminds me of Bose systems of the past. Incrediably simple to set up and use!
title: New Studio is the best so far

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Oswald Bruce
content: I bought the Echo Studio with the idea of pairing it to the Fire TV and use it as a sound enhancement for the TV I have in my room.  In two weeks since I've had it has been giving me so much trouble that the only solution is to unpair them and factory reset the Fire TV (which has worked flawlessly before buying the Echo Studio).  This solution was the only option tech support gave me after running some other options.  This works until the next time it doesn't...
title: Not a very good Fire TV companion

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Venugopal S.
content: I created a stereo system with 2 echo studios and a fire stick 4k. By and large the system works well when content originates from the fire stick 4k. I wish Amazon puts the mini toslink connections to better use. In my configuration toslink is useless. Any input from toslink connection works with only the connected speaker the other speaker in the pair doesn't get the signal. If they address this issue, a couple of these speakers connected to TVs would improve the experience quite a bit.
title: Excellent sound quality, but there is room for improvement on the integration front

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: peter chanh hung wong
content: The Bluetooth connection with my pc is not automatically connecting the studio . It should be automatic connect to my pc desktop every time I turn on my desktop computer but it’s not .
title: Connection issue

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevin D. Howell
content: Bought this for a sun porch we had just completed. Only had for a week, but love it so far.  Perfect for the space. Great sound quality. Like being able to link other Alexa devices together.
title: Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bob Sprague
content: While the studio is much larger than other echo speakers it isn't nearly as large as it sounds. The sound is clear and robust with crystal clear highs, clean midrange and deep bass. Amazon has really pulled off a significant feat with this speaker.
title: Incredible sound in a small package

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ameya
content: Echo Studio sounds simply awesome. But it stops working randomly(reported that issue and waiting for fix, I am really hoping it to be a software issue). I’ll update my review once issue is fixed. But the sound quality and compatibility  is definitely something that beat it’s competitors(And I am talking about HomePod).
title: Best sounding speaker in the category (however has a bug)

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jenny Pooh
content: Sounds awesome!  It doesn’t listen to me so perfectly at times (not a usual occurrence) but I’m a mom so I’m used to having to repeat myself at times!!
title: LOVE IT!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JKirkpat
content: Music playback sounds great, audio through an auxiliary cord is quiet. My biggest problem is the damn thing turns on by itself in the middle of the night and starts blasting music. Also turns music on full blast every time I tell it to turn the lights off.
title: Randomly starts playing music

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew Foster
content: This thing is amazing. It is a good bit bigger than I expected but after hearing the amount of sound it puts out I know why. The studio will not just fill the room with sound but super high quality crystal clear highs and mids and deep lows. Super impressed and considering purchasing another one.
title: Best Echo Yet!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Harry Mannbach
content: Not ready for prime time technology. Got two of these with the ECHO sub and audio is constantly sputtering while watching a movie over my 4k fire stick (200Mb connection, 2.4,5 mimo ac2100 router 20 feet away)
title: Not Ready for Primetime

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ryan Walls
content: Through much fanfare I was very excited about this product. I purchased two of them to make a stereo pair for my fire cube TV and echo sub. After two minutes both speakers stop working and all I hear is the echo sub. Even restarting the television and the echo cube nothing seems to fix this issue. Unplugging the units and powering him back up still no affect. I hope this is a update fix in the future. At this point I am just very frustrated.
title: Great product when it works!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Warren Chow
content: Replaced a Bowers and Wilkins Zeppelin that died. Sound isn't as good, but good enough. Voice commands work well most of the time. Sometime she has a mind of it's own and will do things on it's own, or make beeping sounds in the middle of the night. Lots of room for improvement but generally happy with quality and performance.
title: Great sound, good voice recognition

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: gochris
content: Music sound quality is good, but when it's paired with the TV, it doesn't play as loud.  I have it on the patio, so it would be nice if it would play louder.
title: Great for music.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: SBA
content: The Regular echo work better , something is loss signals
title: Hard to connect to WiFi

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: dmcm044
content: Doesnt respond well.  Doesnt work well with firecube tv.  Sound quality is not very good.  idea is good but it's just not ready for prime time.
title: Not bery good sound quality.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard Mckenzie
content: We wanted better sound in our kitchen than we could get from the medium size Echo, and we got in this package better than we could have expected.
title: Great sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: drawde mahgninnuc
content: Absolutely love this addition to my Echo family! Paired with my Fire stick and movies sound amazing!! Getting the sub soon to enhance the sound!
title: Love this!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Myron E. Thompson
content: Echo Studio delivers music the way you want it, either low and soft or loud and strong depending on the music you like.  It is a little heavy and right so with the hardware inside.  A little costly, but then the small size delivers the sound...
title: This will deliver the sound you want!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andy Small
content: This is a great speaker for my living room.Love the Dolby feature and off course Alexa.Can connect to fire stick for great sound for movies or videos.
title: Great Echo Studio!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mark A
content: If you think the echo is good this studio is 10 times better and louder with clarity.  The bass will shake the floor.  Voice recognition is more sensory even and louder volumes.  Amazon must have!!!!
title: Amazing quality and sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Glenn Roberts
content: Fantastic room-filling sound. Crystal clear. Would I buy another one?  Absolutely and I will.  These can be paired for stereo sound.
title: Best of Amazon's Smart Speakers

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D Dear
content: The best echo yet.  The sound is amazing
title: Worth the money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kim
content: I purchased this as a gift and my son loves it. The sound is amazing. The bass was much better than I had expected. Probably the best gift I have given him in many years.
title: Highly recommend.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Felix Ramos
content: Love the sounds and I can get Alexa to play my music from amazon
title: Love the studio sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bcook043
content: Im very impressed with the sound quality
title: Superb

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Josue
content: Echo Studio is amazing when reproducing music with potent bass notes, even when we play them on low sound volume. Also, its native integration with Alexa makes it extremely easy to interact with the device using voice control, only. I have had an Echo Studio for several months, now, and the only time I touched it was when I first turned it on! I can highly recommend the purchase, as I am extremely satisfied with mine.
title: Potent Bass Notes

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James F. Maughan
content: Blue light is on top difficult to see so not sure is Alexa is  activated. Should circle the side like of Alexa devices. Sound is better than other Alexa products. Better base form downward facing speaker
title: Alexa Lighting & Confirmation & Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Old Dan
content: Outstanding sound. I purchased 2 for stereo sound. Small footprint with great sound, easy to set up and use. Bought 1 for my sister in law who often needs help with electronics but she set this up in minutes
title: Great sound for price - buy 2

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JoEllen Clary
content: Excellent sound and superb sub woofer for a speaker that size.  Two units can replace surround sound system when watching movies/TV-sound is really that good in a small to mid-sized room.  Excellent for bedroom or sitting room.  Highly recommend it.
title: Superb sound in a small package at a great price, plus it has Alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John W
content: It set itself up when I plugged it in, so that was easy.  The sound quality is really good.  The bass is stronger than I thought it would be.  The whole range is good.
title: Real nice

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R. Prakash
content: Lives up to the excellent reviews. I'm using it as expernal pc speaker, with analog input. Works well for that too. Sometimes the audio goes to power save, but a loud volume on the input line will wake it up.
title: Lives up to the excellent reviews.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jman911TTS
content: I like the Studio much better than the Apple HomePod, deeper bass, better midrange but it's significantly bigger than the HomePod.  Overall, I would highly recommend the Studio.
title: Nice speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Peter
content: Very disappointed with sound quality and mics. I have to screen so Alexa can hear me and I sound was no better than my Echo Plus, even after disabling 3D audio.
title: No better than Echo Plus

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott H.
content: Still getting used to her but so far love it. Music and controls are very convenient, audiophiles might pick it apart but for normal folk its does a great job. Set alarms, ask questions about just about anything mainstream, recipes, news weather, capitol of Kazakhstan, flip a coin or whatever. Haven't got into the home controls yet but I will, lots to still explore!
title: Love it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R. H. Grubbs
content: So far so good...easy set up, great quality and sound..
title: Quality Product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sal Agnello
content: Sound quality wasn’t as good as I was expecting after seeing and reading other reviews. With that said, I do like the Alexa functionality and hub built in. I haven’t tried it for movies yet, but with Atmos Firestick functionality it is something that adds a nice bit of additional flexibility.
title: Sound Quality Lacking

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: L. Clark
content: Really enjoy the sound coming from this and plan to purchase a 2nd one!
title: Very pleased!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sam
content: Audio quality fantastic. But I still think the Echo Dot Plus out preforms this thing as far as other features are concerned. For example, the Studio cannot sense temperature but the Echo Dot Plus can. Was it worth the money? Idk, I have mixed feelings about it.
title: Good Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Taylor
content: This is the true "Echo Pro"! Best sound and has all the perks of a standard Echo.
title: Echo Studio can also be known as "Echo Pro"

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ralph Andrews
content: The sound quality is terrific. Waiting to add Sub for even greater enjoyment.  The Amazon install instruction could be better, Such as need to disconnect VPI for TV theater set up. Explanation of Groups and Rooms can be better.
title: Gray value, some set up issues.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jb
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I didn’t accept this from Amazon echo studio. And it scared the sit out of my little one when the sound starts to warble.till the time you don’t say Alexa stop.cannot connect iPhone with Bluetooth setting . I put the video of the sound .
title: Really upset with this product warbling tabling sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Iamhere
content: Since there are not many 3D recordings, I added 3rd Gen Echo and sound quality is much better, although it is not Stereo. You can't use Studio with Echo to do stereo. Only 2 echos can pair.
title: Good Sound Quality Especially With 3D Recordings.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Harry Sebastian Montgomery
content: The sound quality is great! One can adjust the bass, and treble from the alexa app.  Alexa works really well. Has a lot of features. I would recommend a Subwoofer bar, if you want a home theatre quality. But, if you are just listening to music, or need a good sounding speaker for home gatherings, this speaker is perfect!! I just hope the product lasts me at least 3-5 years.
title: Awesome speaker when compared to the Apple Home Pod

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jsnchmpn
content: This thing sounds AMAZING!  I heard one on display and pre-ordered it.  I am very happy with this purchase.  My girlfriend is jealous of Alexa now!
title: Quality Sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Emilio Paredes
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Mientras funciono todo bien, unas sola semana de uso, se cambio de la sala a la cocina y no volvió a prender y me cuesta casi 100 dólares devolverlo desde mi país para que me puedan devolver el dinero y Desde mi Panamá no sale código en su página para llamar a el servicio al cliente o que me llamen para que me den una respuesta.
title: Mi Echo Studio no funciona

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: keenan park
content: sounds really good for it's size it's about as big as a large folgers can and heavy but I like it think I might get another for stereo sound but it's  pretty good stand alone

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dario Aguilar
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Excelente dispositivo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Todd C. Lawrence
content: Love everything about it.  Fills the room it is in.  I wasn't able to use the android app, though.  I had to use the Alexa web interface.
title: Amazing sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: philbear
content: Had a bit of trouble getting these set up as a pair.Have 2 +a sub.They sometimes unpair and occasionally won't turn off.Just got these so still playing around with them.Will update in a week or so!
title: Not quite as impressive as I expected

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Red
content: This smart speaker is definitely worth the buy! Great sound and volume. It’s definitely the best we have out of all of our amazon devices !
title: Best sound I have found!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yvonne carver
content: Awesome product!! Awesome sound.. I think the only thing missing to make it better is the ability to disconnect it from the charger and make it wireless so I can move it to my back yard.. but that’s why I bought the echo dot !!
title: Very Good Acoustics!! Wonderful sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chelsea Mellott
content: We were very eager to try this after we had so much trouble connecting a new Bose speaker to our account.  We returned that speaker to get the Studio and couldn't be happier.  It sounds great and connects seamlessly to our dots.  I will say that the sound doesn't quite have the body as the Bose...but then again, it's almost half the price.  I couldn't be happier with our purchase and will definitely be getting another one in the future. I think two of them would sound even better!
title: Sounds great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: lewlew
content: Love almost everything about this! Sound is amazeballs!! Voice recognition isn’t perfect, but it’s better than the Echo Show.
title: We are going to buy another!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mayme lea
content: This is by far the best alexa device I have bought. The sound is amazing. You can have the volume full blast and alexa still responds. Extremely easy to get set up. By far a 10 out of 5 star! Would most deff suggest buying this.
title: Amazing alexa!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Skeldog
content: Really responsive, I can whisper the awake work and it hears that
title: Better that echo dots. Sensitive mic pick up

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cory S.
content: Amazing sound!
title: Great sound and amazing product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dustin McKie
content: It’s disappointing when a product is marketed exclusively for another product which is almost nonexistent. I can hardly find 3D music outside of the sanctioned Amazon playlists and there is no way to find what else may be out there without going on a needle in the haystack search. I’m extremely disappointed by this product which was marketed on a service in which I pay a monthly subscription for and is nearly nonexistent 2 months after launch.
title: Deceptive marketing and disappointing implementation

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Beverly
content: I like using this with the Fire Stick. I added one Echo Dot with it and it sounds very good. I plan on adding another Echo Dot to the mix.
title: Sounds great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ikehayden
content: The sound is real good for its size.....but I wasn’t blown away....I was a little disappointed after watching and reading the great reviews on it.
title: Ehhh.....it’s ok.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: qigongdoc
content: It was way easier to hook up than the sub and it sounds better. You don’t have to worry which speaker is compatible, they all are in a group.
title: Better than the sub

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jon
content: Better sound but not worth the upgrade. Large footprint is also hard to conceal. Would love this if audio quality was a couple steps higher or possibly as a first echo device

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RJMc
content: This is definitely an improvement over the standard Echo, but if you are looking for a huge difference, you're likely to be disappointed.
title: Good, but not great.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Debra Robinson
content: I love this speaker. The bass is great!! It’s a great addition to the 5 dots that we have, bringing the bass in for our surround sound! Definitely worth the money.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Little Momma
content: So I bought a Sony sound bar for my TV and Alexa. 6 months later after being unhappy with the sound quality but live the subwoofer on the Sony-I bought this! I’m in heaven, I’m ok with technology but not great-this was easy to setup and use. It sounds amazing and I have a 1700 square foot home-it sounds great everywhere!! Don’t buy the sound bar-get this!!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Duc Nguyen
content: Very good speaker. I hooked it up to a my Hisense TV equipped with a Fire TV Stick 4k. And it connect the Fire TV flawlessly through Alexa. The sound is good enough for movie and music.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mike M.
content: Bass, volume. a little let down by that, but sound quality is excellent, and has been a great start to turning my home into a smart one.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Grace L. Suarez
content: A compact speaker with Alexa and room filling sound. Also connects to Fire TV Stick 4K for great sound from your TV set. I’m very happy.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: carey boethel
content: The audio qualities of this item are a great value for the money. The effectiveness and functionality qualities are superb comparatively speaking.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tim Ryan
content: Its loud, it sounds good and it works well. However amazon wont allow it to be used as a home theater setup unless its paired with a fire tv. Very annoying.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ZDR
content: What was the deal of the day price on Jan 7 2020? Need your help, thanks!! Hook up easy. Only tested preliminarily, but so far so good!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Linda Enbar
content: I primarily use my studio to play music from my spotify account it constantly disconnects. A lot of times when I try to play from spotify it wont even start playing on the speaker. Not sure if a spotify issue with the studio specifically or a studio problem. never had a problem with spotify on any other alexa device though

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: CDG
content: A great addition to my Alexa/Echo series.....excellent sound quality for my family room and easy to install/integrate.  Works seamless like all Alexa devices.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chuck V
content: I spent 169.99 and bought 2 speakers they are  very good speakers , however they are a bit bulky and for that reason I returned them i found a very good deal on the BOSE 500  but they are  still 50 - 80 dollars more than the Echo Studio , if you have a larger area and size is not an issue , I would say buy the Echo Studio speakers tweak them with the Alexa app and you will really enjoy the outstanding sound from these speakers
title: Its a Pretty darn good speaker and for the price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sean
content: I bought this for my Patio and the quality is just what I was looking for. No need for complicated multi speaker system, just plug it in and you have great music and sound.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Plowguy4
content: I use it all the time for lots of things, timers, reminders, shopping list, and especially MUSIC. This thing has awesome sound and very happy with it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steven G Moore
content: I love it! I will be buying another one! That's if I can find a place for all my speakers. Sounds  great, great quality, easy setup.  Its worth the price!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TFC
content: Exceeds my high expectations! Like it so much, I’ve ordered a second!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gerry k.
content: Was extremely shocked by the purity of the sound that came out of this item wish it was a little cheaper I would buy two but such as it is 200 bucks but it works great with my Smart plugs still having difficulty connecting with harmony but I think it’s my programming need some clarity was disappointed no owners manual think that should be included with the price you pay

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: S. Leung
content: Echo is supposed to be a smart device, but....if you tell Alexa "increase the volume by 10%" it will put the volume at 100%.  What a stupid device.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: RONALD MCMILLAN
content: Excellent sound considering the cost. Would recommend

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa

content: I replaced the original Echo in my exercise room with this speaker and it was a great upgrade.  A bonus is that it also includes a ZigBee hub.  I was impressed with the bass and it fills the room with sound that I can hear over the sound of the treadmill.  I will be looking to buy another one when I find the right price point on Amazon.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mack
content: It's hands down the best speaker in the echo lineup. It is superb in every regard. I love it so much I'm buying a second one to pair with it and the subwoofer.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kandi Kerns
content: I held off purchasing for too long! How could this little speaker fill a room with 18 ft ceilings and a whole lot of space? I'm blown away. Rich sounds and a great base.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steven
content: I'm really surprised with the sound quality of these speakers. I bought two and joined them as left and right. Great sound and great look.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dave B
content: I usually dont write reviews, however, I feel very strongly about the Echo Studio and want others to know that you will not be disappointed with this purchase. I am excited to buy another and run these babies in stereo. I am BLOWN AWAY  by how it sounds by itself. I am also interested in using these with my television for their Dolby Atmos capabilities. GREAT BUY!!!!!!!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: North Dakotan
content: Alexa requires some things to be said in n a specific way.  I don’t talk AI.  I have music on YouTube, but that doesn’t integrate.  Some frustration with Bluetooth Alexa Dots.  Voice, my sic will have lay on one at any time.  Just bugs that require better human integration, setup..

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: UniqueCJ
content: This speaker is great! This is one of the best speakers I own. The sound quality is amazing and the bass is crazy! I love it. This speaker is definitely worth the money. I will be purchasing more.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: renato g.villanueva

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Foofoodust
content: Audio quality is good (not great).  Good value.  Small size. Nice appearance.  Alexa commands are mostly effective (not always).

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Larry Leverett
content: When I read the description of this product I was very impressed, But although good it isn't much better than my original Alexa.
title: Thought it would be better than first model

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Luis
content: An excellent speaker. I can’t stress how amazing this echo studio is; I’ll keep it simple: (1) beautiful crisp sound (2) excellent subwoofer (3) Beautiful crisp sound If you love listening to music on a daily basis, stop thinking about it and get the echo studio. I highly recommend it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: GregS
content: Decent speaker -- but the 3D sound capabilities are in my opinion over hyped.  Have also noticed occasional issues with video/audio synchronization when paired with a 4K FireTV stick that can generally be cured by briefly pausing the video.  Overall I like the speaker and will likely pick up a second to pair with the first, but you need to be realistic about your expectations...
title: It's... OK.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jenna B.
content: The sound quality is wonderful, Alexa can hear me from another room or while she’s blasting my toons. I’ve installed this as the speaker for my tv and don’t have any issues with sound matching mouths moving or anything.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andres Sarmiento
content: Wow! I wasn't expecting it would sound that good! Its loud crisp and clear with a very nice bass. I definitely recommend it. I would record a video but the audio wont do it justice, definitely give it a try

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cameron mcletoy
content: I bought from Best Buy. Was looking at Bose or Sonos. I listened to Echo Studio and loved the sound. Looked at box and said Bluetooth. I thought like 99% other sound bars, or sound cubes could play music. NOPE. You have to have WiFi to use the device and I bought for my office. No WiFi. Was highly disappointed because I loved sound. Ughhhhhhhh
title: You have to use WIFI. You can’t use as a speaker without. Didn’t know. No where on box.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donald g.
content: This product has connectivity issues. My WiFi works great but every time I come home the studio doesn’t work and I have to always reconnect it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Callahan
content: I bought this because I am hard of hearing and I have two other Alexis so now I have one in my bedroom one in my living room and one in my garage which are out on three different levels. I had one of the first echoes that came out came out and I still like it very much it’s the Echo Dot and I use it more than anything because it’s right beside my bed. I am 87 years old.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: wess2k7
content: Sound cuts out a lot and speaker constantly didn't respond.  When it works it is fantastic but too many bugs make it a no go for me

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: C Smith
content: I love this Echo Studio speaker.  The only flaw is that for the money, it really should be a little louder with a tad more base but I suppose it gets the job done.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DK
content: Up until yesterday it kept turning the music off by itself after an hour or so but recently it has stayed on.  It was claiming that there wasn’t any activity for hours when it had only been an hour if that.  However , it just stopped doing that.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Leslie Smith
content: I love this speaker. Alexa is very helpful, knowledgeable and humorous. My musical requests are almost always recognized and played. The volume reaches high levels w/ good clarity. Alexa is very useful for setting alarms, stating facts and providing the weather forecast. She also tells jokes and can rap. When I ask a question that she can't answer, she replies that she doesn't know the answer. I'd recommend this Echo Studio to everyone.
title: This product is a great investment

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Calypso
content: Sound quality is far superior to Apple HomePod and Google Home Max, but Alexa still struggles to follow basic commands.
title: Great sound, frustrating to use.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Val Ross
content: The sound is amazing and feels the room completely. We have had if for a week and I don't think it has ever missed a command.
title: Nice to see such improvement.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: redhead
content: One of the best purchases we made...so happy with clarity,the speaker plays music beautifully.... We love this speaker.
title: Love this

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brandon H.
content: This speaker sounds ten times more robust than the standard echo. Fills the room with great bass and sounds much bigger than the footprint it takes up. Highly recommend
title: Buy this now

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Courtney A. Deuser
content: Our kitchen/dining room/sitting room are all in a very open space on the first floor of our house. This thing is great for providing quality sound in the entire space. I am still getting acquainted with Alexa and all they have to offer, but so far, the ease of use has been outstanding.
title: Great in an open space!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Xputtos
content: Echo Studio fits in with my video wall.  High Def Flat screens with Amazon HD Sound completes in home studio experience.  Intend to continue with Wifi lighting and wifi light switches at later date.  Echo Studio can act as my household WiFi Hub.  Controlling all rooms in the house; lighting, HVAC Control.  Over time Echo will be the hub I use to make my digital home come true.
title: Excellent voice integration with very high quality sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: gary
content: Well the only thing is it doesn't have enough bass for me I like just a little more bass but other than that its first rate.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa

content: It doesnt work with you tube. Google is more effective, they are better with voice commands, alexa plays anything even if she doesn't understand the command

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Walter Davis
content: The sound quality is much better than the previous echo, but I still wish it was even better.  Overall, I happy with the device, but the mics do not pickup voice commands as well as the previous echo.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chappy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shawn
content: Great quality sound.  I have a dot, fire cube and an older Alexa and this thing blows them away as far as sound quality goes.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa

content: The sound quality is incredibly good for the price. I use it in my room for Pandora music and it is plenty loud, and it hits all the right notes.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Anonymous1
content: I really like this smart speaker. It sounds really good in my opinion. It is easy to pair other devices (phone, tablet, laptop) to it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David in Boise
content: Sounds really good for its size. Fills the room with really good quality sound. Bass is good nice and deep. Crisp all the way around. Good buy.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Karen S
content: I have not needed tech support so I have no clue how it would be but the studio itself is loud and awesome.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nicole

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jkenn
content: Set up was easy. It sounds great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Paul

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary Angelee Seitz
content: Disappointed! There is plenty of bass, but the music does sound like it's coming out of a little box. It's slightly better than the Echo Show, but not enough to keep it. I don't understand how other reviewers can say it's like the musicians are really there.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jacquelyn D. Summerlin
content: The sound quality is different from the quality of the display item in the store.  Have to now purchase a sub-wolfer to improve  the bass.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew Huff
content: I love the product pretty good sound. but if you need to yell at the thing to turn up or down or to change music it seems to be a problem.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William G Smith

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: steven coster
content: It sounds beautiful and was super easy to set up. I have other Alexa devices so I just plugged it in and it did the rest.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Elizabeth
content: The only complaint I have is it could be a little louder. I use it in a workshop and would like it to be a little louder.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: End User Jay
content: I bought when it was 15% on sale, sound better than echo plus 2, sound quality is base on where you place your unit. I had to adjust equalizer for maximum bass to feel it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: John Palmer
content: Doesn't get extremely loud, but the quality is top notch and the integration and pairing with other studios and subs is great.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P. White
content: This is a great sounding speaker for it's size. The way it seems to fill the room around you is incredible for the price.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jose Romero
content: Great sound and features, the only flaw is that when it’s connected to tv via optic cable you can’t control volume from your tv remote.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jenrap
content: Based on what other reviewers said, I purchased 2 speakers to pair in stereo.  It really does make a difference.  When I start music and sometimes only one speaker plays,  I can tell immediately.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B.A.
content: This is beautiful sound and I’m very happy with it. It was very easy to set up and connect to my Amazon dots and my TV.
title: Very easy to set up and great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom H
content: Received as a Christmas present, love it, sounds great, recommend, works great with all our echo and smart home lights.
title: Love my Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MX Fan
content: I read comments about pairing it with a second Echo studio and I beleve that is a very good idea to complete a good speaker and make the combo great!
title: Echo studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: m.haynes
content: I don’t notice much difference between this and the standard Echo or Echo Plus. Certainly not enough to justify the price difference. Buy two Echos and get stereo sound instead.
title: Meh. Not much to get excited about.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lotus Fairy
content: This thing sounds like it's packed with alien technology! Lol, this thing legit sounds like a $1500 deep Badd home theater system.
title: Alexa with crazy deep bass that sounds like a $1500 home theater system

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Greg
content: Got this for the garage to integrate Amazon music in addition to the Echo Link.  The sound is so awesome we plan to buy more for other rooms.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chris
content: The sound is definitely way better than other Echo devices, and fills our kitchen with great sound. The voice recognition -seems- like it doesn’t always operate quite as well as the other echo devices but it very well could be just because I have the volume up a lot louder a lot and maybe base is interfering. Otherwise, it’s an Echo with a subwoofer and we like it a lot.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Steven Crandell
content: Sound quality isn’t as good as advertised. It’s better than the other models, but that’s a low  standard to beat.  The Apple HomePod sounds much better.
title: Sound quality is just okay

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Scott
content: I set up 2 of these devices in a pair, and had them play some music as a pair. At first, the balance seemed a bit off, but soon, it was perfect. It had adjusted itself for the room perfectly. I'm hearing things in songs I had never heard before.. a bass riff here, the individual voices in a harmony there... this is better than even high end headphones.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: LRC
content: I bought 2 for studio surround sound with Dolby atoms on my fire tv. The sound is good when it works but it constantly disconnects and skips and cuts out. Wish I could return them.
