product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mike G
content: I was honestly expecting a little more on sound quality.  I ordered the upgrade  amazon HD  for extra cost hoping to get more out if this speaker but I didn't notice much improvement.
title: Had high Hope's.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: runnerbwoy
content: Very disappointed in the fact that it would not link with my two echoes to simulate a surround sound and the bass was sub-par.
title: Echo studio disappointing.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew S. Hecht
content: Great sound quality! I have several in my house, and recently gave some Prime-Day ones as gifts. The one I use the most is in my bedroom on my night-stand; I use it as an alarm clock, a radio (with TuneIn Radio), for emergency weather alerts and daily weather, music (Amazon Music Unlimited, my Pandora radio stations), and to manage-and-control Alexa-enabled home devices.
title: Great sound quality!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andy S
content: Great speaker at a great price.  I have a second one arriving today to pair with my first one (that I received shortly after these were released).  The whole Ultra HD and 3D music subscription is not a gimmick and sounds wonderful...if you're a music lover like me this is an excellent and fairly priced device to enjoy listening to music and movies!
title: Fantastic, exceeded my expectations!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Shortt S.
content: Sometimes not all the time, when you ask Alexa to stop she continues to play forcing you to repeat yourself more than once sometimes up to five times.
title: Awesome quality sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DJ Bossman
content: A GREAT disappointment. Truly one of the WORST purchases in my life. Within 6 months the Bluetooth & WiFi connectivity stopped working. Can’t even use the speaker wired with an audio cable. The app is STUPID and useless. Complete waste of money. Can’t wait until Apple comes out with a similar product because EVERYTHING Apple just works flawlessly.
title: Buyers Remorse

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cadeslayton
content: https://www.amazonforum.com/forums/devices/echo-alexa/529298-sound-latency-with-echo-studio Delay in audio when hooked up to TV via cable. I purchased specifically for this reason. Will definitely return if Amazon doesn't have a solution prior to my return eligibility...  They have a fix for this on the fire stick and cube.
title: Audio latency

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Anthony A.
content: The sound quality is amazing. Set up is quick. Defently worth it
title: A must buy. Defently worth it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mathew C.
content: I love this speaker! Great sound and really good bass from an Amazon speaker. Once I went into the Alexa app and brought the highs and Mids up a little bit the sound was fantastic. I will definitely be buying another one.
title: Amazing Sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sherry Christensen
content: The Alexa Echo Studio is amazing.  My husband loves it.  It delivers great sound quality and has so many options available to my Prime account.
title: Echo Studio rocks

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: TheFerg
content: I have several echo dots around the house. I bought the Echo Studio so I could have it by my TV and have a superior sound. The sound is weak, empty with no substance behind it. For the money, I'd just keep my dots.
title: Hollow sound from such a big device.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joshua
content: I LOVE THE MUSIC ON THIS DEVICE!! However, I also use the Studio as a sound bar for my tv (it is an older tv so this is just my experience with that), and a lot of the time, the sibilant sounds from dialogue seem to distort the tweeter. I’m not sure if it has to do with some sort of age difference between the technologies, but it’s a bit disconcerting to be listening to a show and that distortion occurs every few minutes.
title: Not the best for TV sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Deb Ackley
content: Sound is better and I’m glad I spent the extra $ to get this. Looks nicer in my living room then the other models.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Christopher R Wuerthner
content: I bought the Echo Studio to link with my Firestick 4K.  I tried for hours to link the two and it never HAPPENED.  So I returned it.  Don't buy it.
title: Does not link with Firestick 4K.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ancient mariner
content: its loud with really nice sound, however, some songs mid range are a little out of whack. but it is worth the money
title: wow!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PM
content: This was a gift for my wife as I could not stand her playing music through the dots.  The sound quality was such that my neighbors ordered one the next day for their home.
title: excellent sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kristina
content: Definitely a great product as far as sound,  and functionality.  When it comes to registering my voice with saying "alexa" it isnt the best. My echo 3rd gen seems to be better in the mic aspect. Either way, great product for the price. And sounds very very good. Not sure why people arent a fan of the 3d audio or whatever its called, sounds great with it on, and worse with out. But to each their own.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Craig Doner
content: I am using 2 Studio speakers as a stereo pair.  The sound is amazing and it was easy to set them up.  Highly recommend!
title: Great Sound espescially in stereo.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B1GTED
content: Studios are great single or paired.  Great sound.  Great bass.  I use them with their line level in port with my PC.  PC gaming has never sounded better!!
title: Great sounding speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Derek Williams
content: Excellent sound. Syncs up with my fire stick HD quite nicely.  It definitely fills the room with high quality audio when you call for it. “Pair” (pun intended) this with your TV and Amazon Music HD for a truly pleasant experience.
title: Excellent product

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Neal K. Wagner
content: Paired with a second studio for excellent hi-fi reproduction - Mozart in the bedroom!  Vivaldi to gradual sleep!
title: Even better as a stereo pair!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Derek
content: Sounds good until it stops playback, usually about 1min into anything. The only way I’ve been able to fix it is to mute the microphone, which basically makes this a Bluetooth speaker without Alexa capabilities.
title: Speaker consistently interrupts playback unless mic is muted

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Blake L.
content: Unbeatable sound for the price. The highs/treble seems to be washed out slightly. But it still sounds fantastic.
title: Worth the buy.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JAMES D. VAN CLEAVE
content: I have friends with Alexa (not the Echo Studio) and I was surprised at the sound quality. I ordered the Echo Studio because it was the latest model. I expected the sound quality to be the same, maybe a little better. The sound quality is “Above and Beyond” my expectations.
title: Above and Beyond

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: gary j (west melbourne florida)
content: I love the sound quality easy to use works great with my apple products loved it so much I bought another one.
title: works for me

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Limu
content: I'm still learning the basics of Alexa but it's quite amazing. You just have to talk like you're having a conversation with someone and Alexa recognizes your voice.Sound quality is excellent.
title: Alexa,Alexa

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Catherine O
content: Like the ability to hear good music easily without starting and setting up the stereo.  Grandkids can easily use it.  I have 3 echos and the Studio setup automatically,  it was very easy.
title: Good for music listening.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bill Cummings
content: Great sound quality can be paired with other echo devices for surround sound effects. Paired with my Yamaha receiver and can turn on power and change tracks, etc for complete hands free operation
title: Great sound in a small package

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Farr
content: Alexa es la mejor en AI, el echo studio tiene un sonido fantástico, no tan bueno como el de Apple, pero en su conjunto es el mejor parlante inteligente por mucho. Me encanta
title: En conjunto es el de mejor características

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael Hall
content: Set up and was using it in less than 30 minutes. Great sound and features. I bought a second and it made a big difference.
title: Very happy with the sound and ease of use

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ace-Man
content: Sounds Great with Good Bass.  Replaced an Echo Plus in my kitchen where I listen to music while cleaning - Perfect for this application.
title: Ease of Installation

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chuck
content: I like the fact that echo studio is waterproof and I can use it safely on my patio.  Studio best Quality in sound is  best used indoors but I wanted better volume and quality of sound outdoors.  I will likely get another to replace my 2nd generation echo.
title: I still would like studio to have even louder sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lee Eckhart
content: Based on numerous reviews I expected a lot from this speaker but found it to be good but not up to the hype.
title: Good but not great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ramseyjp
content: The speaker itself sounds amazing. It took about 15 minutes to set up even though it should have been faster. I thought that I could have figured a workaround to connect to the tv but without firestick it is not possible.
title: Its not an all in one Speaker.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alyssa
content: AMAZING sound quality!  We updated our echo dot to the studio and could not be happier.  Worth every penny!
title: So happy with the studio!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jason T. Meler
content: Much better sound than the first generation echo that we replaced. Great experience with all our echo devices.
title: Great upgrade

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Maxime Pierre
content: No discernible difference in sound quality from the previous model. Especially not for a $200 speaker. Secondly, the previous model paired with my echo sub quickly and seamlessly. This echo studio took 2 chats, 2 phone calls to Amazon and it wouldn't pair with the echo sub.
title: Not worth the upgrade from the previous model

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: bashman
content: The Saga continues with greatness....
title: Amazing audio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: edward m kassirer
content: this is my fourth amazon echo product, and I can say that the studio is just a wonderful addition, such a great sound !
title: another addition to the family

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Eskelito
content: It worked great and sounded great. It suffered from intermittent interference or loud static. Waiting on a new one.
title: Still needs tweaks

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: daniela
content: I love it! Setup is a breeze. Sound is better than more expensive units I have seen. I use it mostly to listen to radio and music, and have no use for the rest of the "smart" features so far.
title: Beautiful full sound for a very reasonable price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gary W. Herlocker
content: Wonderful speaker with excellent highs and lows.  It sounds like an expensive quality speaker, I love it.
title: Excellent Highs and Lows, love it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bobby Deneke
content: Awesome sound quality.  We're likely to buy a couple more to replace some of the older models. The sound is super rich.
title: Worth it.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Edwin D. Huff
content: Love the room filling sound , from all directions.  And the bass response is very impressive.  Old songs sound new again.  Thanks for the innovation.
title: amazing sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gust242
content: Overall sound for music is good but the voice needs a lot more work I think it on the fires out of the top speaker and can barely hear it
title: Amazon echo studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: cubby
content: Best sound out there for this price. Matches well with the Amazon hd music I am listening to music again!
title: Great speaker, and works so well with Amazon Fire TV too!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MomofAutisticLittleHandsome
content: Sounds good, but better than the previous models? Not really. Unless you like to blast your music so loud the next county can hear it, this is not worth the price. If your just a causal listener or prefer your music in the background, this model is not for you.
title: Worth the $$$

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: M. G.
content: Sound is amazing (this replaces a Google home mini). The only thing I don't like is that it keeps kicking me off SiriusXm, saying I'm streaming elsewhere, which I'm not. I reached out to customer support, and they made me go through various steps, and promised that the issue would not repeat, but I keep getting kicked off. I'm glad I have other ways to listen to Siriusxm.
title: Amazing Sound; Doesn't play nice with SiriusXM

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Roberto Ortiz
content: Lo termine devolviendo pues cuando le hablaba a veces no me contestaba.  En ocasiones tenia q gritarle.  En sonido envolvente es excelente.
title: Un tanto desfraudado

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James Von Doom
content: Got this for "dance parties" with my 11 month old son and dog...all involved are happy with the purchase!
title: Top Tier Home Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JHON PAZ
content: Me gustó, elegante, la calidad de sonido para el tamaño muy bueno. Voy a comprar otro para tener mejor sonido en el tv. Saludos desde Colombia.
title: Bueno

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: BigUncle
content: I love the studio the sound quality is good and Alexa understands as much to be expected. The only problem I have been running into is the paid for voice I.e. (Samuel L. Jackson) it barley recognizes the voice and responds after repeated attempts. I also use the studio as a sound bar and it does excellent!
title: Excellent as a surround sound or sound bar!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bradley
content: The Studio is great, Would really like to see an updated Echo Link with 802.11 a/b/n/ac and multichannel outputs including Auro 3D and Atmos, 7.1.2 or 7.1.4 channels with HDMI and RCA outputs in addition to coaxial and optical digital outputs.  Also would like to see an updated Echo subwoofer using 802.11 a/b/n/ac.  The Echo dot Rev 3 is also great only needs 802.11 a/b/n/ac.  Thanks for the great products.
title: Great product, I own 3 and plan to purchase a couple more.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: kcellup
content: Bought two of these for a cheap home theater setup. It does not disappoint
title: Home theater

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Sergio Hernandez
content: Buena acústica. En volumen medio suena un poco bajo para lo q suena cuando está en volumen alto. En volumen alto suena muy bien y potente el bajo
title: Potente para su tamaño

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Johnnyohio
content: Decent room filling sound from a smart speaker.  For the price it’s a good value for the sound quality.
title: Good quality speaker unit...HUGE step up from Echo or Echo Plus

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chuckie
content: Echo Studio has nice rich sound. Small footprint and a bit heavy.  Nice look and does not overpower a table top.
title: Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: B.Moore
content: If you don't already use Amazon music do not purchase this product. It is nothing but a constant ad machine pushing you to sign up and once you do it continues with more ads to upgrade to the better quality audio membership. Pairing with my echo sub is a nice touch but for the cost of both you're better off getting a system from an actual audio company
title: Amazon needs to stop making speakers

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Timothy D. Amussen
content: A little heavy and more costly than my previous Alexa.  Bue the quality of the new Alexa makes up for it.  I would highly recommend buying it.
title: Great Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: R N M
content: I haven't tried voice recognition or integration but I assume it works just as well as everything else.
title: Pleasantly suprised.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: patsbowwow
content: Although echo studio is rather clunky looking ,it delivers great sound quality. It was all set up and all I had to do is sign in on my app. It controls my lights and a couple of plugs. Love it!
title: wonderful sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: T. Freeman
content: I love it sounds great playing 3D music . Playing prime movies and applets plus with my iPad through Bluetooth.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: andrew r phelps
content: Treble/ high end muddy. Sending it back. I use Spotify premium with highest playback settings.
title: Muddy sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Noside
content: What can I say - I love my echo studio and it sounds just as good as other higher price smart speakers at a much lower price. I bought these on sale.
title: LOVE IT!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard C. Stillwell
content: It was easy to set up and with the Amazon HD music it offers outstanding sound.  I have found that all of the Alexa features that I experienced with my Echo are present in the Echo Studio.  I would recommend it to anybody who enjoys listening to music on their Alexa device.
title: Excellent Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: D. Guiotto
content: Did not no what to expect  . Very suprised Great sound . easy to move . What a sound for somthing that small ....
title: sounds very good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Idris
content: My fire cube and echo voice recognition will not work with each other. And you need WiFi In order to connect to devices, does not connect via Bluetooth.
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: AT73
content: This is a great device...I have a Bose radio and this is just a good. The sound quality is amazing.
title: Great sound system

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brad
content: iTs a bit confusing to use as this is a mobel app. And I have the studio placed in my garage, but. I also have Amazon auto in. The car. If studio thinks you are already running music it will not play unless you cast the app from the phone to the studio speaker and audio quality sufferers , its great to hear the sound quality I grew up with instead of smart phone speakers. Yes this speaker is a winner
title: When you hit the jackpot and get into 3D music it sounds great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tom L
content: By far the best of the echo family. Sound quality, construction and functions are all outstanding.
title: This is the one to get

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kitty
content: I have an Alexa but I also lovemy Echo Show.  It is in the kitchen and I can use itto visit face to face  with my grandkids and their animals.  Love Love Love…..
title: Great in the kitchen

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Richard L. Forman
content: I love listening to music when reading.  Great sound quality.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Deuce
content: Sounds great. Connected it to a Echo Sub and it rocks. Best Echo speaker and I own a lot of them.
title: Love It !!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Waylon
content: Over hyped, too expensive. Open boxed, used item received as “new”. Absolutely not worth the additional $. More tiny speakers does not equal better sound in this case. Can’t believe I was sent a used, repackaged item for this price.  But I can understand why the first person returned it.
title: Repackaged used speaker. Nothing special.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cody Gray
content: Room filling sound, quality I've come to expect from the echo line.
title: Sound quality is amazing, fills the entire room

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joshua Skeen
content: Okay it seems to have alot connectivity issues. And "alexa" just seems slow both to respond and answer. But the sound is absolutely amazing.
title: Alot of cons for the price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: craig smalling
content: Sounds great, high quality, booming bass and can get loud but I live in apt so I listen at lower volumes but at lower volumes sound is very good , no problems at all , Alexa hears me over music just like on any echo device . Well worth the money
title: High quality sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jake
content: Ok sound, voice recognition is ok not the best and sounds better than dots but no for the price.
title: Ok, Better than Dots

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Colin
content: A huge improvement over the original Echo.
title: Sounds great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JoeFromPA
content: Great addition to my the Echos in my home.
title: Adds depth to music different then other Echo speakers.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: thomas
content: Awesome speakers. The only thing wrong is the vocal voice of the song. You cant really hear it to well as other speakers. Bass is good.
title: Awesome

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Henry Geise
content: I love this thing.  It truly delivers on sound and has great bass.  I love the voice recognition and have already placed several smart plugs in my home and ask it to play spotify all the time.  If you were on the fence about, it's worth it.  Of course got it on prime day which made it even better
title: I love it!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Brandon Wichman
content: Sound is amazing! However, it's voice recognition is much worse than all my previous Echo's. Another one in the house will hear me, when this one doesn't - while I'm standing beside it.
title: Not working nearly as well as my other Echos

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: michael
content: This speaker met my expectations. It has a better sound that the Echo Plus I used before. It does have a larger size so that has caused a slight problem on my bedstand, but I'm learning to live with it. I can't imagine needing a larger speaker as this one fills the room with great bass along with sharp treble. I had no problems setting it up.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: FRP
content: Very good speaker.  The EQ is a little bass heavy for me, but a great improvement over the other smaller Echos.
title: Very good speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Bill Radke
content: I really like the sound from this. You get a nice base and perfect for most normal sized rooms.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cbrauer
content: Live the sound quality although Alexia’s feedback volume is low and lowers than audio playing.
title: Excellent Sound Quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Carolyn
content: My satellite radio died and I bought this to replace it.  I can’t believe I waited so long to come to this technology.  It’s terrific!
title: Best thing since sliced bread!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dawn Wilson-Gray
content: The echo plays my favorite songs and wakes me up in the morning for work, tells me the weather
title: Very Dependable I love my echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew M
content: Bought it for my Mac Pro audio and quite happy. Only issue really is I wished it had an audio input other then Bluetooth.
title: Awesome sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael T.
content: Really enjoying the device. I use it primarily for Amazon music and sound quality is excellent.
title: Works Seamlessly

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Logan M.
content: This is one of the best smart home speakers available on the market. The sound is amazing bass is very loud if you want it to. You can customize the eq in the app. Voice recognition can hear you even when this is at max volume. 360 sound is fantastic!!!!
title: This is the best smart speaker available!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Dan Pfeiffer
content: Love the sound...as an audio engineer, wish it had a little better documentation. For instance, over mini-optical input cable (which I didn’t know it had until it arrived) I would expect it to accept volume and mute commands from the source device, which it doesn’t appear to be doing.
title: Great but mysterious!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: pete
content: Love the sound have it in living room linked with my other 3 echos filling the house with great sound with the Echo Studio  in the center of it all being the main speaker I now  just have to learn how to connect to my firestick for my tv
title: Just great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ron C.
content: I am using Studio as my computer speaker. With the upswing of the pandemic and video conferencing becoming commonplace even on personal levels, excellent video and audio are essential.  The sound quality of the Echo Studio coupled with Alexa is the icing on the cake.
title: Sound is outstandingly rich

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: MDP
content: I purchased 5 units to serve as a whole house sound system.  The ease of use and group configuration were exactly what I needed.
title: Great sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: The expert
content: Sound is clear but lacks real bass. I use mine synced to my peloton in bluetooth mode as well. Matches up to video.
title: Sync to peloton !!!!! Bluetooth

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: thebrainguy
content: If you own an echo or echo plus, you will love the echo studio,  It has the same great functionality with far better sound.
title: Echo on Steroids

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joel
content: Love this speaker! I previously owned a dot and an echo but I upgraded each time because I wanted more bass and just sound in general and that’s what I got here. I typically keep it at a certain volume and think it’s pretty loud and yet I can still make it even louder. Really makes your music interactive. I would recommend and for the price too, it’s great.
title: Sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gigi3
content: The sound is terrific. Couldn’t ask for more. My son gave it to me for Mother’s Day and I have really enjoyed it.
title: Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Aaron Reynolds
content: Love this speaker.  It fills a large room easily.  Recommend having the HD music streaming option for best experience.
title: Amazing sound, football size, need HD to get Max benefit

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rick Woodham
content: Excellent "hearing" and speech recognition ... speaker sound is superb for small package
title: Discreet and Great Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: T. D. Gooldy
content: Great sound and Alexa integration. Only issue is when we use it as a home theater the lip sync gets off REALLY easy regardless of how many times we readjust it. This definitely needs a significant firmware update to get a 5
title: Great, except Lip Sync Issues

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andrew Geesy
content: man... this would have 5 stars if i just listened better.  some of the alexa features just aren't great and the fact that you can't switch from playing music back to the auxiliary without unplugging it.
title: great sound but not functionality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: elliott o. may
content: A little disappointed. Doesn’t have the range or depth of a Sonos speaker. But it does have Alexa.
title: Prefer Sonos

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Patty
content: So easy to set up.  All I had to do was plug it in and turn it in.  It recognized every device right away.
title: So easy

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Paul Snider
content: I didn't think the Studio was that much better than the Echo Plus.  I had them both set up next to each other.  The Studio had more bass, but the midrange seemed muddy to me.  I was hoping for a much bigger difference.
title: Not that much better than Echo Plus

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rafael P.
content: The music quality is great for what I need. Music is very clear and loud. I can hear it around my house while I clean. Just what I wanted for entertainment.
title: Awesome speaker unit.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Travis Peden
content: The sound is very good. But the Alexa portion leaves a lot to be desired.  It consistently forgets how to do or how to connect to other devices, it doesn’t work nearly as good as the dots and plus’ that are spread through my home.  I regret my purchase daily
title: Not worth it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jess Walsh
content: Such a big improvement over echo dot.  Room filling sound.  Responsive on voice requests.  Really happy with it.
title: Great Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: dominic dat tran
content: I have 2 echo plus 1 sub at home. But I bought this for my salon and it sounds amazing! This is a powerful speaker that all of my old echos combined. Totally in love!!! Thank you Amazon!!!
title: Powerful sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Janet
content: I received mine as a gift. The sound quality is amazing. I live in an apartments so my neighbors hate me because I love the rich clear bass sound that this speaker produces. Friends drop by and they’re amazed at the quality sound. Paring it with my other echos creates a beautiful surround sound. If you love music, the Echo Studio is a must have.
title: Amazing sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jesus Leonardo Zorrilla
content: Compre 2 echo studio, y aunque tienen un buen sonido cuando las usas en esterero (solo con spotify o amazon music) la calidad del sonido vs el precio no justifica la compra... Si me lo preguntan, consideraria un juego de parlantes y un echo dot en vez de dos echo studio.
title: Nada del otro mundo, caro

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: gracie bray
content: Bought at bestbuy and love it
title: Buy it at bestbuy!  They rock

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Don Dahl
content: I would have expected a lot louder potential, there are blue tooth speakers out there much smaller with much larger sound I could have linked to a much cheaper Echo Dot. I expected much more.
title: Looks big sounds small

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: dtb
content: Good quality sound especially compared to my other Echoes. It’s bigger than I expected so not sure it’s ideal on the bookshelf but I still like it overall.
title: Quality sound but big.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Trainspotter
content: Love the Echo Studio. Easy set up and integration. Sounds are crisp and the bass is on point. I'm using it also as a home theater speaker. At one point in watching a Star Wars movie with a capital ship moving...the family looked at one another and said in unison "Did you feel that?" Freaking awesome.  The only downside, we purchased just one. Maybe Santa will be generous this year.
title: A Must...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Frank D. Janzow
content: I was looking for a subwoofer but this seems to be the latest product. Sounds great!
title: Sounds great!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Yevhenii Pyltiai
content: Overall good speaker - clean sound, great range for microphones (invoking Alexa), connects to firetv. The problem is - advertised Dolby Atmos doesn’t really work anywhere besides Prime Videos with 1 series supporting it and Amazon HD music, where you have very few 3D songs. Netflix, Disney+ and other apps don’t support FireTV + Echo Studio to produce Atmos sound.
title: Dolby Atmos is very limited

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Lanny Molstad
content: I thought the original echos we have had good sound, the new one has much greater base and sound.
title: New Echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Woodworker22
content: Sound overall is very good, but bass is a bit flat when compared to my 5.1 soundbar system.
title: Very good for the price, and if you want to talk with the speaker!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: P. Broussard
content: This replaced one of the 1st Alexa devices , what an improvement , the sound is phenomenal
title: Echo Studio SOUND

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: W. Deerenberg
content: Love the no delay talking (used to be wake up Alexa.. pause and talk. Now it’s just in one go without pause). Sound is great but it still lacks some bass, add woofer to it and it’s solved though
title: 👍🏻 in one word.. great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: S. Lacy
content: I have another alexa in a nearby room that hears me say Alexa before this one does. It sounds great but does not listen well.
title: Usually need to shout at it

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Charleen M. Bringman
content: Purchased primarily for streaming music and it performs task very well. Music library is also deep and versatile. Voice recognition is pretty accurate and responses are well thought out. It should be a fun product to grow with as technology continues to expand.
title: Sound quality is really quite good considering small size.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michele Hirata
content: The sound is awesome. Have had some problems with lag and intermittent cutting out. Not quite sure how to fix that. Overall satisfied.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PJ
content: Love the sound quality and easy setup, but at times for no reason, the Echo studio can become nonresponsive...especially if you use the home theater option for 2nd gen fire tv cube.
title: Great, but with some issues

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Barbara
content: It continually disconnects from my WiFi.  I have a other eco devices that never disconnect.  I am unfortunately returning it because reconnecting is difficult.
title: Disconnects constantly from WiFi.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: b
content: The bass is still a little lacking, but for the size and design, the Studio delivers impressive, room-filling sound. I’ve owned four generations of Echo products, and the Studio is by far the best value. Solid sound and a Zigbee hub built in.
title: A solid hub to base your Smart Home around

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevin Stratton
content: Very impressed with the sound for the size of this. Even when turned up it still hears me when I say Alexa.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kevinsl908
content: Have been looking for something to play music in my rec room, this is perfect. Great sound
title: Love the sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Big O
content: I have one and plan to add another for stereo when/if they ever go on sale. Hi fidelity might be a bit of a stretch but I’m no expert on sound. Definitely a step up music wise from my Echo 3rd gen.
title: sounds pretty good

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Debbie Lewis
content: it is so nice being able to get answers for weather, etc without having to use phone, tv, or laptop.  We love the sound!  Certainly works for such a convenient thing.  Love being able to switch music genres or artists with just a mention to Alexa.  Wish I had ordered one earlier.  Haven't had any issues so couldn't rate the tech support.  Super easy to set up.
title: Love my Echo Studio!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Rhona R. Reagen
content: We bought this to replace an old Alexa that died.  GREAT sound, good voice recognition, and seamless set up.
title: Great addition to our kitchen!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: rennie Goldberg
content: I like the unit but wanted a white one!
title: Echo Studio worth looking at...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Tito Castillo
content: Alexa is a wonderful companion, she responds very well to all my requests, The music sounds rich, good fidelity, great power. Anywhere that leads to Alexa accommodates to give its best sound. I use it in Honduras. Amazon must incorporate Alexa apple music for Honduras.
title: A good device for my money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: allen
content: They sound awesome and bought two for better experience and with Alexia I control everything...highly recommend
title: Awesome...

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Al
content: Wow>>>>this thing is fantastic!! Can’t believe the sound quality and volume.
title: Wow

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: ROMY here
content: What a great device  the only issue i have is integration  with youtube music. If you guys emable youtubemusoc integration  this product  will be the best smart music system.
title: Please enable youtube music integration

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Matthew
content: Slightly disappointed in sound but impressed with how responsive Alexa is, even when music is loud.
title: Best smart speaker for the price

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: NikonMike
content: Underimpressed with the sound, maybe I was expecting too much. Just slightly better than my echo.
title: Wait for the next generation

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Professor Gardley
content: Why would amazon make a product that is not compatible with their previous echo devices. This is why apple is always ahead when it comes to technology. So dumb! Most people live in homes with multiple rooms. They probably are looking for a system that is compatible with their other Alexa devices or stereos. Common sense.
title: Why would amazon make a product that is not compatible with their previous echo devices.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Daryl Redwine
content: I find this speaker to be a good substitute for a sound bar and much easier to setup and balance, since the Studio does that for you.  The bass is well represented and high grade recordings sound Clear and crisp. Mind you it is not a substitute for an integrated amp with decent speakers, but it sound good enough and is much more compact.
title: Sounds great and Hides nicely!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cody brockhoeft
content: Must buy! Absolutely amazing sound quality. Extremely easy to connect to my fire cube/fire stick. I use the echo studio and echo dots as smart surrond sound. A really cool feature is it ask which era of music is your favorite. Example- I like rap. Alexa said which decade is do you prefer. 80s 90s 00s or current. 200$ well spent
title: The future of surrond sound is here

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: David Schwankl
content: I’ve gone crazy combining the studio speaker,  the echo amp, an old 5 disc CD player, and 2 Polk external speakers! The sound from the studio speaker is excellent and the amp allows new life from the Sony CD. I strongly recommend the combination of old and new technologies . Now if I can just utilize “Alexa”’s capabilities! Oh, I have a copy of Alexa for dummies !!!
title: Don’t be afraid to combine all the technology.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: daniel h forrest
content: Lovely sound, a like the 3rd gen too but this is in a class of its own, cool looking too
title: Great sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: WOODY
content: Some music sounds great through it other music does it not sure what to say!
title: Convenient/easy not sure about sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: PKV1
content: I like almost everything about the speakers. I have two and they sync'd together for stereo. My only gripe about the speaker is that when you are in Amazon music it cuts out because it has not received any command during a set time period.  I was planning on eventually buying the subwoofer but it seems like it might be discontinued.
title: Pretty good sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jim Griffith
content: I use this speaker as a stand alone speaker in the kitchen area. It replaced an original Alexa speaker which still works well, but I wanted the improved sound
title: Best sounding Alexa speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: toursec
content: Not a bad speaker but does not compare favorably against my Bose 500. Tried this speaker but returned it.
title: Okay speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ant
content: I love the size and sound of this speaker.  The price is right and it play High Fidelity music.
title: Studio Echo

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Donna B
content: I set mine up in under 5 minutes.  Sound is incredible!!! Highly recommend!
title: Must have

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Neil S Lasher
content: The sound is at a different level than the others Echos. It’s miles ahead. Many a tad too much bass but I love it
title: Sound is great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jon L
content: The best sound quality I’ve ever heard from a speaker before as it really fills the room. Also we have a Show 8 in the kitchen and this speaker in the living room. You can sync them to play at the same time and we love that feature. Overall very happy with this purchase.
title: Best sound out there

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jesus
content: Not as intuitive as they would have you believe 🙄 good sound when it does the right thing
title: Not as intuitive as they would have you believe

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James Noonan
content: The sound is amazing! Even music with heavy bass sound crisp with no fuzzy distortion...
title: Crisp!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Randy T.
content: Sounds really good, but after adjusting the equalizer I wish I could get more base out of it....
title: Sound

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Patrick Porter
content: The Echo Studio has a sound that is amazing. It fills the room with immersive sound and the ultra HD and  3D content really comes to life.
title: Amazing Sound and value.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jose Espinoza
content: Sound good but you have to paid for 3d music to enjoy the features and for that price no thanks mine echo plus sounds just as good.
title: Not as good as everyone thinks

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Javier Sanchez
content: I got this Echo in January it worked fine but know I’m having problems with it every time.
title: Not worth the money.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: SWfan
content: I love this version of the Echo. The sound is amazing. It handles base very well.
title: Love Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Paul H. L. Walter
content: I what you want is portability this isn't for. you. If what you want is fabulous sound and Alexa buy now!
title: Unbelievable sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: "kyinsf"
content: I was very looking forward to having this speaker.  At first, the sound was very good.  But, when I watched some Amazon Prime shows with the speaker, unfortunately, sometimes, sound cracks.  I turned on/off several times, but the problem persists.  I guess it is a great speaker for the price, but I am disappointed. :-(
title: Sound cracks

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: 65 Chevy
content: Love the sound...is enhanced even more with the sub connected. Like it alot
title: Value

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Pradeep
content: Poor quality
title: Not the best

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Fast Car
content: It won’t hook up to a tv with the optical port with anything other than mono sound, unless you have a compatible Fire TV. No stereo pairing when the input is the optical input.
title: Not a sound bar replacement

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Don
content: A great replacement for aged out original Echo 1st Gen. sound is great and the change over was seamless
title: Out with the Old, In with the New

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Nola T
content: Absolutely love it!!!  We talk and jam on regular occasions... Setup was a breeze and I was wondering how to exchange one of my dots...speaker is busted and no one likes static!!!!
title: Easy setup and the SOUND IS FANTASTIC!!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jon Okada
content: The sound was a definite upgrade from the 1st Gen Echo we were using. It also seems to get more reliable wifi reception (not sure why).  We mainly use it to play music while playing pool during the lunch hour and it's added more quality to that time.
title: Great Sound & Improved Wifi Connectivity

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Grizwald Fubar
content: Sometimes this thing just ignores me!  Makes me feel like I got married again!
title: Ummmm

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Andrew Rose Sr.
content: This speaker for its size, puts out perfect sound and integrates well with all my Bluetooth devices.
title: Perfect

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jeffrey M Grace
content: The sound could be a bit better , the midrange could be a bit less muffled , the subwoofer does not handle as low of bass tones as it should , you have to crank it for it to sound good . It’s awesome for what it is , but it’s not of audiophile quality , needs some more R&D to improve a few things .  Rock music and heavy bass even flat EQ response leaves much to be desired .
title: Great for background noise , not for quality audiophile listening

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mark Vanderslice RWFI
content: Be aware of the size of the Echo Studio it is big and heavy at 8-inches tall, about 7 inches in diameter and weighing in at 7.7 pounds. It has excellent sound and deep base I recommend the product if you have the room for it.
title: Big and sounds great

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: JNew
content: Sounds great.  Easy to set up.  Outstanding product.  I'm thinking about getting another for my bedroom.
title: Great product to start creating your smart home with.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: DKC
content: The sound is truly amazing!  Easy set up taking less than 5 minutes.  I liked it enough to buy a second one for downstairs.
title: Wow Wow Wow

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Holly Bye
content: I like to be able to walk from room to room in my house and hear the same music playing.  Unfortunately the Echo Studio cannot be grouped with my other echo devices.  Very disapointed in this aspect.
title: Good sound but it can't connect with my other echo devices in an "all speakers" group.  Why not?

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William Cook
content: Overall this is a great speaker - it certainly blows the audio doors off an Echo or Echo Dot, but it is severly lacking in the high frequency spectrum for a HiFi guy like me.
title: Great speaker, but not for the Audiophile

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Colleen Sforzo
content: The Echo Studio has great sound for such a small device.  We use it all the time.
title: Echo Studio

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Gerald Rapp
content: I love his product works like a charm. Speak softly and it still hears you.
title: Soon quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Humberto
content: Excelent! Just what you need for those lonely holidays. Doesn't argue with you, and does everything you request it to do. Great buy.
title: Excelent buy. Great value for your buck

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Big Leg Greg
content: It Is A Great Smart Speaker With Very Good Sound Quality For The Price.$$
title: The Amazon Echo Studio Is A 5 Star Quality Product.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ronald
content: Great clear sound. The stand alone subwoofer had more bass than this tho.
title: Great clear sound. Wish had more bass

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ivette
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Una imagen habla mas que mil palabras
title: Extraordinario

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: James E.
content: Like with all Alexa devices in my experience it is for all practical purposes plug-n-play. Sounds great.
title: Easy setup

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: George E. Carl
content: Probably the best speaker on market for a very reasonable price
title: Good value

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Kurt Kohnen
content: Sound quality just ok. My Google home max sounds a thousand times better.
title: Sound is just ok

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Jim
content: Love the studio speaker, tech help took a couple calls to help with connecting issues, but pleasant and helpful
title: Impressive

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Alejandro D Sanchez
content: Fills out the room with sound but I could probably do the same with a $100 computer speakers+subwoofer and the Alexa point or Alexa dot for cheaper
title: Great product but there are other ways too

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ralph
content: Very satisfied with this Echo, sound is great, good bass. The only downside to it is the same issue that i have had with my bugs. They cant all sync together, which seems to me as a missed opportunity. I would love to here mu 2 3rd gen bugs linked together with my studio and a sub....
title: Independent sound is great!!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: I Mean It
content: Amazing sound quality. Sometimes it does not get what I asked thought.
title: Sound quality

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: thomas p
content: I really wanted to love this but the bass is just way to much for me...q
title: Too much BASS!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Ahee52
content: Not worth the money the echo 3rd generation is good all by it self the sub was just  ok not worth the money either.
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: BtoBDan
content: Bought it for Zigbee hub. Very limited amount of zigbee items that are discovered. Taking it back for a smart things hub. Disappointed. Also this thing is huge. Not very pretty so find somewhere to place it can be difficult.
title: Connectivity with Zigbee is bad

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cdj
content: The sound and volume are better than I imagined.  I am not a big techy and don't get into these toys a lot, but for casual music around the house, this totally fits the bill.  The only thing is it is VERY heavy and I thought it would be a little more portable/versatile in that manner.  But I am very pleased and it was very easy to set-up/integrate
title: Exceeded expectations

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Michael Moore
content: Great sound for a single unit - good bass. We put it in the center of our kitchen area and use it all day long. I replaced the long cord with a 12” low profile cord (SF Cable 1ft Ultra Low Profile... https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01886XMQG?ref=ppx_pop_mob_ap_share) for a tidier look.
title: Nice sound, solid upgrade.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: KEN DRACHUK
content: Can't control volume like I could with the original echo plus. With a swipe of your finger on top. Also the light ring on top is harder to see than original.
title: A step down from the First generation echo plus.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Joelamite
content: Slow to respond to voice input, doesn't automatically "calibrate" every time it was place in a new room as it indicated it would during setup, tiny woofer means tiny bass no matter the price tag, 3D audio a gimmick. Slightly better audio than the Echo Show, but a disappointment overall.
title: Laggy, mediocre sound, wouldn't buy it again

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mr X Equis
content: HomePod has way better sound that’s this device. The Echo Studio is good, but the sound is not impressive.
title: Sound not as good as expected

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: my2cents
content: Has a much larger footprint than my Echo 3rd Gen but doesn’t sound any better.
title: Sound quality no better than my Echo 3rd Gen

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Chad Haney
content: Overall great product but... I have 2 of these and the sub synced with a Fire TV CubE, the problem is that the sound sometimes goes out of sync with the video. The other thing that bugs me a bit is the max sound level isn’t that high, don’t get me wrong it’s high enough but certainly not greatly impressive.
title: Video out of sync & max sound level not impressive

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: robert fierst
content: Great sound comparable to speaker that are far more expensive. Impaired two Echo Studios with an Echo Sub - awesome sound!
title: Super sound system!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Justin Loy
content: Used in my family's theatre room, have 2 studio's linked together with a firestick 4k.  Only complaint is it takes about 5 - 10 minutes for it to start working everytime I turn off and back on.  Have had to sync it a couple times due to auto disconnect.  Other then this issue it has great sound quality for our setup and makes a movie experience that much better.
title: Great sound, but technical issue not a breaker.

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Cavanagh
content: This Speaker is Awesome! For the price I can’t imagine any thing better.
title: Awesome Speaker

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: William D.
content: Home Theatre System with Fire tv cube!!! Sound amazing, can’t say enough how good the sounds coming from these speakers. I have two echo studio speakers and the Fire tv cube and it’s awesome!!
title: Buy them!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: jojo@itsdabomb.com
content: Happy now there's a great balance with new songs, movies, and old songs... Have to get 2 echo studios and the subwoofer to understand.
title: got 2 echo studios and the alexa sub and it's a legit system

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: crabby
content: There are times that the speaker will drop connection to the Fire Cube.  It takes a bit for the connection to come back.
title: I enjoy it when it connects

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Santi Alexander Cruz Jr.
content: Amazing sound! Connects to my TV with Bluetooth. Might get a second to amplify the sound
title: Great sound!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: G Man
content: I already have an echo and added the studio. The sound quality of the studio is just ok.  I expected the bass to be much better.  My plan was to use the echo as a satellite speaker but you can't do that if you have Amazon music without paying the subscription for another echo. I should have just bought a quality Sonos speaker.
title: Just ok

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
author: Mary R. Liegeois
content: I'm nor tech savvy, but this was as easy as turning on the lights! I love this item and Alexa is becoming a very good friend.
title: Sound is fantastic!

product: Echo Studio - High-fidelity smart speaker with 3D audio and Alexa
